story:
Short Summary

This is campaign for Traditional Serbian Cookbook, round 2. At the first of all thank you so much for everybody who already help us an contribute! Now we are in production phase and small author team gathered around of the portal Recepti i Kuvar online, collects and selects the old recipes that were created before the Second World War in this region.

Author team consists of: Miodrag Ilic, Author of the book; Professor Dr Sladjana Sobajic, the Author of the foreword and Associate; Dejan Ilic, Associate Editor and Cook editor; Kristina Gaspar, Associate Editor and Cook Editor. More about author and associates you will find at: http://tradicionalnirecepti.net/team-of-authors-working-on-the-book-named-traditional-serbian-cookbook/

The future book content:

  • Foreword: the impact of traditional food on human health
  • Introduction: history of the traditional cuisine in Serbia
  • North Serbia – about 20 recipes
  • East Serbia – about 20 recipes
  • South Serbia – about 20 recipes
  • West Serbia – about 20 recipes
  • Central Serbia – about 20 recipes
  • Kosovo i Metohija
  • Conclusions

My name is Miodrag Ilic, and I am owner and Chef Editorial of well know culinary web portal in Serbia: Recepti i Kuvar online.

We want to create a bilingual cookbook containing traditional recipes of national Serbian cuisine including our cultural, health and historical aspects, so as to save the recipes of our grandmothers and great-grandmothers from oblivion.

What We Need & What You Get

The money we will get as support for this project, will be used for preparing, design, translation and print of this book. The number of our associates who are unselfishly engaged in preparing this book is large: they share their ideas with us, their photos, recipes from their families' old cookbooks...

The Impact

When someone says “sarma” , “vanilice”, “baklava”, “pogača”, “zeljanica”, “pihtije”... in Serbia, it immediately refreshes one's memories and the relation with tradition. The tradition of Serbian cuisine is very old. One of the oldest Serbian cookbook was Srbski kuvar by Krusedol Monastery monk Jerotej Draganovic, published in 1865, in the Old Slavic language. One of the most educated people living at the end of 19th and the beginning of the 20th century, Sima Trojanovic (who was ethnologist),  published a book called Old Serbian Dishes and Beverages in 1896.

The list of such old collections of recipes, cookbooks, books on customs is very long. These books represent our primary motivation and driving force to start and finish this project underlain by the following idea: to preserve a part of the culinary and cultural heritage that came from our ancestors. In this book, you will find many old dishes which are now on the verge of being forgotten, which can be very rarely ordered in restaurants and are seldom prepared even within the family circles.

This project is recognized and supported by Chamber of Commerce and Industry of Serbia, as very important step in order to preserve a part of the culinary and cultural heritage:

„A traditional recipe of the local Serbian cuisine is an important part of the intangible cultural heritage of each nation. The list of elements of the intangible cultural heritage of the Republic of Serbia, in addition to traditional crafts, folk tradition, ethno songs and dances, with naive painting Slovaks, there are Belmuz meal, traditional production of Pirot cheese, pazarske mantije meal (traditional method of preparation). These elements are vital to the preservation of national identity, and are also an integral part of various tourism offers.

This project is recognized and supported by Chamber of Commerce and Industry of Serbia, as very important step in order to preserve a part of the culinary and cultural heritage:

„A traditional recipe of the local Serbian cuisine is an important part of the intangible cultural heritage of each nation. The list of elements of the intangible cultural heritage of the Republic of Serbia, in addition to traditional crafts, folk tradition, ethno songs and dances, with naive painting Slovaks, there are Belmuz meal, traditional production of Pirot cheese, pazarske mantije meal (traditional method of preparation). These elements are vital to the preservation of national identity, and are also an integral part of various tourism offers.

Why is Serbian cuisine so specific?

Because it represents a unique collection of cultural and culinary, national and historical diversity that emerged in the past centuries... The mixture of Turkish, Greek, Bulgarian, Hungarian and other cuisines makes it rich and distinctive.

What is the target audience of this book?

Everyone! Tourists, whether they plan to spend their holidays in Serbia or are on a business trip to Serbia. Diaspora, so that anyone who is “warmed by the sun of another sky” remind themselves of some of the forgotten dishes and “feed” their nostalgia, as well as to give with great proud a copy of the book as a gift to a dear person in order to show what country they came from. Experienced chefs, as well as inexperienced beginners who will have the opportunity to put their knowledge on trial, especially after reading this book.

Risks & Challenges

Our project is fully transparent and with your help we not expecting any risks and challenges.

Other Ways You Can Help

Please, support our project. Please share this story, and enjoy reading and cooking!

story:
We’re at a time like no other in British history; we’re on the edge of the precipice trying to work out what Brexit will bring, while the world wonders if globalisation has failed. We need to capture that unique moment and celebrate those engaging in politics to make the world work. We want to play a role in defining our age, by producing a magazine that also looks at where we’re heading.

Meet Stand Up:

Stand Up is a print magazine dedicated to giving young people a voice in political debate.  Increasing pressures on young people, such as the rising costs of education and housing, mean our voices should be heard now more than ever. While Brexit was a wake-up call, and a trigger for inspiring Trump's victory in the US, it's so important to remember that young people largely voted to remain within the EU - and many more were denied the right to vote at all, due to their age.

Stand Up will encapsulate the spirit of our young voices. The magazine is driven by young journalists spurred into action when, already stung by Brexit, we watched the election of President Trump. When hope seemed futile, this team started applying our talents to see what we could do to empower other young people.

While the magazine’s core journalism focuses on political analysis, it also tells cultural stories to amplify the voices of young people. Stand Up is in solidarity with migrants, people of colour, LGBTQ+ people, women and disabled people, and their stories will be included throughout. The magazine will also make sure that no one in the UK is forgotten. Too often the media focuses upon London or other major cities, and so Stand Up will connect with every corner of the UK.

Why Now?

The magazine will be launched one year on since Brexit. The referendum saw a rise of hate crime across the nation, and deep divides appearing in families. Stand Up will examine what drove us to this point as well as looking ahead, to see how young people really can make a difference.

The magazine was created with the singular aim: to inspire young people. Political apathy is understandable in a climate of fear. Many simply switch off, feeling hopeless, but Stand Up will highlight how people across the UK are making a difference and standing up to oppression. Stand Up will also show people how they can get involved in activism and politics (and promote accessible practices). In uncertain times, it is important not to lose momentum and to continue fighting to protect human rights, and all of our futures.

What we will do with your money

Donations will be used to cover the cost of printing. Stand Up will be ethically made with recyclable paper. Simply put, the more money we raise the more people can read our magazine.

Print vs Digital

When our fundraising donations are directly going towards printing it’s more than fair to ask why we chose print over digital. Digital magazines are incredibly popular but print has maintained its prominence in the market. People still want to hold a magazine in their hands. Magazines are inherently aspirational and we want people to walk away with a solid product that will stay with them for a long time.

Our magazine will be a substantial product: 72 pages on matte paper. It isn’t something we want to be just discarded with recycling (although if ever you do dispose of it, be environmentally friendly!) but something readers can keep coming back to. Print will produce the fitting product for our brand, and for our goals - but we need support to make it happen.


What Stand Up will include

Stand Up will cover politics, culture, people and power. Brexit will feature throughout, and we’re interested in taking a nuanced and analytical approach. We'll look at whether there can be a positive outcome for the UK, what the Brexit crisis means for our democracy and constitution and, most importantly, how it’s going to impact young people.

We’re not interested in an insular approach. We’re going to be looking at how other countries are responding to Brexit, with features that celebrate activists from around the world.  

There’s also going to be a wide range of content on the experiences of marginalised people. Too often people are shut out of debate, but we’re clear: we want to empower young people to make their voices heard and that absolutely has to include marginalised young people. Contrary to mainstream beliefs, we feel that it was ignoring marginalised communities in the first place that caused the deep divides in society. Diversity isn’t a chore. We can only have thorough journalism when all communities are spoken to and engaged with.

There will be lighter content too, looking at ‘the millennial lifestyle’ and our media. We’ve experienced a rapid boom in digital products during our lives and they deserve as much reflection as the political changes.

Our promotion campaign

We are approaching advertisers but this will only make up a small percentage of our revenue. A lot of magazines are crammed full of adverts, but we want to give our readers a proper Stand Up experience. Out of 72 pages we are only dedicating six to advertisers. The vast majority of our content will be dedicated to articles. When people buy our magazine, we’re making sure that’s what they’re getting and not a catalogue full of adverts. 

Cultivating relationships with professional partners is essential to our concept, regardless of how many adverts we feature. This means that we’ll be putting in a lot of effort into word of mouth to reach out to people and organisations to tell them why our magazine deserves attention. For our features, we’re contacting diverse and credible sources. We want high quality articles that demand attention but we also want to cultivate relationships with experts in their field.

Social media is the most obvious route. We're optimising multiple platforms, including: Twitter, Facebook, Instagram, Medium, Snapchat and Tumblr. Social media provides the best and most accessible way in which to engage with young people. We are also committed to ensuring brand transparency, which is why we will post regular updates from our meetings across social media, including longer Medium posts outlining just where we are with the magazine.

To keep up to date with our progress, you can find us on; 

@StandUpMag_

story:
Ghost Army 

This book is my soul. I place my soul before your feet. Please tread lightly. 

I have always done what is right for my community. This book is no different. This book is my journey to solve all of my very unique problems and I hope it allows others to create their own framework for success.

I am not saying that my formula is for everyone, I am saying that everyone needs to make their own formula. My formula is just one example. 

I have lost too many friends and family to mental illness, I aim to provide a positive resource and perspective, so that everyone is aware of the resources can be explored for mental health. 

  • 1 in 4 people will deal with mental illness in their lives.
  • 450 million people world wide deal with mental illness daily. 
  • Veterans are committing suicide at an alarming rate. 
  • This book illustrates the framework to treat mental illness holistically and internally. 

What I need from my community:

Pablo Neruda was an amazing Chilean poet. His community supported him and allowed him to write some of the most beautiful writing that has ever been written. I am asking for similar support. I just need the time and space to dive deep into my writing, I promise I will not disappoint. I gave away and sold all of my possession to pursue this writing. It has totally consumed me in the best of ways. 

I started this writing while in my artist residency in Iceland last summer and have been adding to it ever since. During my residency I struggled with suicide for the very first time. This writing saved my life, along with my yoga, meditation and other holistic practices.

After the first of the year I started to really dive deep in the writing and was writing 5 hours a day every day for nearly a month. I started school again and had to stop writing so obsessively, it hurt to stop something so beautiful. Then I realized that I must quit school and focus solely on this writing to get it buttoned up and out to the world. I have great anxiety everyday that this writing isn't finished and accessible to all.  I am calling to my community to support me to get this project  out to the world. 

   Needs 

  • I need $35,000 to self publish the book. This includes a budget for editor and cover design. 
  • Anything more than that will go towards an international book tour. Start booking me now :)

  The Perks!

  • The best book ever! It will at the very least be very entertaining, put together with lots of love and creativity:)
  • I have also created an educational coloring book. With the help of the very talented David Digby. It is a journal to log cannabis activity and have fun coloring while doing so. 
  • I enlisted the help of my very good friend Tylor Belshe for some amazing photos. There are prints small and large available as incentives. The post cards will come with a poem on the back. 
  • I have so many T shirts and hats! Please donate and allow me to send you a T shirt or hat!
  • I have so many skills I can offer for a donation, I can design custom artwork, I can teach you yoga, meditation or personal training, I can help dial in and optimize your day, I can speak at your work or school. Please let me know how I can be a resource for a donation. 

The Impact

With your help I can share my writing with the world. I know my story is valuable and needs to be heard by all. 

  • Everyone needs to know the resources that are available.
  • Veterans especially need access to the best and most impactful resources.
  • Please help my voice be heard, this is my life's work and I am very proud of it. It will be a great resource to the community. 

Risks & Challenges

Worst case scenario everyone gets a great book, photo, T shirt, and or hat. Best case scenario I raise enough money to tour the country, and go  Whatever money I do raise will go to the self publishing of my first of many books. 

  • I am not offering something for nothing, just the opportunity to earn the money to self publish my first book and get it on the shelf. 
  • I will self publish this book regardless, how much I struggle in this process is up to you. I very much appreciate your support in this endevor
  • Other Ways You Can Help

Please share with anyone and everyone that you think would be interested. 

  • Any conversation about holistic services for mental health is a success.
  • Even if I struggle for years to make this happen, It will for sure happen. Please help me make it sooner rather than later. 

It is very challenging for me to ask for help in any time of need. But I am asking from my soul, please help me accomplish this task and I will be eternally grateful.

I will self publish this book regardless, how much I struggle in this process is up to you. I very much appreciate your support in this endevor
Other Ways You Can Help


Please share with anyone and everyone that you think would be interested. 

Any conversation about holistic services for mental health is a success.
Even if I struggle for years to make this happen, It will for sure happen. Please help me make it sooner rather than later. 

It is very challenging for me to ask for help in any time of need. But I am asking from my soul, please help me accomplish this task and I will be eternally grateful.

story:
My name is Frank López Ballesteros, I am a freelance journalist based in Miami.
I write frequently in the Diario Las Americas, in Miami. I worked for 10 years in
the International section of El Universal newspaper in Caracas, and I write since I was 18 years old.

Corruption in Venezuela has been relentless, and it has crossed borders, with interest all over the world. Finding out corruption cases has been a challenge, tell them is a mission.

 I am working since July 2017 on a series of investigations on corruptions, drug trafficking and money laundering by drug traffickers who had connections with Venezuelan high-ranking government officials. 

The firt story, publishen on November 2017 revealed that Venezuelan high-ranking government and security officials are protecting notorious criminals —who pay large sums of money to
avoid being extradited to the US— in order to prevent them from airing information that might incriminate President Nicolás Maduro’s regime.

As a freelance journalist, I’ve had to incur expenses, such as translation services for certain documents, travles, phone cards for international calls, as well as buying or renting some equipment. But the greatest obstacle has been the limited time for money.

I have been looking to obtain funding for a short time, with a view to giving way to the publication of theree stories on a topic of general interest, narcotrafic and corruption. The reasons why I’m seeking funding are, on the one hand, to cover operating costs, and, on the other hand, to incorporate striking multimedia resources into the stories, so as to make them more creative and dynamic for audiences. 

 There are many secrets that must come to light, and with your help I can achieve this. If you can not help me with money, it does not matter! Help me share my campaign.

Help me complete a set of stories, so these criminals don't remain in the shadows.

story:
About me

I've lived in D.C my whole life. Bounced around elementary schools when I was younger. My family never had too much cash but I have not had a bad life. My biggest issue in school is that I have not been stimulated or challenged. This project is my chance to really grow as a writer and a student.

I've always loved writing. Some of my favorite memories are of writing when I was younger. Writing is a medium where I can delve into my own mind, testing my understanding of the world.

It's my hope that focusing on a chapbook project will allow me to explore and strengthen my writing abilities. If you chip in to this campaign, I will email you a copy of my writings--at least five short stories and/or essays, no later than February 15, 2018.

We are trying to make 800 dollars to purchase a used laptop with Word, which will also support me with my academic work and help me apply for colleges next year. Any money donated goes into the account of my English teacher, Seth Biderman, and the money will not be touched until we have enough for a laptop.

I hope you will considering supporting my writing and growth by contributing to this campaign. Please if you can not afford to help tell your friends and help me get the word out.

story:
Help Spread the Truth about the Elite's Global Pedophilia Network

Nearly everyone holds a special place in their heart for the most vulnerable amongst us - our children. Protecting them from harm is our moral and legal responsibility, duty and obligation as parents, as a society and as a human species. But for us to keep our innocents safe, alive and healthy, we must become aware of any clear and present danger known to cause irreparable harm to defenseless children. And that danger is the corrosive, decaying political economic system led largely by psychopathic pedophiles that systematically control their puppet minions through rampant, unchecked blackmail and bribery. Using their diabolical sex trafficking network, they sexually exploit and sacrifice children as their pure evil means of corrupting and controlling compromised politicians, generals, judges, police chiefs, CEOs and entertainers to do their dirty bidding. In recent decades this Luciferian system has increasingly flourished, unbeknownst to the vast majority of the public.

Last fall's Pizzagate turned PedoGate began opening people's eyes to what's been systemically occurring all along for many years now. It's imperative that we learn the horrific truth behind this worldwide scourge if we're ever going to reduce and eliminate it.

As a West Point graduate and former Army officer, I once would have given my life in service to my country I grew up loving. But the cold hard reality is our nation has been hijacked by a handful of perverted, demonic psychopaths with an unquenchable addiction for sodomizing and cannibalizing children.

For over a quarter century I worked with at-risk youth in Los Angeles as a licensed Marriage Family therapist. Most of my clients were wards of the state in the foster care and juvenile probation system, many were pedophile victims. Frequently I clashed with a broken Child Protective Services system that failed to keep children safe. I'm grateful for the opportunity to help heal the emotional trauma of my sexually abused clients. They taught me the power of resilience and the strength of the human spirit while my care, support and belief in them created a foundation to start believing in themselves. Both my passion and compassion as a mental health professional served me well as a practitioner of the healing arts.

Shortly after 9/11 I realized if a handful of treasonous Washington insiders with help from Israel and Saudi Arabia could willfully murder in cold blood almost 3,000 fellow American citizens, in their genocidal crosshairs we are all expendable. The international crime cabal government responsible for manufacturing a perpetual state of war using US Empire created terrorists also orchestrated the current refugee crises in order to make obscene Big Business profits selling illegal drugs, arms, human organs and children while laundering trillions of ill-begotten dollars. 

Several years ago I began utilizing my experience as a clinical therapist as well as my military background to write about the geopolitics of engineered wars and controlled crises as an elite agenda designed to facilitate global destabilization and chaos leading to one world government tyranny of the New World Order. In recent years as an independent investigative journalist, I've written hundreds of articles for such alternative news outlets as Global Research, Lew Rockwell and sott.net.  

A year ago I began writing about Pizzagate when few journalists even in alt news dared broach the subject. After over a half dozen articles on the emerging PedoGate scandal, at the behest of Jim Fetzer and Robert David Steele independently approaching me to request I write a book on pedophilia, I decided to create the A-Z encyclopedia on modern pedophilia, leaving no stone unturned. Recognizing that the rampant pedophilia epidemic is the elite's Achilles heel, I'm determined to fully expose the powerful sickos as our best opportunity to bring down their crime cabal. I've already completed the first half of Pedophilia & Empire: Satan, Sodomy and the Deep State. The first eleven chapters are available for free on either my blog site at empireexposed.blogspot,com or phibetaiota.net (http://tinyurl.com/pedoempire)

With your help, I can finish this project much sooner than later and together we can move towards bringing justice for the multitudes of child victims (past and present) that urgently need our rescue, support and protection. Sealed indictments of some of these pedophile criminals are about to be released to the public. It appears that we're finally turning the corner on the prevailing culture of sexual predators always living above the law with total impunity. Truth and Reconciliation Commissions will permit low level cabal players to identify and provide the necessary evidence to hold the predators at the top of this pedo food chain fully accountable.

My research has connected all the major government and institutions from global religions to local Child "Protective" Services; the absolute worst thing I have learned is that the average life expectancy of a child kidnapped or sold into these pedophilia-Satanic ritual channels is only two years. I have also connected CIA's mind-control technologies to the elite and how they subversively control both their immediate subordinates, their slaves, and the public at large. We're all being screwed by the 1%, and this book uses pedophilia as a foundation for opening the  public's eyes to the depth and breadth of elite atrocities against us 99%. It will arm the individual with truth that empowers activism, solidarity and change.

The international crime cabal government responsible for manufacturing a perpetual state of war using US Empire created terrorists also orchestrated the current refugee crises in order to make obscene Big Business profits selling illegal drugs, arms, human organs and children while laundering trillions of ill-begotten dollars. 
Several years ago I began utilizing my experience as a clinical therapist as well as my military background to write about the geopolitics of engineered wars and controlled crises as an elite agenda designed to facilitate global destabilization and chaos leading to one world government tyranny of the New World Order. In recent years as an independent investigative journalist, I've written hundreds of articles for such alternative news outlets as Global Research, Lew Rockwell and sott.net.  
A year ago I began writing about Pizzagate when few journalists even in alt news dared broach the subject. After over a half dozen articles on the emerging PedoGate scandal, at the behest of Jim Fetzer and Robert David Steele independently approaching me to request I write a book on pedophilia, I decided to create the A-Z encyclopedia on modern pedophilia, leaving no stone unturned. Recognizing that the rampant pedophilia epidemic is the elite's Achilles heel, I'm determined to fully expose the powerful sickos as our best opportunity to bring down their crime cabal. I've already completed the first half of Pedophilia & Empire: Satan, Sodomy and the Deep State. The first eleven chapters are available for free on either my blog site at empireexposed.blogspot,com or phibetaiota.net (http://tinyurl.com/pedoempire)
With your help, I can finish this project much sooner than later and together we can move towards bringing justice for the multitudes of child victims (past and present) that urgently need our rescue, support and protection. Sealed indictments of some of these pedophile criminals are about to be released to the public. It appears that we're finally turning the corner on the prevailing culture of sexual predators always living above the law with total impunity. Truth and Reconciliation Commissions will permit low level cabal players to identify and provide the necessary evidence to hold the predators at the top of this pedo food chain fully accountable.
My research has connected all the major government and institutions from global religions to local Child "Protective" Services; the absolute worst thing I have learned is that the average life expectancy of a child kidnapped or sold into these pedophilia-Satanic ritual channels is only two years. I have also connected CIA's mind-control technologies to the elite and how they subversively control both their immediate subordinates, their slaves, and the public at large. We're all being screwed by the 1%, and this book uses pedophilia as a foundation for opening the  public's eyes to the depth and breadth of elite atrocities against us 99%. It will arm the individual with truth that empowers activism, solidarity and change.

story:
We need your help to publish this important book.

This is the book we wish our own moms and dads stumbled upon while we were growing up. This book is the SEED that WE get to water for our Brown Girls- in the present and of the future.

In the present day, brown girls are experiencing significant pressure from the world regarding:

  • Self worth
  • Self love (Physical appearance and mental well-being)
  • Secure and healthy relationships with family and friends

An idea was formed after the publishing of my first book, Brown Boy. I could not leave out the bold message that needed to be told about the brown girl.

A dear friend and parent of a brown girl expressed how her daughter seemed to not be so happy with her big, unruly, hair. I can only imagine the thoughts going through a child’s mind, but even more, what does a parent do to be sure that she loves herself regardless of her circumstances?

Brown Girl is an empowering children's book written for the girl that feels too tall, too small, not smart enough or creative enough. Little Makenzie is a fun loving brown girl with a beautiful spirit of boldness! Contrary to the wonderful things others say of her, Makenzie does not always love the way that she looks. In this book, Makenzie is challenged to understand the importance of self-love with the help of her father & a few notable role models who also felt the same way once upon a time!

We are raising $3,000 to produce and distribute a 40 page illustrated story along with important educational curriculum based and community resource pages that reinforce self-worth and love to brown girls through positive affirmations!

Everyone who donates $100 from February 1- April 1 will have their name listed on a special donor page of the book. (Your gift may also be recognized anonymously if you prefer).

Our hope is that this story will plant the seed of pride and encourage families to continue the conversation needed to build a strong generation.

Please help make a difference in the lives of children who need it most. You have an opportunity to inspire young people of color to realize that despite their circumstances or feelings of lack, they are so much more! With your help, we will be able to get this book out into the world! Imagine how it could be if from a very early age, you knew everything you needed to know to live an amazing life, no matter what the circumstances were. What an amazing world we could create. Every contribution will help us reach our goal! We are also accepting pledges from those who may not want to purchase a book, but still want to support our efforts. If you are not able to support this vision financially but you still believe in its message, you can still help by spreading the word on Facebook, Twitter, Instagram and other social media outlets.

story:
What's with you and antlers?

Antlers are each unique in structure. The North American White Tail male routinely shed their antlers. I view various aspects of myself and components that have made me who I am as my antlers. Some of them I have "shed" the baggage of, others I would like to. Why 32? Because the book will contain 32 poems for my 32nd birthday which is when I will release the book and who I truly am to the world.

What are you spending this money on?

I'm self-publishing in physical and digital so the money is going toward:

  • The actual publishing
  • Purchasing an ISBN
  • Paying a cover designer
  • Free shipping on perks!
  • and more!

Why should you care?

  • Because you love art
  • Because you love me
  • Because you love poetry
  • Because you love honesty
  • Because you love 

I promise this to be a labor of love that I am putting out there for the world to reject or accept as they see fit. Please, give me a chance.

Other ways you can contribute!

  • Share this with your friends and encourage them to contribute be it monetarily or otherwise!
  • Send friends to my website, poetry instagram, and facebook!
  • Send me words of encouragement! (jasminewritespoems@gmail.com, twitter, facebook, instagram)
  • Everything counts!

story:
About Disquiet

In mid 2016 I shared my story of mental illness on the internet. It took me two years feel ready to share it but only a few hours to write it. I didn’t overthink putting it out there, it felt like the natural way to make sense of things. Shortly after I published it, I began receiving messages from friends and colleagues. Each message was the same, they had experienced something similar.

My network is small, the number of people who read the story was probably only in the hundreds. Yet, within this small circle was an overwhelming amount of people who had experienced similar feelings. I had seen plenty of statistics on mental health, all pointing towards a growing concern. Yet it took these personal messages for the enormity of the problem become truly apparent to me.

Of those aforementioned statistics, there are two that strike me most. For men aged 20–49 in the UK, suicide is the number one cause of death.* In the UK men are three times more likely to die by suicide than women.* An extraordinary imbalance, especially considering that women are almost twice as likely to be diagnosed with anxiety disorders.†

So what gives? An outdated model of masculinity, the archaic mould men feel they need to fit, the all too damaging phrase “man up”, just a few things that lead to an inability for men to talk about these matters. Silence is what’s killing today’s men. Change is happening, stigmas are being broken, and here within these pages are perfect examples of that, some men, average men like you and I, speaking honestly and openly of their internal disquiet.

 

Why am I raising money?

I’m asking for your help to raise money to print this collection of important stories. To do this you can pre-order a copy for yourself, buy multiple copies or even buy some of the other perks on offer.

What’s nice about raising money for just the printing is that printing is scalable. The more I raise the more I can print. This means more and more people will get the opportunity to read these important stories. 

50/50 distribution model

I believe ideas and thoughts should not be restricted to those who have the means. For every copy of Disquiet sold, another copy will be made available for someone to stumble upon.

This has been made possible thanks to generous creative contributors who have given their time and energy for free.

I’m excited by the idea that someone might serendipitously find Disquiet at a time when they need it most.

 

Other ways you can help

If you’re unable to contribute then I’d be extremely grateful if you could spread the word via your social networks. Short URL: https://igg.me/at/disquiet-zine/

You can also send people to the Disquiet website where they can sign up to the newsletter: http://disquiet.co


Team

Sam Judge
Writer, Artist, Designer

Michael Tom Walker
Photography

Will De Groot
Contributing Writer

Kevin Braddock
Contributing Editor

Grace Glendinning
Copy Editor


Stats:

* https://bit.ly/2IK7GSG
† https://bit.ly/1PTJXtG

story:
"While her brother Michael emancipated our fantasies, Janet helps us navigate our realities."

Special: A Critical Meditation of the Life and Artistry of Janet Jackson will be a collection of essays exploring the cultural significance of the iconic, multimedia star written by Craig Seymour, who has extensively interviewed Jackson and written two Vibe magazine cover stories on her. 

Among the essays:

"'The Knowledge:' Why Janet Jackson's Induction Into The Rock and Roll Hall of Fame Matters"

"Penny's Pain"

"The House That Jimmy and Terry Built"

"Everything I Know About Sex I Learned From Strawberry"

"When Janet Speaks Of God"

"'Made For Now:'" New Rules For Black Creatives"

Janet Jackson Interview Transcript, 2001

Janet Jackson Interview Transcript, 2006

story:
Story 

“Lucy, Dr Smack and the Beast of Antioc” is a children’s fantasy novel about a twelve year-old girl whose mother disappears in the most mysterious of circumstances.

With the help of the wildly eccentric Doctor Smack, Lucy sets off on an epic quest to find her. On their mission they meet all sorts of wonderful characters – like the Gobbledegook of Death whose long-winded stories can literally bore you to death, and Selkie Sue who is half-seal and the captain of a rickety old sailing boat crewed by her first mate, Pete, a feisty old pelican who thinks he is a pirate.

To finally reach her mother, Lucy has to confront Dr Smack’s nemesis, the dreaded Beast of Antioc, whose foul breath and razor-sharp teeth are the stuff of legends.

 

The Impact 

Before publishing the novel on Amazon or Tablo, I want to commission detailed colour illustrations of the cover page and the story’s characters based on the sketches the artist, Elizabeth Lea, has already done. Your contribution will help this happen.

The first nine pages are currently available to preview at: 

https://www.yumpu.com/s/GAjhIc0gH8qsz4UC

If you like this Prologue and the Synopsis and want to read more, then you can make a contribution which ensures you receive a copy now of the full story in its current state, or perhaps wait a bit longer for the first limited release of signed copies with the finished art work. Other “perks” include signed copies of Elizabeth Lea’s illustrations.

Your contribution is important to me because it will help make the book look the very best it can be before it’s released.  So if you do contribute, thank you! But even if you aren’t able to, please let others know about our campaign by sharing it with your family and friends.

 

Check out the facebook site for more information: 

https://www.facebook.com/Lucydrsmackandthebeast...

story:
Campaign ending July 2020.

 

My cinematic style of writing puts you in my shoes as I navigate through life.

#REBELWRITER 

frankscottdillon.com

My Story

They say everyone is born to do something. Since I was a wee lad I've dreamt of being of a writer. When I decided to enlist in the military, a light bulb went off. I could create a one-of-a-kind, authentic account of my experience. So, I started keeping a journal of my life. Even when I was in bootcamp or out to sea I  would scribble my thoughts in my notebook and was even asked a few times by the other Sailors what I was doing. If your reading this now, well, now you know. 

I want to be different and original. This isn't your standard novel, it's written like a movie to keep the writer engaged and entertained.  

Of course, I have haters.

I am all about freedom and true freedom is being yourself without anyone's permission.  Even some of my closest friends will tell me "keep dreamin bro" and that "no one reads books anymore," but a rapper once said, "If you ain't got no haters you ain't poppin."

 My Plan

  • Available in glorious bright colors and beautifully edited.
  • Available in paperback and e-book.
  • Complete world domination.

Risk & Challenges

I have a fear that my off-the-wall originality may come off as unprofessional, so creating a quality product is my number one goal.

It Takes A Village

I'd like to give a big shout-out to the wonderfully talented Sara Donato instagram: @SaraDiDonato_italia for all the interior illustrations she is working on. Please check her out!

Shout out to Joe Donato for the dope cover art instagram: @joedonato.

Other Ways You Can Help

Give a shout-out on your social media using hashtags #afloat #frankdillon #makereadingcoolagain #rebelwriter

Not interested? No sweat, just be nice.

Muchas Gracias Amigos.

story:
Short Summary

I am a life-long amateur scientist with a particular focus on astronomy. I have been researching the orientations of the "antas" of South-central Portugal for almost 20 years, and have concluded that they were built originally to be oriented to specific stars that were culturally important to the builders. But science has not been used to determine their construction dates, which are probably in the range of 7000 years ago. I want to try a scientific method to measure the date when the structures were constructed. Current estimates are based on the estimated age of objects found in the structures, but it is also clear that these structures were re-used over thousands of years. If the actual construction date can even be approximated using optically stimulated luminescence dating, a great deal can be learned about these structures and their purpose for the people who built them. There are several hundred such sites in South-central Portugal in various stages of deterioration, but many can be dated by this method.

What We Need & What You Get

The "antas" were built of massive stones, which in themselves can not be dated, but the structures were covered with a mound of earth when completed, and the earth mound was placed during construction. Optically stimulated luminescence dating is a laboratory process to determine how long ago particular particles in the soil were exposed to light before burial. This process costs about $700 per soil sample processed. To check the results a minimum of two soil samples from each site should be tested, and to determine whether the tests return results of interest, the dates are to be compared with astronomically-derived construction dates. For the best result at least three different sites should be studied in this way, so that six soil samples are a minimal amount to verify the suitability of the method. With modest administrative costs, this can be done with $5000USD for the initial pilot study.

As perks for contributions to this effort, I offer copies of a limited edition book which I researched, wrote, edited, decorated, and printed by hand a page at a time by 500-year-old technology, and bound by hand in hard covers using traditional materials and methods. The book is 250 printed pages with numerous decorations and illustrations. For each donation of $250 or more one copy of this book will be sent to the donor. For each donation of $50 or more I offer hand-printed copies of two hand-made illustrations from the book, suitable for framing.

The goal of the project is to raise $5000USD. If the crowdfunding project fails to reach that goal I plan to make up the difference by selling the remaining books in some other way. Either way the pilot study will be funded at the level of $5000. If the crowdfunding project exceeds the goal additional funds will be applied to additional tests on different sites

The Impact

Science advances by trying previously untried methods. If the proposed method, which is commonly used by geologists to date soil strata but has never been used for this sort of archaeological dating, proves to be effective, it will both open a new technology for archaeologists and demonstrate how and why the structures studied are important aspects of the culture that built and used them.

I have initiated and participated in two previous crowd-funding projects, both for printing books and both successfully funded and completed. One was about historic printing technology, and the other was a short story written by a well-known wood-cut artist in the early 20th century but never before published. Both were hand-printed by traditional methods.

Risks & Challenges

The main obstacle to trying this method of studying ancient structures is that it has not been tried, and it is costly. By providing a source of funds for the costly lab work, I hope to be able to convince archaeologists of the value of trying the method. Because I have been studying these structures for 20 years I am known in the region, and I am hopeful to break through to achieve a relationship with an archaeologist interested in this sort of study.

One very helpful way everyone who reads this project proposal can help is by telling others, especially people interested in limited edition hand-made books, or in archaeological studies.

One was about historic printing technology, and the other was a short story written by a well-known wood-cut artist in the early 20th century but never before published. Both were hand-printed by traditional methods.Risks & Challenges
The main obstacle to trying this method of studying ancient structures is that it has not been tried, and it is costly. By providing a source of funds for the costly lab work, I hope to be able to convince archaeologists of the value of trying the method. Because I have been studying these structures for 20 years I am known in the region, and I am hopeful to break through to achieve a relationship with an archaeologist interested in this sort of study.One very helpful way everyone who reads this project proposal can help is by telling others, especially people interested in limited edition hand-made books, or in archaeological studies.

story:
OUR VISION
 

ELOQUENT WOMAN MAGAZINE is an online and print magazine born out of the desire to see depth in women's beauty and fashion magazines; to see women portrayed less as sex objects and more as elegant, intelligent, and socially-conscious beings. We put these elements together to create a complete look at the modern woman. A lady of style, grace, eloquence, and compassion.

Eloquence, by definition, is the ability to state your argument with power and grace. These two words effectively describe the eloquent woman.

We are always in search of positive female role models to feature in every issue. Women with these same qualities to inspire our readers. 

 


 

OUR MISSION

At ELOQUENT WOMAN ® our goal is to inspire and empower; to remind women and young women that their true beauty lies from within. We feel this is a message that has been lost and is in need of a resurgence.

The ELOQUENT WOMAN loves fashion, but she also cares about the humanitarian issues facing our world; she wants to hear from women who are contributing to solutions within their communities and the world; women with a powerful and unique perspective to convey.

 

WHAT WE DO:

–We publish stories about women in the fashion, art, and entertainment world who are doing extraordinary things to better our world.

–We feature beauty and skincare products with a more eco-conscious and holistic frame of mind. 

–In our fashion articles, we endeavor to include the average size woman in our issues; celebrating women who love their curves!

–We closely follow sustainability trends in the fashion industry to feature brands with responsibly-made and ethical clothing lines.

–We have published 12 volumes since our very first issue in 2011. 

 

STILL THERE'S MORE…
 

THIS IS WHY WE NEED YOUR SUPPORT!

With a larger budget we can get our non-profit organization up and running. We will publish more magazines more times per year and we can reach more women with our positive messages to love who they are and not just how they look.
 


 

QUARTERLY PUBLICATIONS

Currently ELOQUENT WOMAN publishes once per year. Our immediate goal is to increase our magazine to a quarterly publication.

 

NON-PROFIT AND FILM PROJECTS:

The ELOQUENT WOMAN is committed to charity. We will expand our operations to include a resource center for women in need; providing skill acquisition, job support, clothing and other needs. Our vision is to not only provide resources that help women find better opportunities for jobs and development, but also tell their stories. We are committed to arts and the media and look toward including film and video projects, reflecting women as the modern-day heroines that they are.

 

WHAT WE WILL ACCOMPLISH

ELOQUENT WOMAN is a magazine created for women by women. We strive to create inspirational and clean content that is safe and can be shared with women of all ages. Our goal is to publish and distribute our magazine in as many places as possible and continue our message of value and positive imagery for women around the world. With your help...


WE WILL...

•Expand our print distribution to get our magazine into more hands. 

•Provide jobs by expanding our team to hire more writers, photographers, editors, and artistic directors. (Currently, our contributors work 100% from home!)

•Provide resources to current non-profit organizations that we are partnered with. 

•Begin the process of providing resources through the development of our own organization to help women in need.
 

If you have enjoyed the content from this publication so far, help us continue to publish and expand. Joining us today with a gift as low as $5 and/or by sharing a link to this campaign on social media.
 

You can help ELOQUENT WOMAN be all that it was meant to be!

story:
What We're Trying to Achieve

“Until the lion learns to write, every story will glorify the hunter.”

This African proverb encapsulates one of the major drivers for Blue Banyan Books because stories not only define your past, they can influence your present, and shape your understanding of the world.  We want to energize Caribbean publishing, creating international bestsellers, especially from writers and illustrators living in the Caribbean, rather than waiting on the major publishing houses to notice our writers once they have left home. Most importantly, we’re here to tell our stories in engaging and captivating ways.

In our short history, Blue Banyan Books has focused on fiction for children creating picture books about fun and adventure, and, of course, giving children cause to celebrate who they are. Under our imprint Blouse & Skirt Books we’ve published nine award-winning YA novels in numerous genres including Caribbean fantasy, historical drama, mystery and romance.

But we want to do much more. For us, books are about more than putting our children in the picture – it’s about showing them the possibilities of what they can be, about opening up their world, a task even more important today when the world seems to be closing in. When naming the company, we chose the banyan tree because of its aerial roots, which we think is a great metaphor for our drive to remain rooted, no matter how much we grow.

Now for the first time, we’re trying to branch out into non-fiction for children, starting with a series of graphic (novel) biographies of great Jamaicans for children 8 to 12-years-old, the first two of which will be published in June 2021.  

Jamaica has produced many great people who’ve helped to shape the world today. People who knew that just because you come from a tiny island, a dot on the map, doesn’t mean we cannot change the world. Our national pledge indicates that it is our duty as Jamaicans to not only improve our country, but to “play our part in improving the welfare of the whole human race”. But long before our pledge was written, our country has punched well above its weight.

Yet many of our children, and many children across the world, don’t know enough about them. We want to change that.

To start off the series, we will be developing the two biographies: My Name is Mary - the life of Mary Seacole and My Name is Marcus - the life of Marcus Garvey. We chose these two because both were fearless, were entrepreneurs and had global impact.

It seems really fitting, that as the world grapples with a global pandemic, that we should bring even greater focus to Mary Seacole who was born Mary Joan Grant in Kingston, Jamaica in 1805, and began treating the sick as young as age 12. Herself a victim of Cholera, Seacole attended to the sick in Jamaica, in Panama, where and, of course, the Crimean War.

And what better time than now, should we shift children’s gaze to the life, works and words of Marcus Garvey. Born in St. Ann’s Bay, August 17, 1887, Garvey helped to shape the modern civil rights movement, promoting ideas of social resilience and racial equality, despite numerous obstacles. A formidable public speaker, Garvey inspired black people to be proud of their race. Need we say more than “Emancipate yourself from mental slavery, none but ourselves can free our minds.”

And we’re putting together a great team of writers, researchers and illustrators to tell these stories. Celebrated poet and novelist Geoffrey Philp has already begun to pen the script for My Name is Marcus. A staunch advocate of Garvey, Philp’s published works include Uncle Obadiah and the Alien (1997) Benjamin, My Son (2003), Garvey’s Ghost. He’s the winner of Canute Brodhurst Prize and the James Michener Fellowship. To bring the words to dynamic life, we will be pulling on the efforts of one of the most exciting illustration talents in Kingston today, Djet Layne.

My Name is Mary will be authored by me, based on the fantastic research skills of life-long librarian Winsome Hudson, former National Librarian of Jamaica. My own writing has previously appeared in Pumpkin Belly and Other Stories, a collection of stories for children. Seacole’s life and travels will be illustrated by Staysean Daley, herself and illustrator, designer and entrepreneur.

What We Need & What You Get

Our aim is to raise USD20,000 to cover the complete production and initial marketing needs of both graphic novels.

  • Researching, Writing and Editing of both manuscripts 
  • Illustration and inking
  • Layout and design
  • Printing
  • Marketing
  • Perks and mailing

Every backer who donates US$15 or more is entitled to 1 copy and $30 or more entitles you to a copy of each. But we will also be making donations to local schools and libraries in Jamaica. If we exceed our goal, we will be able to ship books to libraries and literacy foundations in other Caribbean countries.

The Impact

There are existing books featuring both Mary Seacole and Marcus Garvey, and interestingly, they both told their own stories. But most of these books have not come from our region. We think this matters. For us, it is important that we play a part in how our narrative is shaped. 

Risks & Challenges

Blue Banyan is committed to publishing these two graphic novels. We also know that it is a long time between now, when we’re raising the funds, and our expected publication date. But it is especially because we understand the demands of publishing and the need for illustrators and the designers to have enough time, that we have this projected timeline. With almost 30 publications under our portfolio, we know what it takes to get a book from idea right through to a beautiful work for your bookshelf.

Furthermore, if we do not make our target goal, it may take us longer to get to publication, but we will get there eventually. We’ve also made sure to budget in the cost of mailing books and other rewards to you our backers.

Other Ways You Can Help

We hope that you can join us on this journey. If you can donate, please do.

If you can’t, tell a friend or two … or ten. Share our story on Instagram, Twitter, and Facebook using the #lionsanduntoldstories but you can also send out emails and any other means you choose to communicate. Every share counts just as much as every dollar counts.

But it is especially because we understand the demands of publishing and the need for illustrators and the designers to have enough time, that we have this projected timeline. With almost 30 publications under our portfolio, we know what it takes to get a book from idea right through to a beautiful work for your bookshelf.
Furthermore, if we do not make our target goal, it may take us longer to get to publication, but we will get there eventually. We’ve also made sure to budget in the cost of mailing books and other rewards to you our backers.

Other Ways You Can Help
We hope that you can join us on this journey. If you can donate, please do.
If you can’t, tell a friend or two … or ten. Share our story on Instagram, Twitter, and Facebook using the #lionsanduntoldstories but you can also send out emails and any other means you choose to communicate. Every share counts just as much as every dollar counts.

story:
Click here for English

 

 

 

MAGIC BERLIN: Der Stern

Werde Teil der Produktionsgemeinschaft von „Magic Berlin“, einer neuen, fantastischen Online Saga, die euch die Geheimnisse Berlins in einer modernen, interaktiven, transmedialen Story zeigt!

Berlin ist eine pulsierende und magische Stadt, für die sich nicht nur Berliner, sondern auch zahlreiche Zugezogene, Touristen und Millionen Menschen auf der Welt interessieren. Autorin Julia Heller hält die Magie und und das gewisse Etwas dieser Stadt in einer fantastischen Berliner Geschichte fest.  „Magic Berlin – Der Stern" ist der erste Teil einer Saga - charmant und fesselnd zugleich.

Das Innovative an "Magic Berlin" ist die von Anfang an konsequente multimediale Erzählweise im Blog-Format mit zahlreichen Interaktionsmöglichkeiten für das Publikum. Das ermöglicht euch, diese unterhaltsame Fantasy-Saga nicht nur als Leser zu genießen, sondern buchstäblich mitzuerleben und sogar zu beeinflussen.

Transmedial wird die urbane Fantasy-Saga „Magic Berlin“ mit Hilfe von Videos, Fotos und Foto-Geschichten sowie durch Podcasts, Audiobook, Musik, bildende Kunst, VLOG mit magischer Berichterstattung aus Berlin und später auch mit Rollenspiel .

Mit den Figuren der Geschichte und Community-Mitgliedern könnt ihr direkt über verschiedene Social-Media-Plattformen interagieren.

„Magic Berlin“ kreiert eine fantastische virtuelle Realität, von der ihr ein Teil werden könnt – und sie so zum Leben erweckt.

Die Story

„Magic Berlin“ ist zwar eine fiktive Geschichte, die das Berliner Leben jedoch mit einem herrlichen Touch magischen Realismus versieht. Lucia, die Protagonistin, ist eine normale, junge Frau. Als sie mit 27 Jahren lebensverändernde Ereignisse in Tübingen durchlebt, flieht sie nach Berlin, um sich selbst zu finden und ein neues Kapitel ihres Lebens in der multikulturellen deutschen Hauptstadt zu beginnen – und wird von Berlin mehr begeistert, berauscht und verführt, als sie jemals gedacht hätte.

Lucia begegnet ihrer magischen Vergangenheit, als sie auf ungewöhnliche Menschen aus der Berliner Heiden- und Magieszene trifft. So taucht sie in ein unkonventionelles, gefährliches und aufregendes Abenteuer ein, das von einer unerwarteten polyamorösen Liebesgeschichte mit LGBTQ-Facetten begleitet wird – so bunt wie Berlin selbst.

Während ihr Lucias Geschichte verfolgt, werdet ihr mit ihr fast vergessene, aber noch immer lebendige Glaubensrichtungen und -vorstellungen kennenlernen. Ihr werdet Zeuge von magischen und schamanischen Praktiken, die noch heute jeden Tag in Berlin im Geheimen stattfinden und die oft übersehene Welt der Berliner Heiden, der Magie und Legenden betreten.

Das Projekt

„Magic Berlin“ ist ein großes und ehrgeiziges Projekt, das wir in verschiedenen Phasen entwickeln. Unser Team aus Kreativen ist zusammen mit dem Projekt Stück für Stück gewachsen und wir sehen in „Magic Berlin“ auch eine Chance, neue Jobs für Kreativprofis zu schaffen.

Wir wollen dem deutschen Publikum und der internationalen Öffentlichkeit ein neuartiges Fantasy-Erlebnis bieten und gleichzeitig auf eine besondere und charmante Art und Weise eine Perspektive auf eine erstaunliche und bisher verborgene Seite von Berlin eröffnen.

Während wir „Magic Berlin“ voranbringen, wünschen wir uns, dass sich dieses Projekt von einer selbst geschaffenen und selbstbestimmten Zusammenarbeit von Schriftstellern, Schauspielern, Filmemachern, Musikern, Fotografen, Stylisten, und anderen Künstlern zu einer Gemeinschaft von Menschen weiterentwickelt, die eine aktive und entscheidende Rolle dabei spielen, die Geschichte zu erzählen, zu produzieren und zu verwirklichen.

Mit dieser Crowdfunding-Kampagne möchten wir die Finanzierung der Multimedia-Produktion des ersten Drittels des Buches „Magic Berlin - Der Stern“ sicherstellen.

Die „Magic Berlin“-Crew hat bereits Freizeit, Fähigkeiten und Eigenmittel investiert, um dieses großartige Projekt für euch zu realisieren. Und jetzt wünschen wir uns, dass ihr mitmacht – denn wir haben für euch eine der wichtigsten Rollen vorgesehen:

Wir laden euch ein, unserer „Magic Berlin“-Produktionsgemeinsschaft beizutreten. Wählt einfach eine der vielen spannenden Belohnungen aus, die wir für euch bereithalten. Unterstützt so unser Projekt und helft dabei, die fantastische Geschichte von „Magic Berlin“ zu erzählen.

Was genau soll gefördert werden?

Veröffentlichungsumfang: 6 Monate

Produktion: 5 Monate

Produktion der folgenden Medien:

  • 25 Romanszenen als Audiobook
  • 5 Kurzfilme im Serienformat
  • mind. 12 Fotoshootings & Foto-Storys
  • 10 Songs

 

Teilt diese Kampagne bitte auch mit euren Freunden und Familienmitgliedern, damit sie das magische Transmedia-Projekt „Magic Berlin“ kennenlernen und unterstützen können.

Wir danken euch vielmals und hoffen, euch bald in der Produktionsgemeinschaft von „Magic Berlin“ willkommen heißen zu dürfen.

 

Das Kernteam

Das „Magic Berlin“-Team besteht momentan aus 17 Personen, die vielfältige Rollen und Aufgaben erfüllen – jede*r leistet so viel wie möglich, abhängig vor allem vom Hauptjob und anderen Verpflichtungen. Wie in jedem großen Projekt gibt es ein Kernteam, das alles zusammenhält. Wir möchten euch diese drei Magic Berliner hier stellvertretend für das gesamte Team vorstellen!

Magic Berlinerin: Julia Heller

Julia Heller, Künstlerin und freiberuflicher Karrierecoach, ist die Initiatorin und Produzentin von „Magic Berlin“ und gleichzeitig Autorin der „Magic Berlin“-Saga. Sie glaubt an den Erfolg des Projekts und wird nie müde, die Dinge voranzutreiben.

Julia kreierte in einem Brainstorming gemeinsam mit ihrer guten Freundin und Künstlerkollegin Kristina Schippling, die bei „Magic Berlin“ unter anderem als Schauspielerin und Beraterin tätig ist, die Idee des transmedialen, also medienübergreifenden Webprojekts.

Neben der Leitung und der kontinuierlichen Bearbeitung von Inhalten übernimmt Julia in „Magic Berlin“ die Rolle der Protagonistin – „Lucia Schadland“ – und erfüllt sich mit dem Schauspielern einen Kindheitstraum.

Darüber hinaus hat sie große Freude daran, sich auf vielen Ebenen kunstvoll auszudrücken, z.B. tanzt und singt sie argentinischen Tango und liebt es zu zeichnen.  Sie ist als Mondprinzessin „Lia Hell“ Sängerin der Berliner Electropop-Band CLASH CLASH BANG BANG. Julia interessiert sich für Naturspiritualität, das Heidentum und Schamanismus und ist Teil mehrerer paganer Gruppen.

Magic Berliner: Aljoscha Belaschk

Josh, Musiker und multitalentierter Kreativer, ist seit Anfang an Teil des Teams und war schon in fast allen Abteilungen der Produktion tätig. Mittlerweile ist er hauptsächlich für die Tonproduktion und Musik verantwortlich, leitet, schneidet und assistiert aber auch in vielen anderen Bereichen. In der Geschichte verkörpert Josh den Schamanen „Göndlirson".

Zusammen mit Julia ist er Mitglied von CLASH CLASH BANG BANG und spielt dort Schlagzeug.

 

Magic Berlinerin: Lisa Birkholz

Lisa ist seit dem ersten Tag ein unersetzlicher Teil des inneren Teams. Seither zeichnet sie sich durch ihre Vielseitigkeit aus und ist auf zahlreichen Ebenen unverzichtbar – sei es Organisation, Location Scouting, Trailerproduktion, Details, Kostüm oder Maske. Mit ihrer herzlichen und verbindlichen Natur trägt sie viel dazu bei, den Teamgeist der Magic Berliner zu stärken. Als talentierte junge Fotografin ist sie als Projektleiterin für die Fotoabteilung bei „Magic Berlin“ verantwortlich. In der Geschichte verkörpert sie die Rolle von „Eris von Mylo“.

Alle Magic Berliner

Aljoscha Belaschk - Projektleiter Audio, Komponist, Schauspieler, Schnitt & Regie

Alina Mart - Fotografin, Pädagogin

Amber Michaele - Schauspielerin, Autorin, Tänzerin

Andreas Malert - Schauspieler, Rollenspieler

Bastian G. Godoy - Kameramann, Cinematrograph, Fotograf

Bastian Menschner - Webentwickler

Carsten Antvogel - Mediengestalter für Bild und Ton, Kameramann und VFX Artist, Cinematograph

Claudia Grottke - Schauspielerin

Domenica Kordys - Mediengestalterin für Bild und Ton, Kamerafrau, Cinematographin

Florian Gysin - Schauspieler, Musiker, Künstler

Horatio Hatter - Schauspieler, Model

Jei Radec - Schauspielerin VLOG, Pädagogin, Rollenspielerin

Julia Heller - Produzentin, Autorin, Schauspielerin, Sängerin, Karrierecoach

Kristina Schippling - Medienpädagogin, Schriftstellerin, Filmemacherin, Schauspielerin

Lisa Birkholz - Projektleiterin Foto/Bild, Fotografin, Schauspielerin

Lorfuin Daemon - Fotograf, Social Media Manager

Lou-Ise Grim - Künstlerin (Malerei, Musik, Schriftstellerei)

Lucia Schwarzgruber - Schamanin, Schauspielerin

Michael Maekkel - Schauspieler, Rollenspieler, Kultur- & Sozialanthropologe, Fachinformatiker

 

English!

 

 

MAGIC BERLIN: The Star

Join the production community of ‘Magic Berlin’, a new fantasy-filled adventure that shows the wonders of Berlin and how the characters experience them, in a modern tale that is told through interactive innovation

Berlin is truly a magical city that leaves millions wondering about its many special features. That is why, in ‘Magic Berlin – der Stern’, author Julia Heller writes a Berlin-infused charming and captivating tale that will become a multimedia, interactive and innovative blog-based experience that allows you to enjoy a unique and entertaining form of Berlin-staged fantastic fiction.

With a transmedia approach, this urban fantasy novel will be projected through videos, photos and photo stories, as well as through podcasts and music, and even painted art. It is also being designed to give you, the audience, the chance to interact with the characters and other community members through different social media platforms. In essence, ‘Magic Berlin’ is a story that builds a literally fantastic virtual reality that you become a part of – and that we’re now inviting you to help produce.

The Story

The story of ‘Magic Berlin’ is a true reflection of fiction imitating life with a delightful touch of magic realism.

Lucia, the protagonist, is a girl like so many others. At the age of 27, she flees to Berlin to find herself and start a new chapter of her life in the vibrant German capital – only to become more thrilled, intoxicated and seduced by Berlin than she ever thought she would be.

While many people come to Berlin to start over, Lucia’s story goes far beyond that common experience. She finds a magical past, as she meets unusual people from the Berlin pagan and magic scene, and she dives into a dangerous and soul-seeking adventure that is marked by an unexpected polyamorous love story with LGBTQ facets that are as colorful as Berlin.

In the process, as you follow Lucia’s story, you’ll learn about ancient traditions that are still practiced by a select few today. You’ll witness old magical and shamanic practices that are discretely held every day in Berlin. In short, more than just following Lucia’s journey, you enter the often overlooked world of Berlin’s magic, fantasy and legends.

The Project

‘Magic Berlin’ is a large and ambitious project which we plan to develop in different and progressive stages. Our team of creatives has been expanding as the project develops, and we are seeing many opportunities to bring along even more innovative professionals.

At the same time, we plan to bring a new work of fantastic fiction to the German audience, as well as to the international public, while we also take a different and charming way of introducing a new perspective of an amazing side of Berlin that almost no one knows.

As we take ‘Magic Berlin’ forward, we want it to evolve from a self-created and self-determined collaboration of writers, actors, filmmakers, musicians, photographers, stylists, artists of various professions into a wider community of people who take an active role in making it come true – throughout the different production stages.

As the ‘Magic Berlin’ crew and cast, we have been investing a large part of our spare time, skills, performance abilities and own funds to realize this great fiction project and bring it to you. And now we want you to join us – as we have saved one of the most important roles for you:

We invite you to join our ‘Magic Berlin’ production community by selecting one of the many exciting rewards that we are offering you here – this way supporting our project and helping to make it happen.

This crowdfunding campaign wishes to collect the funding the first third of book one – “Magic Berlin - Der Stern”.

Where the funding goes

Period of publication: 6 months

Production: 5 months

Production of the following media:

  • 25 novel scenes as audiobooks
  • 5 short films in serial format
  • At least 12 photo shootings & photo stories
  • 10 songs

We also invite you to share this campaign with your friends and family members who may also want to fund, feel and enjoy the charming fantastic story of ‘Magic Berlin’.

Thank you so much, and we hope to be soon welcoming you into the ‘Magic Berlin’ production community.

The Core Team

The Magic Berlin Team consists of round about 17 persons who fulfill many different roles and tasks – everybody contributes as much as they can, mostly depending of their daytime jobs and other important projects. As in every other big project there is a core team which is holding everything together. We want to introduce these three Magic Berliners to you!

Julia Heller

The artist and freelance career coach, Julia Heller, is the initiator and producer of “Magic Berlin” and author of the “Magic Berlin” story. She strongly believes in the success of the project and never grows tired of pushing things forward. Julia created the idea of “Magic Berlin” as a transmedia web project while brainstorming with her good friend and artist colleague, Kristina Schippling, who is also part of the project as an actress, adviser and with other tasks.

Besides leading, forming and constantly working on content for the project, Julia plays the protagonist of the story – "Lucia Schadland" – fulfilling herself a childhood dream with acting. She is also the singer of the Berlin electropop band, CLASH CLASH BANG BANG as Moon Princess “Lia Hell” and finds pleasure in expressing herself artfully on many levels, e.g. She dances and sings Argentinian Tango and loves to draw. Julia is interested in natural spirituality, paganism and shamanism and is part of several pagan groups.

Aljoscha Belaschk

Musician and multitalented creative, Josh is with the team since the beginning and has been involved in almost all departments of the production, helping it to evolve and grow. He is mainly responsible for audio production and music, but also directs, cuts and assists at many other stations. In the story Josh embodies the shaman, "Göndlirson".

Together with Julia, he is part of CLASH CLASH BANG BANG as the drummer.

Lisa Birkholz

Also an irreplaceable part of the inner team since day one is Lisa, who plays the role of "Eris von Mylo" as an actress in Magic Berlin and, as a talented young photographer and project manager, takes responsibility for the photo department of the project. Since the beginning, she has been distinguished by her versatility and is indispensable on numerous levels - be it organization, location scouting, trailer production, the look for details, costume and mask. With her warm and cordial nature, she contributes much to strengthen the team spirit of the Magic Berliner.

All Magic Berliner

Aljoscha Belaschk - audio Supervisor, composer, actor, editor & director

Alina Mart - photographer, teacher

Amber Michaele - actress, author, dancer

Andreas Malert - actor, role player

Lorfuin Daemon - photographer, social media manager

Lou-Ise Grim - artist (painting, music, writing)

Lucia Schwarzgruber - shaman, actress

Michael Maekkel - actor, rollers, cultural & social anthropologist, it-specialist
