story_txt:
Click here for English   MAGIC BERLIN: Der SternWerde Teil der Produktionsgemeinschaft von „Magic Berlin“, einer neuen, fantastischen Online Saga, die euch die Geheimnisse Berlins in einer modernen, interaktiven, transmedialen Story zeigt!Berlin ist eine pulsierende und magische Stadt, für die sich nicht nur Berliner, sondern auch zahlreiche Zugezogene, Touristen und Millionen Menschen auf der Welt interessieren. Autorin Julia Heller hält die Magie und und das gewisse Etwas dieser Stadt  in einer fantastischen Berliner Geschichte fest.  „Magic Berlin – Der Stern" ist der erste Teil einer Saga - charmant und fesselnd zugleich.Das Innovative an "Magic Berlin" ist die von Anfang an konsequente multimediale Erzählweise im Blog-Format mit zahlreichen Interaktionsmöglichkeiten für das Publikum. Das ermöglicht euch, diese unterhaltsame Fantasy-Saga nicht nur als Leser zu genießen, sondern buchstäblich mitzuerleben und sogar zu beeinflussen.Transmedial wird die urbane Fantasy-Saga „Magic Berlin“ mit Hilfe von Videos, Fotos und Foto-Geschichten sowie durch Podcasts, Audiobook, Musik, bildende Kunst, VLOG mit magischer Berichterstattung aus Berlin und später auch mit Rollenspiel .Mit den Figuren der Geschichte und Community-Mitgliedern könnt ihr direkt über verschiedene Social-Media-Plattformen interagieren.„Magic Berlin“ kreiert eine fantastische virtuelle Realität, von der ihr ein Teil werden könnt – und sie so zum Leben erweckt.Die Story
„Magic Berlin“ ist zwar eine fiktive Geschichte, die das Berliner Leben jedoch mit einem herrlichen Touch magischen Realismus versieht. Lucia, die Protagonistin, ist eine normale, junge Frau. Als sie mit 27 Jahren lebensverändernde Ereignisse in Tübingen durchlebt, flieht sie nach Berlin, um sich selbst zu finden und ein neues Kapitel ihres Lebens in der multikulturellen deutschen Hauptstadt zu beginnen – und wird von Berlin mehr begeistert, berauscht und verführt, als sie jemals gedacht hätte.Lucia begegnet ihrer magischen Vergangenheit, als sie auf ungewöhnliche Menschen aus der Berliner Heiden- und Magieszene trifft. So taucht sie in ein unkonventionelles, gefährliches und aufregendes Abenteuer ein, das von einer unerwarteten polyamorösen Liebesgeschichte mit LGBTQ-Facetten begleitet wird – so bunt wie Berlin selbst.Während ihr Lucias Geschichte verfolgt, werdet ihr mit ihr fast vergessene, aber noch immer lebendige Glaubensrichtungen und -vorstellungen kennenlernen. Ihr werdet Zeuge von magischen und schamanischen Praktiken, die noch heute jeden Tag in Berlin im Geheimen stattfinden und die oft übersehene Welt der Berliner Heiden, der Magie und Legenden betreten.Das Projekt„Magic Berlin“ ist ein großes und ehrgeiziges Projekt, das wir in verschiedenen Phasen entwickeln. Unser Team aus Kreativen ist zusammen mit dem Projekt Stück für Stück gewachsen und wir sehen in „Magic Berlin“ auch eine Chance, neue Jobs für Kreativprofis zu schaffen.Wir wollen dem deutschen Publikum und der internationalen Öffentlichkeit ein neuartiges Fantasy-Erlebnis bieten und gleichzeitig auf eine besondere und charmante Art und Weise eine Perspektive auf eine erstaunliche und bisher verborgene Seite von Berlin eröffnen.Während wir „Magic Berlin“ voranbringen, wünschen wir uns, dass sich dieses Projekt von einer selbst geschaffenen und selbstbestimmten Zusammenarbeit von Schriftstellern, Schauspielern, Filmemachern, Musikern, Fotografen, Stylisten, und anderen Künstlern zu einer Gemeinschaft von Menschen weiterentwickelt, die eine aktive und entscheidende Rolle dabei spielen, die Geschichte zu erzählen, zu produzieren und zu verwirklichen.Mit dieser Crowdfunding-Kampagne möchten wir die Finanzierung der Multimedia-Produktion des ersten Drittels des Buches „Magic Berlin - Der Stern“ sicherstellen.Die „Magic Berlin“-Crew hat bereits Freizeit, Fähigkeiten und Eigenmittel investiert, um dieses großartige Projekt für euch zu realisieren. Und jetzt wünschen wir uns, dass ihr mitmacht – denn wir haben für euch eine der wichtigsten Rollen vorgesehen:Wir laden euch ein, unserer „Magic Berlin“-Produktionsgemeinsschaft beizutreten. Wählt einfach eine der vielen spannenden Belohnungen aus, die wir für euch bereithalten. Unterstützt so unser Projekt und helft dabei, die fantastische Geschichte von „Magic Berlin“ zu erzählen.Was genau soll gefördert werden?
Veröffentlichungsumfang: 6 MonateProduktion: 5 MonateProduktion der folgenden Medien:
25 Romanszenen als Audiobook
5 Kurzfilme im Serienformat
mind. 12 Fotoshootings & Foto-Storys
10 Songs
 Teilt diese Kampagne bitte auch mit euren Freunden und Familienmitgliedern, damit sie das magische Transmedia-Projekt „Magic Berlin“ kennenlernen und unterstützen können.Wir danken euch vielmals und hoffen, euch bald in der Produktionsgemeinschaft von „Magic Berlin“ willkommen heißen zu dürfen. Das KernteamDas „Magic Berlin“-Team besteht momentan aus 17 Personen, die vielfältige Rollen und Aufgaben erfüllen – jede*r leistet so viel wie möglich, abhängig vor allem vom Hauptjob und anderen Verpflichtungen. Wie in jedem großen Projekt gibt es ein Kernteam, das alles zusammenhält. Wir möchten euch diese drei Magic Berliner hier stellvertretend für das gesamte Team vorstellen!
Magic Berlinerin: Julia HellerJulia Heller, Künstlerin und freiberuflicher Karrierecoach, ist die Initiatorin und Produzentin von „Magic Berlin“ und gleichzeitig Autorin der „Magic Berlin“-Saga. Sie glaubt an den Erfolg des Projekts und wird nie müde, die Dinge voranzutreiben.Julia kreierte in einem Brainstorming gemeinsam mit ihrer guten Freundin und Künstlerkollegin Kristina Schippling, die bei „Magic Berlin“ unter anderem als Schauspielerin und Beraterin tätig ist, die Idee des transmedialen, also medienübergreifenden Webprojekts.Neben der Leitung und der kontinuierlichen Bearbeitung von Inhalten übernimmt Julia in „Magic Berlin“ die Rolle der Protagonistin – „Lucia Schadland“ – und erfüllt sich mit dem Schauspielern einen Kindheitstraum.Darüber hinaus hat sie große Freude daran, sich auf vielen Ebenen kunstvoll auszudrücken, z.B. tanzt und singt sie argentinischen Tango und liebt es zu zeichnen.  Sie ist als Mondprinzessin „Lia Hell“ Sängerin der Berliner Electropop-Band CLASH CLASH BANG BANG. Julia interessiert sich für Naturspiritualität, das Heidentum und Schamanismus und ist Teil mehrerer paganer Gruppen.
Magic Berliner: Aljoscha BelaschkJosh, Musiker und multitalentierter Kreativer, ist seit Anfang an Teil des Teams und war schon in fast allen Abteilungen der Produktion tätig. Mittlerweile ist er hauptsächlich für die Tonproduktion und Musik verantwortlich, leitet, schneidet und assistiert aber auch in vielen anderen Bereichen. In der Geschichte verkörpert Josh den Schamanen „Göndlirson".Zusammen mit Julia ist er Mitglied von CLASH CLASH BANG BANG und spielt dort Schlagzeug. Magic Berlinerin: Lisa BirkholzLisa ist seit dem ersten Tag ein unersetzlicher Teil des inneren Teams. Seither zeichnet sie sich durch ihre Vielseitigkeit aus und ist auf zahlreichen Ebenen unverzichtbar – sei es Organisation, Location Scouting, Trailerproduktion, Details, Kostüm oder Maske. Mit ihrer herzlichen und verbindlichen Natur trägt sie viel dazu bei, den Teamgeist der Magic Berliner zu stärken. Als talentierte junge Fotografin ist sie als Projektleiterin für die Fotoabteilung bei „Magic Berlin“ verantwortlich. In der Geschichte verkörpert sie die Rolle von „Eris von Mylo“.Alle Magic BerlinerAljoscha Belaschk - Projektleiter Audio, Komponist, Schauspieler, Schnitt & RegieAlina Mart - Fotografin, PädagoginAmber Michaele - Schauspielerin, Autorin, TänzerinAndreas Malert - Schauspieler, RollenspielerBastian G. story:
Srinath's Story of Poetry
Srinath has been a poet since being a child of Mother Earth. He was blessed to be a conduit for writing 365 love poems to the Divine Mother and now publishing them and writing some new ones on a blog as well as in a e-book and/or paper book. The purpose of the project is to inspire the restoration of the Universal Motherhood within and without.
Give and Take!
All donations received for this project support the basic costs of sustaining the body while writing the blog, e-book, and/or paper book. This project has no time frame on it. Look to the right to see what you can take, if you give! %5 will go to Indie Go Go to pay for the %5 processing fees for hosting this.

The Impact of Restoring Poetry Within Blog and Book...
Poems are thoughts. Thoughts are things. Loving and devotional thoughts expressed as poetry prayers to Mother Earth purify the mind and atmosphere with positive vibrations. May this serve life. This project is subject to the law of change, to best serve the  whole. Compassion has no rules. We humbly offer all of these poems & actions to The Divine Mother & Earth.
May all beings in all the worlds be peaceful and happy!

story:
Taking inspiration from Rainer Maria Rilke's Letters to a Young Poet, Phyllis Chesler's Letters to a Young Feminist, and Art on Paper's Letters to a Young Artist, I am working to create a collection of essays titled Feminist Advice from the City of Broad Shoulders. I'm an artist, educator, and activist who has been living in Chicago for the last ten years, and have been teaching printmaking at the City College since 2010.

I am vigilant about creating safe spaces in my classroom for honest, and sometimes difficult, conversations.  I found that when I became more vocal about my struggles with patriarchal society and the problems inherent in my position as a part time adjunct college instructor, my students, both men and women, opened up and began having conversations about their personal struggles in school and in life. 

I am a member of the feminist art collective Tracers, and have participated in numerous workshops and panel discussions, often speaking about my interest in the democratic nature of printmaking, most recently at the Museum of Contemporary Art in Chicago, Columbia College, University of Illinois in Chicago, and New York University in Florence, Italy. Along with two friends, I helped reactivate the feminist guerrilla theater group WITCH this past November.



My own essay, which will be edited for this publication, was originally part of a catalog that corresponded with an exhibition at the Franklin, titled Finocchio, that "Introduce[d] a physical and visual dialog regarding how diversity has become defined as the queer, and how this impacts the materiality and plasticity of self-identity and engagement across conceptual forms of expression." You can read the accompanying essays here.

The collection of essays will be professionally designed and printed.  All of the money (minus production costs) collected from the crowd funding campaign will be equally distributed between the writers. The writers, titans in their respective fields, have agreed to begin writing with the promise of a paltry sum of $75 (and the hopes of more through this crowd funding).  For comparison, most writers are paid approximately $300 - $500 for an essay of this length.  They have agreed to participate because, like me, they see the value in this publication and trust that others will also see the need and help support it.

In addition to paying the writers for their valuable time, funds will be used to pay for a copy editor, book designer, all printing costs, and to cover fees from this crowd funding campaign.

Though my original essay, which discusses how my inability to stay quiet in the face of negative behaviors affects both myself and those around me, was intended for an audience of artists, I hope it contains insight for a variety of readers. My goal is that by connecting writers of different experiences and different audiences, the book has a broad appeal and speaks to the intersectional nature of feminism.  


_________________________________________________________________________

The strength of this project rests in gathering a diverse group that encompasses people of all disciplines, genders, sexual preferences, races, and levels of ability. The completed book will contain approximately twenty essays, and the following writers have agreed to contribute to the project (with more TBA):

Meredith Adams-Smart, writer and design researcher at IDEO 

Charlene Carruthers, writer, community organizer, and national director of Black Youth Project 100

Leslie Deckard, musician and editor-in-chief of Rascal

Alexandria Eregbu, artist, curator, and performer

Sarah Frier, board member of Girls Rock! Chicago 

Chiara Galimberti, artist and activist, cofounder of the re-imagination of WITCH

Scott Hunter, arts advocate, curator, and professor of psychology at the University of Chicago

Tanuja Jagernauth, artist, healing justice practictioner, and founding member of Sage Community Health Collective 

Sharlene King, designer at Morningstar and Programming Director for AIGA Chicago

Stephanie Graham and Maya Mackrandilal, artists working collaboratively through their ongoing trans-media project #NewGlobalMatriarchy

Tess Raser, activist and member of Assata's Daughters

Jennifer Reeder, feminist filmmaker and founder of Tracers

Jes Skolnik, community organizer, musician, and writer

Vanessa Sheridan, author and Director of Trans Relations and Community Engagement at the Center on Halsted

Sydney Stoudmire, director of Woman Made Gallery

Christen Thomas, musician and talent buyer

Monica Trinidad, activist and cofounder of Brown and Proud Press 

Benita Ulisano, founder of the Clinic Vest Project

Latham Zearfross, artist and cofounder of Chances Dances

_________________________________________________________________________

In addition to my ETERNAL GRATITUDE, in exchange for your support a number of perks are available, including various forms of rad feminist swag.  

For a $25 donation, you get the book, plus a glitter "ASK ME ABOUT MY FEMINIST AGENDA" button.  Smash the patriarchy with sparkles.


For a $30 donation, you get the book, plus a 6 inch by 10 inch "FEMINIST KILLJOY" patch: white ink on black fabric and perfect for adding to a jacket or waving as a miniature flag.


For a $30 donation, you get the book, plus "FEMINIST AS F#CK" coozie: sparkling silver ink on black.  Perfect for keeping your beer or sparkling water cool while you fight the patriarchy. 


For a $35 donation, you get the book, plus a "FEMINIST AS FUCK" hand embroidered hoop: limited to five, these loops are handmade by Tanuja Jagernauth and each is unique.


For a $40 donation, you get the book, plus a "FEMINIST" tote bag: dark grey ink on natural cotton.  Perfect for carrying all of your feminist books and your lunch.


For a $200 donation, you get the book, a button, a patch, a tote bag, and your name printed as a special thank you in the acknowledgments section of the book. A donation at this level will ensure that writers are adequately paid for their hard work and you will feel the pure bliss of knowing you did your part to help smash the patriarchy. 


_________________________________________________________________________

As an adjunct instructor, I personally understand the hardship of fully supporting a project ideologically, but being unable to fiscally contribute and I am truly grateful for any support, so PLEASE SHARE.

story:
“Tough times don’t last, tough people do.”  

 

This was a quote I heard in the middle of one of the most tumultuous times of my life.  Within one month, I lost two relatives on the same day, became officially divorced, battled my mother’s hospital scare, and almost lost my mind!  It was during this period, however, I gained hope through a spiritual journey that I can now say was necessary to reset the course of my life.

During the storm, I began writing this book and it has helped to heal me.  In it, I detail the journey from the early days of my faith walk to the more loving part of the journey I am on now.  It is an authentic representation of both the good and bad choices I have made as a result of issues I’ve had with my biological father and how they have impacted three romantic relationships, and my spiritual walk.  

My hope is to help others find their own path of healing and releasing the sense of isolation that anyone who has experienced such loss often feels.  Whether you are able to give to this campaign or to share it with family, friends, and others, I am humbled by your support. 

 

 

Here is where your contributions will go:  

  • Overall graphic design $500 
  • Insurance, legal fees $500
  • Manuscript Editing $3,000
  • Publishing $14,750
  • Print 250 copies $5,000 
  • Crowdfunding fees (5%) + Credit card fees (3%) $1,250
  • TOTAL: $25,000
 

Perks Include: 

  • Exclusive preview of ebook while it is in the publishing phase.
  • Signed copies of the book and/or audiobook. 
  • Access to the author to discuss topics covered in the book.
 

Making Your Impact

With your assistance, we will help provide hope to many people who have faced similar issues that are covered in the book.  Once I opened up to others about my experience to others, I learned that I was not alone in my struggle.  Like me, there were people who had experienced a divorce as a result of abandonment.  Like me, there were times where life felt more like a sink than a swim situation.  Like me, there were issues in my family that impacted my faith and ability to relate to others.  The value of your contribution exceeds any perk I could offer.

 

Challenges 

Although the manuscript is complete, one obstacle will be in the actual publishing process.  After the campaign closes, I will forward the manuscript to the editors and begin the publishing process no later than January 1, 2017.  There will be an estimated timeline of three to four months.  As such, you may receive the perks in advance of the delivery date, but my hope is to make all perks accessible to you no later than Father’s Day 2017.

 

Share the Campaign, Share the Story 

Feel free to advertise the campaign to all who could benefit from this story of hope.  Please share the campaign by word of mouth or through any of the links at the top of the page including Facebook, Twitter, email, etc.

story:
• My name is Carlos Jiménez Flores. I am a storyteller. It is important for me to keep the art of storytelling alive. Whether it be through poetry, music, song, art, photography, novels, film, etc. I published my first book of poetry in 2004. Since then, I have published a total of seven books of poetry. I have also published two books of photography. I entered the film industry in 2008. Since then, I have written, directed and/or produced twelve feature films. 

    For this project, I have teamed up with another writer, Luis Martínez, a retired Chicago police officer who has published two books of short stories. After serving and protecting our community for two decades, Luis has entered the next chapter of his life sharing his knowledge and experience with students at the college level as a professor. He is also dedicating time to writing. He is the perfect writing partner in this project because he brings the realism of a criminal investigation into the story, as well as his uncanny storytelling skills.
     
  • Stronger Than the Devil has already been written. The novel is in the final editing phase right now. This project is important to us because it marks the beginning of a journey that sets us on a path to continue to create more work. 
     
  • This is the first of many novels to come. What you are helping us achieve by contributing to our campaign is a dream realized. Luis and I have always wanted to write a novel. We felt that by teaming up, we would create the best story possible. By assisting us with our goal, you will be the first to support and see our dream to fruition. 

What We Need & What You Get

  • We need $5000. This money will go to hiring a graphic designer to create the cover, the bulk will go toward the printing of the book, and finally, marketing.
     
  • We have many perks! 



     
  • THESE ARE MY BOOKS OF POETRY: From the Other Side of the Tracks, Ghetto Faith, One Percent, La Sombra en Agosto, Bliss Eternal, Two Oranges on a Lemon Tree, Clover.

    $20 - choose one of my poetry books.
    $30 - choose two of my poetry books.
    $40 - choose three of my poetry books.
    $50 - choose four of my poetry books.
    $60 - choose five of my poetry books.
    $70 - choose six of my poetry books.
    $80 - choose the entire collection of my poetry books.

                               

    $50 - get my book of photography, CUBA'S CLASSIC CARS. 150 pages of classic American cars taken in Cuba. It is a great coffee table book. All pictures in black and white. Take a nostalgic trip before the 1960s to a time when American cars ruled the road. 

    $100 - All of my books of poetry and the book of photography.

        

    $50 - a copy of STRONGER THAN THE DEVIL

    $125 - a copy of STRONGER THAN THE DEVIL and all of my books of poetry.

    $150 - a copy of STRONGER THAN THE DEVIL, all of my books of poetry and my book of photography.
     
  • If we don't reach our goal of $5000, then we will focus on getting the cover made and printing as many copies as we can of the book. We would then concentrate on strictly word of mouth and free social media (Facebook, Twitter, Instagram) for our marketing.

Other Ways You Can Help

  • We understand that not everyone can contribute financially. However, there are other ways to contribute! Help to spread the word about this campaign, about our perks, about our goal. Every dollar counts, even if it's not coming from your pocket. By spreading the word, someone else will contribute monetarily and that wouldn't be possible without you. We appreciate you!

       
     
  • Indiegogo has great share tools for social media! Please help us spread the word by using them. Thank you

story:
Falling Light and Waters Turning: Adventures in Being Human in Word and Image

is the memoir of our mother, Mary North Allen.  We, Katy, Tom, & David Allen are her children.

When she died in 2011 she left several drafts of each chapter.  Katy, a published author herself, has spent the last three years editing Mary's drafts into a finished 250 page text, integrated with more than 200 photographs.  We are asking you to help us bring it to publication.

Go to Bottom of Page for More Background Information and sample photos.

Go to www.fallinglightwatersturning.com for a sneak preview of the book.


Why might you want to help?

If you are family or friend of Mary, you know she led an unusual, surprising, and very ordinary life; and you have seen her beautiful photography. 

At some point between 1985 and her death you likely heard her talking about this book with which she worked and played for so long. 

We are excited to see what we know will be the beautiful and moving finished product of her countless hours of writing. We know many of you will be excited to know that gestation is almost done; in a very few weeks the book will be birthed. 

If you never knew Mary North Allen, we hope the book's subtitle,  Adventures in Being Human in Word and Image, will entice you to continue reading.

"Within the pages of this gently beautiful book you wiill find strength and wisdom, delight and joy, courage and inspiration—the story of one human being claiming and reclaiming her uniqueness, her individuality, and her soul. It is a story that belongs to us all."  From the Acknowledgements by editor Katy Z. Allen.

Find more of the story of Mary North Allen and the book at the bottom of the page.


$12,500

is the investment needed to bring the boxes of completed & printed books into our homes, ready to hand or mail to you. 
$4,000 for our Partnership , with storytrust.com, a small highly professional family history company.  They bring 20 years experience working with families to preserve a slice of family history using text, photography, audio and/or video.
$4,250 for publication quality scanning and preparation of 250 photographs, and Story Trust expertise to insert the photos into the page layout in precisely the most powerful spot on the page.
$4,250 for hard bound coffee table quality publication of the first 250 copies of the book.

"The Depression had begun. Men losing vast sums of money were jumping out of 40th story windows...

Money must be very dangerous stuff. Better not to have any at all."

                                                                                               --MNA, age 10. From the book


Go to www.fallinglightwatersturning.com for a sneak preview of the book.


How Can I Help? 
  • If you have grown into the 21st century, give this campaign a "shout out" on your Facebook page, your Twitter account, and all the other Social Media in which you participate.  There is a link somewhere on this site that makes it easy to do that.
  • Forward this information to everyone on your email list.
  • If you are like our Grandfather who died in 1943 still steadfastly refusing to learn how to drive a car, use the U.S. Mail, or your telephone.
  • Do you know a librarian, a mental health professional or advocate, an early childhood professional, a photographer, an artist, a nature lover, a poet or writer, an English teacher, an independent book store?  They will find much that resonates, touches a special place in their heart, keeps them from putting the book down once they open it up.
  • Do you have friends or "connections" to the media.  Send us a note if someone is interested in sharing the news of this book through the media.
  • Order the book.  It's at the top of the list of Perks.
  • If you have the means, choose one of the other Perks and give us an extra boost toward our goal.  We will add your name to the list of additional acknowledgements we slip under the cover of each copy of the book. 

What Are the Risks or Challenges?

There are no risks for you as a supporter.  The train has left the station and this book will be ready to deliver to you by the end of July at the latest.  We have considerable faith in the recognizable value of our mother's work, and  your interest and generosity in supporting it.  We are confident that with your help in spreading the word, any risk of not meeting our goal is minimal.


The Back Story Continued...

Mary's father Arthur North was the original Adventure Tour Guide.  Her childhood was filled with adventures from the nearby Adirondack Mountains to the Colorado River, Lapland, Mexico and New Zealand. 

These childhood adventures co- existed uneasily with an overdose of Victorian sternness and propriety.  In this memoir she brings the reader into the adventure, exploration, propriety, and tensions of her childhood.  

At age 10 her detail rich account of one adventure, a 300 mile journey by rowboat down the Colorado river, was published by G.P. Putnam's Sons.  What in other circumstances might have launched a life of writing instead blocked her writing for half a century.

                          

Her curiosity and need to express the intricacies and beauties of a world seen with sharp eyes and unending imagination never ceased.  At age 40 she returned to photography, an art she had tinkered with in college. 

She spent the next 40 years of her life capturing the unnoticed beauties and contradictions of light, shadow, and color, simultaneously using this art as the means of both expressing and sorting through the competing forces of her childhood morphed into the struggles of her adult life.

                                                                                                                 

Twenty years success doing and teaching photography gave her the confidence to once again set pen to paper.  She began to write this memoir.  But the old ghosts still haunted her: it was one thing to write, another to accept the writing as "good enough" to close the book.

So she left six to twenty versions of each of ten chapters when she died.  Katy Allen has painstakingly sorted through all the versions and pulled together what she concluded was closest in our Mother's mind to a finished product.  

                   

Mary was clear that the finished book would combine text and photography. She was emphatically clear that the photographs were not to illustrate the text: they were to tell the same story in images rather than words.  The photographs are parallel, not supplementary.

Since childhood we have known the artistry of her camera.  After reading and rereading her poetry and prose for the last years we have quickly come to know it holds its place as partner and parallel to her photography.  We are confident you will find your own pleasures and rewards in this important volume.
story_txt:
Falling Light and Waters Turning: Adventures in Being Human in Word and Image is the memoir of our mother, Mary North Allen.  We, Katy, Tom, & David Allen are her children.
When she died in 2011 she left several drafts of each chapter.  Katy, a published author herself, has spent the last three years editing Mary's drafts into a finished 250 page text, integrated with more than 200 photographs.  We are asking you to help us bring it to publication.
Go to Bottom of Page for More Background Information and sample photos.
Go to www.fallinglightwatersturning.com for a sneak preview of the book.


Why might you want to help?





If you are family or friend of Mary, you know she led an unusual,
surprising, and very ordinary life; and you have seen her beautiful photography.

story:
Hello and welcome to my campaign!

I am Rebecca K. Kveton, a licensed professional counselor, a certified professional coach and a corporate trainer, in Houston, Texas. I have provided training for some of the world’s largest companies including Boeing, Total, Shell, Fluor, Exxon Mobile, Rockwell Collins, and more. I am also a visual artist and past board member of WIVLA, Women in the Visual and Literary Arts. I enjoy spending time with my spouse, daughter, grandchildren, and great grandchildren.

This campaign aims to fund Money Drama, a how-to book that can significantly help people overcome the emotional stress and pain they feel around money—and break the barriers that hold them back from making their dreams come true. 

The great American Dale Carnegie wrote, “When dealing with people, remember you are not dealing with creatures of logic, but creatures of emotions.” This is especially true when it comes to financial issues that are causing a lot of stress among Americans today. In a 2015 survey by StressinAmerica.org, 72% of respondents reported feeling stressed about their finances. And of all the elements that stressed them most, money topped the list.

I am also a “creature of emotion”—something  I discovered dealing with my own financial dilemmas as well as those experienced by family, friends, and clients. Emotions have the negative power to cause inner turmoil, chaos, and craziness in our daily lives. 

As a result of my personal financial pain and my experience as a therapist, coach, and trainer, I want to help people overcome their gloomy and scary emotions connected to money.

Money Drama is a must read because it links emotions of fear, anxiety, anger, depression, grief and shame to personal financial struggles. Without making the connection that emotions are tied to money problems, a person can feel powerless and without choices.

Every chapter breaks through once-sacred beliefs using insightful exercises such as What is Your Money Drama Personality Quiz, the Tissue Exercise, the Stop It Exercise, and more. Each exercise is designed to free people emotionally from their own money dramas.

What We Need & What You Get

To give Money Drama the momentum it needs to help people, I am asking for $35,000 to cover the completion of the book cover, editing, layout and design, printing, distribution, and marketing costs. Because I am self-publishing and distributing the book myself, I need a website for distribution, sales, and exposure. And last but not least is help with marketing, and a marketing coach.

If this campaign doesn’t bring in $35,000, I will work with what does comes to me with gratitude and also consider launching a follow-up campaign. I’m determine to publish no matter what! 

When you donate, you’ll receive some fun and creative perks such as a few lines of inspiration from the book to your email for a $25.00 donation and for $50.00 I will send you a personal invitation to my first book signing and for $100.00 a Money Drama T-shirt reading, I am a Money Drama King or Queen. Pick a perk that makes you happy or sing or just smile as a philanthropist of Money Drama.

The Impact of Money Drama

If you were gifted with a greater understanding of how your emotions affect your finances, imagine how much stronger your choices and coping skills would be. Truth is power. Money Drama creates awareness of money as an unhealthy trigger and then provides the initial competence to get emotions under control. Being a philanthropist of Money Drama means making a difference in freeing people from their money worries. 

Risks & Challenges

I have faced dozens of challenges in my life and overcome them, including earning degrees that allow me to work as a counselor, coach, and trainer. Example stories about my challenges are shared in Money Drama. With this campaign, I’m once again stretching beyond my comfort zone to help others. Based on past successes, I know I have the strength and persistence to make this venture successful. 

Other Ways You Can Help

In addition to donations, I appreciate your spreading the message about this campaign.  Shout it from the rooftops via your social media and through Indiegogo share tools.  Email your friends today and ask for their assistance in publishing Money Drama. I am sincerely grateful for your support.

Love, Rebecca

story:
FILCAR (International Book Fair of the Caribbean), opens once a year in Margarita Island.

This book fair is the most important cultural event of the island, FILCAR is the only event that offers free entrance to conferences, lectures, and workshops related with writing, reading, editing and design, including a special hall for children.  

During 9 days, children from public schools and poor families have the opportunity, some for the first time, of getting in touch with the pleasure of reading and listening to lectures and conferences about poetry, narrative, journalism, design and alternative editing.

More than 60 writers, coming from all the country as well as 6 international writers, volunteer to give lectures, but this time with an economic crises, that includes an inflation of 1,000%, we are struggling to make the fair possible.

With your contribution we hope to continue this important social enterprise that covers a population of 400,000 people in the island, as well as people that come from the rest of the country to feed with culture, in a country devastated by violence. 

FILCAR 2017

When: March 11-19, 2017

Where: Margarita Island, Venezuela

 

What we need 

We are asking for US$ 10,000. 

Your donation will directly impact access to literature in Venezuela. Funds will go to support conferences, lectures, and workshops given during nine days at the book fair, starting on March 11, 2017.   

You can give a tax-deductible donation today! We are a non-profit organization (501c3).

With every $25 you are contributing to pay:

  • Transportation for 50 students to the fair.
  • A hotel night for a writer.
  • Participation of an alternative editorial in the fair.
  • A children's workshop facilitator.

 

Impact 

We have had in the past editions of FILCAR more than 5,000 people daily in the fair, which proves the need of cultural products in this island, dedicated normally to tourism. 

 

Everyone can help 

Even a dollar helps. Also, we need your support to spread the word. Share our campaign in social media. Help us to keep bringing culture to Margarita Island.

story:
A Pós democracia em Portugal

Um novo rumo estratégico para Portugal e a Pós Democracia.

 

Caro Amigo

Vou lançar o meu primeiro livro: “A Pós Democracia em Portugal” através da prestigiada Chiado Editora. De forma a facilitar a compra, decidi fazer esta plataforma para receber encomendas, conto contigo.

Este livro colheu de uma tão prestigiada editora uma proposta de edição, publicação e distribuição para Portugal e Brasil, de imediato.

Pré comprando o livro, estarás a apoiar-me de várias formas, principalmente na demonstração junto da editora Chiado, quanto à minha capacidade de cumprir com o desígnio da sua divulgação e venda como pré requisito contratual.

Se conseguir vender as 3.000 cópias permite a sua tradução e divulgação internacional. Na Espanha, Irlanda, Inglaterra e EUA.

Sei que muitos de vós ficarão curiosos o suficiente para quererem contribuir adquirindo  exemplares. Os que quiserem e recebe-los com uma dedicatória personalizada que nele vos farei.

Se preferirem encomenda-lo de outra forma, contactem-me por : Facebook, E-mail ou Telefone.

Conhecer o conteúdo logo que o livro seja lançado, recebendo-o por correio ou levantando-o numa das apresentações que ocorrerão em várias localidades.

Enviar-te-ei em conjunto, um ou mais convites para o seu lançamento com a possibilidade de escolheres a localidade onde pretendes assistir à sua apresentação, dentro das disponíveis decididas em conjunto com a Chiado Editora.

A obra será distribuída em livrarias por todo o país em Portugal, ficando igualmente disponível no Brasil, em qualquer loja da rede de livrarias Cultura - a maior rede livreira do Brasil  

A obra será também publicada em eBook, no formato ePub, O eBook estará disponível no site da Chiado Editora, na Apple iBookstore, Barnes & Noble, Sony, Kobo, Diesel ebook Store e Baker & Taylor.

A sessão de lançamento da obra e início de distribuição e destaque em várias livrarias, nomeadamente na CHIADO em Lisboa, está agendada para dentro de cerca de 90 dias a contar desta data.

Assim, pré encomendando já, poderei ter tempo para fazer a dedicatória pensada e bem dedicada junto das pessoas que estimo e que sei que me estimam.

Agradeço também que a divulgação junto de quem consideres poder ter interesse usando o link  https://igg.me/at/aposdemocracia e através dos meios que sentires serem-me úteis na sua divulgação.

 

Sobre o livro:

“A Pós Democracia em Portugal” – Nova abordagem estratégica para Portugal e a Pós Democracia

Trata-se de um livro de cariz político e tem como propósito lançar ideias novas, fora do quadrado, que visam serem soluções para diversos problemas e constrangimentos que existem e subsistem na sociedade portuguesa. Acessíveis e exequíveis, assim o queiram os cidadãos e decisores, que podem potencialmente conduzir Portugal a outro devir económico e social para toda a população.

Ideias de ruptura, mas também de construção, pois como um dia disse Bukminster Fuller: “a melhor forma de contestar contra algo, situação ou disfunção, é criar um modelo alternativo que torne o anterior obsoleto”,

Tento apresentar soluções, criar uma outra realidade claramente possível e acessível aos Portugueses em seu benefício em muitos domínios das suas vidas.

Pedi a amigos e conhecidos meus, ilustres na política: Marcelo Rebelo de Sousa, Paulo Rangel, Jorge Campos e Ilda Figueiredo que me concedessem a honra de o prefaciar. Não obtive ainda as suas respostas mas ficarei honrado com as suas participações caso venham a ocorrer. Principalmente por serem pessoas oriundas de vários partidos políticos e ideologias diferentes poderão com isso potenciar e enriquecer o conteúdo e seu potencial alcance e, in extremis, realização.

Cópia da mensagem recebida da editora:

Caro Rui Sequeira,

Antes de mais, em nome da Chiado Editora, agradeço-lhe a oportunidade que nos concedeu para analisar os seus originais. Após a análise foi escolhida a obra "Após Democracia em Portugal".

A sua obra possui uma escrita fluída e está muito bem estruturada, o que nos leva a acreditar no seu potencial editorial. Assim sendo, temos a seguinte Proposta de Edição para lhe apresentar:

A Chiado Editora editará o seu Original em Livro e eBook em Portugal e também no Brasil.

O Preço de Venda ao Público da obra será de 11 euros em Portugal e 44 reais no Brasil.

A obra será distribuída em livrarias por todo o país em Portugal, ficando igualmente disponível no Brasil, através de encomenda em qualquer loja da rede de livrarias Cultura - a maior rede livreira do Brasil  

A obra será também publicada em eBook, no formato ePub, com o preço de 3€. O eBook estará disponível no site da Chiado Editora, na Apple iBookstore, Barnes & Noble, Sony, Kobo, Diesel ebook Store e Baker & Taylor.

A Chiado Editora organiza também o lançamento público da obra. .

O design e impressão de convites e cartazes para promoção e divulgação do lançamento da obra são a cargo da Chiado Editora.

No mês de lançamento a obra ficará também em destaque na Livraria Chiado, na Avenida da Liberdade, em Lisboa.

Se o número total de exemplares vendidos em Portugal e no Brasil atingir os 3.000, a obra será traduzida para espanhol (castelhano), e editada e distribuída em Espanha através da Chiado Editorial e, também, traduzida para inglês e editada e distribuída em Inglaterra, Irlanda e E.U.A. através da Chiado Publishing.

Eu serei a sua Editora e interlocutora durante todo o processo de edição da obra. Após a obra estar pronta, a Chiado Editora irá disponibilizar-lhe um Assessor de Comunicação que estará à sua disposição para marcação de eventos, tratar de convites, cartazes, contactos com a comunicação social, etc… 

Sinta-se à vontade para colocar alguma dúvida ou questão.

Despeço-me aguardando a sua resposta positiva para que possamos prosseguir a edição desta obra.

Com os melhores cumprimentos,
Rita Costa
Executive Editor

Avenida da Liberdade, Palácio Lambertini, N.º 166, 1.º Andar, 1250 - 146 Lisboa, Portugal

Vou lançar o meu primeiro livro: “A Pós Democracia em Portugal” através da prestigiada Chiado Editora. De forma a facilitar a compra, decidi fazer esta plataforma para receber encomendas, conto contigo.
Este livro colheu de uma tão prestigiada editora uma proposta de edição, publicação e distribuição para Portugal e Brasil, de imediato.
Pré comprando o livro, estarás a apoiar-me de várias formas, principalmente na demonstração junto da editora Chiado, quanto à minha capacidade de cumprir com o desígnio da sua divulgação e venda como pré requisito contratual.
Se conseguir vender as 3.000 cópias permite a sua tradução e divulgação internacional. Na Espanha, Irlanda, Inglaterra e EUA.
Sei que muitos de vós ficarão curiosos o suficiente para quererem contribuir adquirindo  exemplares. Os que quiserem e recebe-los com uma dedicatória personalizada que nele vos farei.
Se preferirem encomenda-lo de outra forma, contactem-me por : Facebook, E-mail ou Telefone.
Conhecer o conteúdo logo que o livro seja lançado, recebendo-o por correio ou levantando-o numa das apresentações que ocorrerão em várias localidades.
Enviar-te-ei em conjunto, um ou mais convites para o seu lançamento com a possibilidade de escolheres a localidade onde pretendes assistir à sua apresentação, dentro das disponíveis decididas em conjunto com a Chiado Editora.
A obra será distribuída em livrarias por todo o país em Portugal, ficando igualmente disponível no Brasil, em qualquer loja da rede de livrarias Cultura - a maior rede livreira do Brasil  
A obra será também publicada em eBook, no formato ePub, O eBook estará disponível no site da Chiado Editora, na Apple iBookstore, Barnes & Noble, Sony, Kobo, Diesel ebook Store e Baker & Taylor.
A sessão de lançamento da obra e início de distribuição e destaque em várias livrarias, nomeadamente na CHIADO em Lisboa, está agendada para dentro de cerca de 90 dias a contar desta data.
Assim, pré encomendando já, poderei ter tempo para fazer a dedicatória pensada e bem dedicada junto das pessoas que estimo e que sei que me estimam.
Agradeço também que a divulgação junto de quem consideres poder ter interesse usando o link  https://igg.me/at/aposdemocracia e através dos meios que sentires serem-me úteis na sua divulgação.
 
Sobre o livro:
“A Pós Democracia em Portugal” – Nova abordagem estratégica para Portugal e a Pós Democracia
Trata-se de um livro de cariz político e tem como propósito lançar ideias novas, fora do quadrado, que visam serem soluções para diversos problemas e constrangimentos que existem e subsistem na sociedade portuguesa. Acessíveis e exequíveis, assim o queiram os cidadãos e decisores, que podem potencialmente conduzir Portugal a outro devir económico e social para toda a população.
Ideias de ruptura, mas também de construção, pois como um dia disse Bukminster Fuller: “a melhor forma de contestar contra algo, situação ou disfunção, é criar um modelo alternativo que torne o anterior obsoleto”,
Tento apresentar soluções, criar uma outra realidade claramente possível e acessível aos Portugueses em seu benefício em muitos domínios das suas vidas.
Pedi a amigos e conhecidos meus, ilustres na política: Marcelo Rebelo de Sousa, Paulo Rangel, Jorge Campos e Ilda Figueiredo que me concedessem a honra de o prefaciar. Não obtive ainda as suas respostas mas ficarei honrado com as suas participações caso venham a ocorrer. Principalmente por serem pessoas oriundas de vários partidos políticos e ideologias diferentes poderão com isso potenciar e enriquecer o conteúdo e seu potencial alcance e, in extremis, realização.
Cópia da mensagem recebida da editora:
Caro Rui Sequeira,
Antes de mais, em nome da Chiado Editora, agradeço-lhe a oportunidade que nos concedeu para analisar os seus originais. Após a análise foi escolhida a obra "Após Democracia em Portugal".
A sua obra possui uma escrita fluída e está muito bem estruturada, o que nos leva a acreditar no seu potencial editorial. Assim sendo, temos a seguinte Proposta de Edição para lhe apresentar:
A Chiado Editora editará o seu Original em Livro e eBook em Portugal e também no Brasil.
O Preço de Venda ao Público da obra será de 11 euros em Portugal e 44 reais no Brasil.
A obra será distribuída em livrarias por todo o país em Portugal, ficando igualmente disponível no Brasil, através de encomenda em qualquer loja da rede de livrarias Cultura - a maior rede livreira do Brasil  
A obra será também publicada em eBook, no formato ePub, com o preço de 3€. O eBook estará disponível no site da Chiado Editora, na Apple iBookstore, Barnes & Noble, Sony, Kobo, Diesel ebook Store e Baker & Taylor.
A Chiado Editora organiza também o lançamento público da obra. .
O design e impressão de convites e cartazes para promoção e divulgação do lançamento da obra são a cargo da Chiado Editora.
No mês de lançamento a obra ficará também em destaque na Livraria Chiado, na Avenida da Liberdade, em Lisboa.
Se o número total de exemplares vendidos em Portugal e no Brasil atingir os 3.000, a obra será traduzida para espanhol (castelhano), e editada e distribuída em Espanha através da Chiado Editorial e, também, traduzida para inglês e editada e distribuída em Inglaterra, Irlanda e E.U.A. através da Chiado Publishing.
Eu serei a sua Editora e interlocutora durante todo o processo de edição da obra. Após a obra estar pronta, a Chiado Editora irá disponibilizar-lhe um Assessor de Comunicação que estará à sua disposição para marcação de eventos, tratar de convites, cartazes, contactos com a comunicação social, etc… 
Sinta-se à vontade para colocar alguma dúvida ou questão.
Despeço-me aguardando a sua resposta positiva para que possamos prosseguir a edição desta obra.
Com os melhores cumprimentos,Rita CostaExecutive Editor
Avenida da Liberdade, Palácio Lambertini, N.º 166, 1.º Andar, 1250 - 146 Lisboa, Portugal

story:
Hi,

My name is Gene Townsel and I'm a Professional Singer/Musician and a Preacher/Teacher of the word of God. 

Helping Singers realize their "Dream" is my passion. After having performed in major venues around the world and developing singers in my Los Angeles Studio, I am currently the owner of my own studio "The Source" in Deerfield Beach Florida and still perform as a solo artist and conducts Singers Workshops for aspiring artists. Having acquired international critical acclaim I have performed on the stages of Acapulco, Tokyo, Bangkok, Singapore, Aruba, Curacao and Buenos Aires, to name a few, as well as major U. S. cities. To date, I have two albums to my credit, "Time Wounds All Heels" that has remained popular in Europe and become a collectors album in the UK and "The 23rd Psalm", the latter containing the highly acclaimed title song that while being performed at the 1984 National Baptist Convention musical in Los Angeles, received a standing ovation by some 6,000 listeners.

This project has more than one phase. The first phase that is already under way is the memoir. Upon completion it will go to the editor and then to the printer. Phase two is the new music that is also under way and will soon go into pre-production, The third phase is the packaging of the old and the new music into a 2 CD set that will be sold as a part of the book and as a separate 2 CD set.

With the help of your generous contributions and the sales from the book and CD, the final phase  will be the establishing of a Performing Arts Center for underprivileged youth. Rather than taking the traditional route of politics, grants etc. to establish the center, I'm going to use my talent and the proceeds from the sale of my book and  music to fund it. The market for the product is my net- work of friends, church community and my fan base in the United Kingdom.

 This campaign is to raise the money for the cost of the music production and manufacturing and the publishing of my memoir. The subsequent sales of “From Seeking Glory, To Giving Glory”, (The book and CD) will help fund a place where under-privileged kids can have a  Performing Arts Center.  

The establishing of a Performing Arts Center here in Deerfield Beach, Florida is sorely needed.  Why here you ask? This is where I grew up with a voice for singing and a hunger for music. What I didn’t have, was a place to develop my talent other than the limited time offered at school. If it wasn’t for the encouragement of my choral music teacher who went the extra mile I never would have realized my dream. Now in many cases what little I had isn’t even available, for as we all know music has been taken out of many schools. In this little town after over fifty years there still isn't a place dedicated to the development of kids with musical talent. Oh there are recreation centers but there are not any dedicated music programs. Giving these talented kids positive mentoring and musical guidance is key to keeping them out of trouble. If it wasn’t for the church and the one black high school seven miles away I could very well be a statistic.

FROM SEEKING GLORY, TO GIVING GLORY  is a memoir filled with my triumphs and failures with pictures of memorabilia from my life journey beginning with my childhood in the church and on through  my music career with celebrity encounters such as former student Margaret (Shug) Avery from the "Color Purple", Barry White, my first producer before he became a superstar, Sinbad at the beginning of his career when I served as a Judge in the Air Force  talent competition (that he won by the way), and long time friend Dr. Margaret Pleasant Douroux,  one of the most prolific Gospel Song Writers in the nation. Then there was the establishment and development of  a facility for training and providing  services for aspiring and professional    

    

     

artists which was dubbed "The Gene Townsel Studio Of Theatrical & Musical Arts. The Studio was established in 1976 and closed in 2000 when I moved to Houston. During those years stories were abounding with a who's who list of artists who frequented the facility.  I also founded an anti-drug  program (AADAP) that hosted  an annual Summer Arts Festival at the Studio. Somewhere in the middle of all of that I accepted my calling to the Christian Ministry.     

     

  

       

The book will be packaged with two CDs. The re-released 70s album from the years when I was chasing that elusive star and the new album that will feature songs of inspiration, love and romance.

Time Wounds All Heels

The  Re-released Album On CD

With my fan base in the United Kingdom from the "Time Wounds All Heels" album and my network from my ministry work in the church, I anticipate significant support of this project. Over the years I have received several requests to re-release the album but I have chosen to wait and release it along with my story and some new music that reflects where I am today. Below are some of the comments made about the two most popular of the selections from my "Time Wounds All Heels" album. Let me mention here that I have possession of the original and digitized masters from the album.

Hi Gene, I'm a big fan of your music. 'Time Wounds all Heels' is one of my fave ever LP's.....'I'm Walking Away' is awesome & I didn't realize that it was released as a 45 until very recently, a long shot here, but I don't suppose you have any spare copies still of the 45 of it on Balance Town....I was also wondering if you had ever considered coming over to the UK to perform, there is a small, but very enthusiastic following for your music....    Russ Vickers

Hi Gene, As I am writing this i am playing your Dobre album "Time wounds all heels" and am reminded once again that it is one of the greatest soul records of all time. Please reissue this on CD to give more people the chance to hear this masterpiece. best wishes, Hans www.fingerpoppinsoul.nl

 "There's No Use Hiding"                              

I believe this must be THE GENE TOWNSEL who brought us "Time heels all wounds" lp......and for that I will always be grateful. 
I am sure you are aware of the popularity of "There's no use hiding" and "I'm walking away" to my mind two of the finest slabs of soul ever released.
With much respect and kind regards

Lee Bates
England

"I'm Walking Away"


What I will say is that the value your music to so many of us goes further than $, but perhaps to gain a perspective your famed 45 on Balance Town records (which am I right in saying you released privately a few years after the lp release?) and what people are prepared to pay, I was wondering if you are aware of what recently it sold for on Ebay? $502...on the 10th November 2013. If I had the money I would have been in the running for it. To me it is worth every cent

Lee Bates
England

My Love, My Soul, My Spirit 

New Music CD

I'm not just setting out to arbitrarily record some new music but to record music that speaks to a romantic love relationship between a man and a woman that God will smile upon.  Over my adult life I have noticed that songs that express the  love and affection between us as lovers is left to the so  called secular writer who in many instances is not sensitive to or concerned with the Biblical narrative. Personally I love secular love songs and made a career out of singing them around the world but I was always sensitive to the lyrics. 

I'm bringing even more sensitivity to  this project as I create songs that speak to the romantic relationship between man and woman based on God's word, as opposed to worship music whose soul purpose is to extol the virtue and power of God. 

 

Recording and re-releasing  an album and publishing a book is an expensive undertaking. There are many different costs that go into creating the final product. They include:

Recording: studio space, engineering, musicians

  • Mixing 
  • Mastering
  • Duplication
  • Distribution
  • Copy writing & Publishing
  • Design: album & web
  • Media: photo & video shoots
  • Perks for this Campaign
  • Campaign Fundraising Fees (around 10% of what I raise
  • Editing
  • Design: Book Cover & E-Book
  • Printing 
  • Marketing 
  • Promotion

So, here's how this works.

You pledge a certain amount and get perks associated with that amount. As you can see, the perks start at just $5! Though a small amount it is still appreciated so please don't feel like you have to give a large amount to give at all. I'm grateful for any support! 

 

  • The Perks offered here range from postcards acknowledging your contribution to autographed vintage pictures of me in Ray Charles' studio working with the musicians on the "Time Wounds Heels" album to personal performances and workshops. Also offered is the "New Music CD, the re-released "Time Wounds All Heels" CD and the "From Seeking Glory,To Giving Glory" Book. For those of you who are and have been my loyal friends  and fans through the years  there is a unique  "Secret Perk" available through a special link that you can get by e-mailing me at genetownselmusic@aol.com. This perk is a never before seen performance DVD bundled with the items listed above and is not shown on my main page.

 

Developmental Editing.........................................................................................$2,500.00

Copy Editing.............................................................................................................$1,500.00

Formatting For Print & Digital Conversion...................................................$2,500.00

ISBN # (International Standard Book Number)...........................................$   200.00

Printing.....................................................................................................................$3,500.00

Marketing & Promotion......................................................................................$3,000.00

                                                                                                                        $13,200.00 

 

The writing, recording, editing, mixing and mastering of a great album takes an abundance of time, energy, and money. I am raising funds in this campaign to help with the costs of the studio time, production, and post-production.

Studio Time.............................................................................................................$5,000.00

Musicians.................................................................................................................$2,000.00

Instrument Rentals................................................................................................$1,000.00

Background Vocals...............................................................................................$2,000.00

Mixing.......................................................................................................................$2,500.00

Mastering.................................................................................................................$2,500.00

Manufacturing/Packaging.................................................................................$5,000.00

Marketing..................................................................................................................$5,000.00

                                                                                                                                      $25,000.00

     

    Some of my friends feel that this project is too big. Well I serve a big God and I don't put limitations on Him or myself. Rather than going through the bureaucratic and political channels of trying to establish a Performing Arts Center for underprivileged youth here in Deerfield Beach, I've decided to use my talents and  my story to generate the necessary funds. My decision is rooted in the fact that if the powers that be (past and present) had any intention of creating such a place, it would exist already. It didn't exist 50 years ago during my formative years and certainly not before that. Given the political climate of today, it's not likely to happen any time soon. It is critical that we give the resources,  direction and incentive to our talented youth.  

    With your help and God's favor towards the sale of the CDs and the Book, I'm confident that THE ARTIST'S DREAM PERFORMING ARTS CENTER will become a reality.

    As with any goal, there are some obstacles and risks.

    My main hurdle is the financial one, which is why I'm asking for your help! 

    My biggest risk is in not meeting my financial goal through this platform, but I have a plan for that! If my goal isn't met here, the funds that are raised will be used to publish the book and re-release the "Time Wounds All Heels CD) and promote sales through the methods listed below.

    • Using my network of local churches to help promote sales.
    • I already have the literature developed for distribution among the churches.
    • I am also scheduled to attend and perform at the "SOULTRIP USA Convention  in Las Vegas at the Tropicana Hotel on March 15th-22nd, 2018 where I'll be selling the books, cds, and related product to my fans.

    Kev Roberts, Soultrip USA

    Here's a really good talent that combines Modern Soul with Gospel. Gene Townsel will go down in Crossover history for his masterpiece 'I'm Walking Away'. Meet Gene at SoultripUSA 5 in Las Vegas, March 15-22, 2018. 
    Book now www.goldsoul.co.uk Travel enquiries Ian Cann Cath Cann 
    https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=3lw5AkKqVBM

    • In addition to contributing financially, there are other ways you can help!
    • Get the word out. Telling your friends and family about this is a major way to show support.
    • Share on social media. You can share the campaign by clicking on the social media icons on this page. The more shares, the better!
    • Pray for this project that God will stay in the midst of every decision and move that I make.

    Thank you and To God Be The Glory!!

Some of my friends feel that this project is too big. Well I serve a big God and I don't put limitations on Him or myself. Rather than going through the bureaucratic and political channels of trying to establish a Performing Arts Center for underprivileged youth here in Deerfield Beach, I've decided to use my talents and  my story to generate the necessary funds. My decision is rooted in the fact that if the powers that be (past and present) had any intention of creating such a place, it would exist already. It didn't exist 50 years ago during my formative years and certainly not before that. Given the political climate of today, it's not likely to happen any time soon. It is critical that we give the resources,  direction and incentive to our talented youth.  
With your help and God's favor towards the sale of the CDs and the Book, I'm confident that THE ARTIST'S DREAM PERFORMING ARTS CENTER will become a reality.


As with any goal, there are some obstacles and risks.
My main hurdle is the financial one, which is why I'm asking for your help! 
My biggest risk is in not meeting my financial goal through this platform, but I have a plan for that! If my goal isn't met here, the funds that are raised will be used to publish the book and re-release the "Time Wounds All Heels CD) and promote sales through the methods listed below.

Using my network of local churches to help promote sales.
I already have the literature developed for distribution among the churches.
I am also scheduled to attend and perform at the "SOULTRIP USA Convention  in Las Vegas at the Tropicana Hotel on March 15th-22nd, 2018 where I'll be selling the books, cds, and related product to my fans.


Kev Roberts, Soultrip USA
Here's a really good talent that combines Modern Soul with Gospel. Gene Townsel will go down in Crossover history for his masterpiece 'I'm Walking Away'. Meet Gene at SoultripUSA 5 in Las Vegas, March 15-22, 2018. Book now www.goldsoul.co.uk Travel enquiries Ian Cann Cath Cann https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=3lw5AkKqVBM



In addition to contributing financially, there are other ways you can help!
Get the word out. Telling your friends and family about this is a major way to show support.
Share on social media. You can share the campaign by clicking on the social media icons on this page. The more shares, the better!
Pray for this project that God will stay in the midst of every decision and move that I make.

Thank you and To God Be The Glory!!

story:
Model: Chelsea Simone, the magical human that will grace our October cover <3

OVERVIEW

Monachopsis is a submissions-based fashion magazine specializing in editorial photography and other sartorial content including articles, shopping guides, and interviews, centered around a specific theme.  The magazine will be released on a quarterly basis with print and digital issues going live in January, April, July and October.  Print issues will measure 9" x 11" and will feature high-quality full-color photography, artworks, and graphics with interspersed text. The website will be updated on a weekly basis and will include content exclusive to the web such as webitorials, style how-tos and tips, and event coverage.

The word “monachopsis,” coming from the dictionary of obscure sorrows, is defined as “the subtle yet persistent feeling of being out of place.”  This term really stuck with us as we were developing a concept for the magazine, as we both know a thing or two about being misfits from our years of bullying, exclusion from events, and just being made to feel weird by our peers for our colorful style choices.  Over the years, we've found many other people who also feel exiled by the industry due to race, sexual orientation, gender, disability, and other reasons--and behold, the magazine was born.

 

WHY THE MAGAZINE?

Because we were frustrated by how blasé and predictable the fashion industry is (and even more so by the blatant sexism, racism, transphobia, and other discriminatory elements that seem to get glossed over due to the prominence of the patriarchy in publishing), we decided to launch our own magazine.  We want to highlight the people who have creative ideas that might not necessarily jive with the sartorial status quo.  We want to lift up marginalized voices by giving creators a place to submit their work.  We want to create a space free of the pervy male gaze where we can shamelessly talk about fashion and beauty while simultaneously addressing core issues that affect our readers’ everyday lives.  Most of all, we want to showcase amazing work by weirdos, for weirdos, in an environment where representation is a priority and not just a buzzword.

 

WHO WE ARE

Kristen Milford, Editor-in-Chief & Publisher:  Kristen, otherwise known as “KiKi,” is an intersectional feminist, mental health advocate, and world-class list maker.  She operates as the CEO and Creative Director behind Cats in My Closet, a fashion and style blog written from a cat lady’s perspective.  Boasting a Bachelor’s in Communication and work experience in several fields including creative writing, public relations, marketing, sales, publishing, and fashion styling, magazines have always been her passion.  Her favorite design houses are Miu Miu, Delpozo, and Vivetta, among others.  When she’s not absorbing herself in blog work, she can often be found binge-watching the latest anime series to drop on Crunchyroll, exploring a random hobby (currently: cooking), or chatting with local street cats (she’s fluent in feline, you know). To view the full extent of her qualifications, you can visit her portfolio or LinkedIn profile.

Stephanie Stein, Art Director: Stephanie is an award-winning photographer who focuses her work on the empowerment of women through fashion. She began her photographic process during high school and subsequently graduated in 2012 from The Art Institute of Charleston with a Bachelors degree in Photographic Imaging.  Since graduating college, she has launched her own photography business, working with designers and wardrobe stylists to create magic behind the camera.  Her photography has been featured in several print publications like Skirt!, Dollhouse and Stubborn Magazine, and she won first-place in Charleston Fashion Week's illustrious fashion film contest in 2014. When Stephanie isn’t glued to her viewfinder, she can be found fire-hooping for local performance gigs, recharging with her crystals, or chilling with her two fur babies--all while covered in glitter.  To view her work, you can visit her website.

 

To make this publication a reality, we need your help.

We both work full-time jobs and take on freelance work via photography and blogging/writing, but it’s still not nearly enough to reach our goal.  Our original plan was to contribute extra from our paychecks and scrape from our savings, but honestly, both of these options look pretty pitiful. Between student loans, credit card debt, rent & utilities, medical expenses, food, car payments, and gas to get to and from our day jobs, we’re spreading ourselves pretty thin financially and unfortunately can’t afford to launch this project on our own.  

That’s where you come in.

We are seeking patrons who will contribute funds and want to see this magazine come to fruition. Our target release date for our first issue is October 1, 2017.  

We will be using Indiegogo to cover the majority of our startup costs, after which we will supplement with print and digital advertising as well as sponsored content and sales of the print magazine to individuals and businesses.  

Our initial goal to launch the magazine is $9,000.

 

WHAT THIS COVERS:

  • Printing cost of debut issue (1,000 units)
  • Cost of website development & hosting fees
  • Small stipend for Stephanie and Kristen to manage daily operations for first three months
  • Cost of graphic designer (print, digital, and web)
  • Miscellaneous costs including business registration, barcode purchase, copyrights & trademark, accounting, shipping, and legal fees
  • Basic advertising costs to promote the magazine and calls for submissions via digital and print collateral

 

We implore you to join us on our journey to reshape the fashion industry one issue at a time.

Want to be a contributor?

Submit your work to monachopsismag@gmail.com to be considered.  You can view our full submission guidelines and October’s theme, “Mood Swings,” on our website.  The issue's mood board can be found on Pinterest.

Can’t pony up the funds but still really want to help out?

Be sure to follow us on Twitter, Instagram, and Facebook and sign up for our email list.

Want to be a stockist or an advertiser?

Send us an email to request a media kit as well as sales terms.

story:
THIS CAMPAIGN HAS ENDED! 

Please visit my website to sign up for alerts for when the book launches...

and a special pre-sale!!

http://colleenbrunetti.com/aidan-the-wonderkid/

WELCOME!

My name is Colleen Brunetti and I am the author of "Aidan the Wonder Kid Who Could Not be Stopped: A Food Allergy Story".

Aidan is a super hero with very special powers indeed. With his trusty dog Rocco at his side, there’s nothing he can’t do. But something is making Aidan sick. And when Aidan gets sick, he is very, very droopy. Will his grownups ever figure out what’s stealing his super powers? And how can he find his boundless energy once again? Stay tuned to find out!

I'm an educator, a certified health coach, and most importantly, a mom. While the book is superhero fiction, a lot of it really happened! Aidan is my real life son who had real life problems stealing his health and energy - and in time we learned the enemy was food that didn't feed his body just right.

I'll never forget his little face when we had to tell him that some of his favorite foods were the reason he was sick all the time, and that to get better, he was going to have to change how he ate. The idea of no more pizza, ice cream, or cake at birthday parties is sure hard for a little kid to accept!

As I talked to moms all over the country who struggle to support their kids through food issues, I realized kids need to be empowered to take control over their own choices, and to really own the fact that eating a certain way makes them strong and wonderful... even when it's a little bit hard sometimes. So, I decided to get this book out there, and to do it partially as a community service project by making sure I created a system where I could donate my time and some books to local kids too.

Your contribution is going to help kids like Aidan thrive! I wrote this story for him, and kids with food allergies and intolerances everywhere, to help them take ownership of their health and their food choices. I wanted it to be light and fun, and full of adventure - just like the little boy in my house. 

Your contributions is also going to empower stressed out and worried families to educate friends, family, and the school about how to best help their Wonder Kid. I'll be offering lots of tips, tricks, and kid-friendly recipes to support families who use this book (Check out the Party Survival Guide at the $100 level! It's going to be amazing!)

 

What We Need & What You Get

Here's where your money will go: 


1) Illustration expenses: My illustrator is  Dan Carsten. As you can see from the concept sketches we've included in our perks list, he's crazy talented. Artists deserve to be well compensated for their work, and we're a fantastic creative team. Approximately the first 50% of the funding goal will go to compensate him for his awesome work. 

2) Publication expenses:  Layout, design, digital conversion for print and eBooks...this stuff takes a ton of time and know-how from a team of professionals, and will be approximately 12 - 15% of the targeted funding goal. 

3) Gifts for YOU and the community: We've got some fabulous donor perks built in here. Starting at just $10, you get a digital copy of the book and at $35 a printed copy, signed by both myself and Dan the illustrator! And then at the higher levels, some fun stuff to go along with it... the production and shipping costs are included in the funds raised. (Hint: You definitely want the WonderKids superhero cape!).

In addition, I'll be donating copies to area schools and libraries (and doing free author appearances which often cost schools a lot of money!)

This section is approximately 15-17% of the funds raised.

4) Book Marketing: Once the book is out there, I really have to work to put the concept in front of as many people as possible. Long gone are the days when publishing houses do the marketing for you - which is one of the benefits of self-publishing. I have to do it either way, but I have total control over the process. Postcards, bookmarks, copies to send to bloggers for reviews and publicity, stacks of books to bring to events... it all adds up pretty quickly for an independent author! I'm building in roughly 10% for this.

5) Indiegogo Fees: They take their cut, and so do the the credit card processing companies. It's all good.  I'm budgeting the recommended 8-10%

And if we don't reach our goal... well, let's think positive. We will! But if we don't... the first portion of funds go to the illustrations. And then I'll piece together the technical publication services on a smaller scale. Either way, this book is coming alive and getting out in the world, so this campaign will be a success.

Have I said thank you recently? 

Here's How I Know We Will Succeed...

I've dedicated my life to helping kids. From my first career as a public school teacher, to my years as a health coach, I know kids do their best when the learning is fun, the lessons are powerful, and they take ownership. This book encompasses all of that - and everyone who has read it so far has glowing reviews.

I'm thrilled to already have the support of incredible local businesses and organizations.  Growing Great Schools has made a financial contribution for early stages of this book, already in progress.  Great By Eight has put their  networking power behind the book. Gluten Free CT is hosting me at their next Expo and will be featuring me on their blog, And Pure Love Gluten Free Bakery is where I'll be launching the book with an author night!

I'm also already a successfully self-published author for adults - best selling, in fact. So I have a really good idea of what it takes to bring a book to life. I also know there are things I'm great at with that process (the writing, project management, marketing, and the post-launch workshops and education opportunities).

There are also things I'm not great at... the kinds of things a traditional publisher would usually handle. The illustrations, the layout and design, and all that pesky technical publishing stuff that I just don't excel at. I did almost all of it myself the first time, and this time I know that to create a book that shines and is successful, I want and need a fabulous team around me. Your support is helping me build that team!!

I'm confident I have the structure to launch a successful book and get it into the hands of the kids who need it.

I just need your help getting there!

 

Other Ways You Can Help

While your financial help is so appreciated, I never underestimate the value of social capital and the power of your good word of recommendation. Please share this page and encourage people to help us make this project a success! Indiegogo makes it easy with their share tools, so click and share often!

THANK YOU!

Other Ways You Can Help
