Questo è l’omaggio che abbiamo intenzione di donare a chi vorrà inviarci un suo contributo.
Fino ad oggi siamo andati avanti in completo autofinanziamento, ma ora, per poter crescere, non basta più.
Proprio per questo veniamo a proporvi il crowdfunding: per raccogliere i fondi necessari a far partire un primo step di interventi necessari inizialmente al restyling del sito ed aggiornare parte della strumentazione, foto e videocamere, apparecchiature varie, in uso, così da poter avviare, entro breve una seconda fase di nuovi prodotti editoriali. 
Ci siamo posti un target. Auspichiamo di poterlo superare grazie alla vostra generosità.Se fosse possibile, ed ognuno di voi ci offrisse l’equivalente di due caffè, completeremmo la raccolta in poche ore, ma è necessario avere una certezza dei fondi. 
Per voi nessun rischio. Chi ci darà la sua fiducia con un contributo avrà garantito, in ogni caso, l'invio del volume fotografico. Non ci saranno sorprese nè ripensamenti, l'importante è lasciare tutti i dati necessari per l'invio al termine della campagna. 

Domande ricorrenti (FAQ)
A chi sto donando i miei soldi?
Stai donando la tua quota alla testata giornalistica “Gazzetta dei Trasporti | IlPendolare Magazine”. L'assicurazione della nostra serietà è nel sito web (LINK), nel quale trovate traccia delle pubblicazioni realizzate e del lavoro che svolgiamo.
Perchè vi servono 1800 euro?
Si tratta di una quota necessaria per la realizzazione, elaborazione e stampa del volume, incluse, per gli invii destinati in Italia, le spese di spedizione.La cifra non è relativa unicamente ai costi materiali. Con la donazione contribuite alla possibilità di acquistare nuove apparecchiature, in modo paerticolare foto e videocamera, per poter svolgere al meglio il nostro lavoro e, soprattutto, avviare nuovi prodotti editoriali.Maggiormente riusciamo ad avvicinarci al target, più probabile sarà l’opportunità di dare il via al nuovo corso
Non riesco a donare e/o ad accedere all'acquisto dei gadget: come faccio?
Ecco a te la procedura guidata!
La prima cosa è andare sul link:www.igg.me/at/decennale-gdtNella prima pagina si può ascoltare il video/appello della redazione. Se si condividono le motivazioni e si vuol dare un sostegno concreto allora si clicca su "Contribute now". Così di accede alla prima fase:


Contribute - In questa fase posso scegliere se avere il regalo finale ("Add Perk") e allora devo per forza attenermi alle cifre impostate e inserire i dati di e-mail, oppure posso scegliere di non avere il regalo ("No Perk") e quindi la mia offerta diventa libera (da 1 euro all'infinito...). Per facilitare l'acquisto dei gadget nella pagina principale sono inseriti dei banner che mi consentono donare avendo già nel carrello il ricordo desiderato: dovrò comunque controllare che il sistema abbia inserito correttamente ciò che intendo acquistare.Con "Contact Information" posso scegliere di identificarmi tramite Facebook (per chi lo ha) oppure inserire la mia e-mail.Dopo la scelta di quanto contribuire si passa quindi alla seconda fase:

Pay - clicco su "Go to Pay Pal" e mi appare una schermata dove mi si dà la possibilità di scegliere se pagare con Pay Pal (se io ho una carta di credito associata a un conto Pay Pal) oppure con una qualsiasi carta di credito. In questo secondo caso, che penso sia per la maggioranza di noi, cliccandoci sopra mi chiede, lo stato, la lingua (e qui le cose diventano più facili dato che posso scegliere l'italiano) e i dati della carta (numero, data scadenza, numero segreto...). Un'unica accortezza: togliete la spunta sulla casella che dice "Salva questi dati su un conto Pay Pal".Così abbiamo completato l'operazione con la terza fase:

Share - posso vedere il mio contributo che appare tra i "Funders"

Temo che la piattaforma non sia sicura per i pagamenti online: ci sono alternative di pagamento?
No, la campagna Indiegogo è l'unica modalità. Per fugare tutti i dubbi, ti assicuro che si tratta di un canale già testato con successo in altri contesti e perciò scelta a ragion veduta.
In che modalità verrà consegnato il volume?
Il volume verrà inviato per posta attraverso “Raccomandata” al termine della campagna.I Funders riceveranno una mail (importante pertanto fornire una mail valida) il risposta alla quale dovranno comunicare il recapito dove si intende ricevere il perk richiesto.
Ho altre domande!
Saremo lieti di risponderti! Puoi contattarci liberamente utilizzando la mail: donazione@gazzettadeitrasporti.it

story:
What people who have read the manuscript are saying about "The Truth About Health":

"This is a book every parent should read!" Rebbetzin Kamenetsky, Philadelphia Yeshiva

"Yael has a real gift for taking difficult and complex concepts and making them understandable and accessible! Her book is informative and entertaining.  A must read!" Shana D.

"Your book is GOOD!", Yocheved L. 

"I couldn't put it down!" Tamar K.

 

Update: The deadline for this campaign has been extended by 30 days.

I don't like reading boring books. And I would certainly take no pleasure in boring you. I once read a book about calcium(!) that was so dull, that it put me to sleep in one minute flat, which worked out great, because it saved me from a bad case of jet-lag. I would not recommend that book to my worst enemy.

I am also not a health nut. Ice cream is and has always been my favorite food. I'm just a truth-seeker, and I don't like being duped. For the last 15 years, nearly every person I have encountered, has asked me the exact same question: "How did you get into the field of Chinese medicine?" Which may translate:  Why would you venture so far off the beaten path? No accountants or actuaries are asked this question. 

There's another question people ask me. It usually follows directly after the one above: "Do you believe in Chinese Medicine?"  I will answer both of these questions for you now, because these questions are the reason I started writing what ultimately became this book. 

The reason I chose to study Chinese Medicine was because I have long sensed that modern medicine was fumbling in the dark in too many areas. There were simply too many unanswered questions, too many contradictions. This lit a fire under me to find the truth about what really causes disease, and what cures it.

It was my interest in truth that led me to study Chinese Medicine. The fact that Chinese Medicine offers a fairly ascetic and regimented approach to health was not the main attraction for me. It was more of a minor and hopefully avoidable inconvenience. (Like I said, I really love ice cream.) I studied this ancient system because I suspected that it might hold some secret truths that Westerners would benefit from knowing about.

"Do you believe in Chinese Medicine?"   A lot of people have faith in modern medicine. Alternative medicine does not generally elicit such mass devotion. However, faith has no place in the world of medicine, though modern medicine would have us believe otherwise. So to answer the question, I do not believe in Chinese medicine, nor any other medical system. I know that Chinese medicine works well and that it's safe.  

There is rarely a need to take a leap of faith with regards to one's health, when we have access to evidence and experience. When it comes to health, an educated decision will always serve us better than a decision based on faith. Chinese medicine is eons ahead of modern medicine, in experience and in depth of understanding health, and will always remain so, considering that they got a 2000 year head start. 2000 years of experience is certainly enough to make faith unnecessary.

"The Truth About Health" is not about Chinese Medicine. The research in this book covers a wide variety of health topics and is non-denominational. (See below for a list of topics covered.) I have spent over a decade researching many questions about health, healthcare, and disease. My columns were featured in various publications over the years, including The English Update, Arutz Sheva, Hamodia, Mishpacha Magazine, Tachlis Magazine, and more. The amount of information I was able to share on a given subject depended a lot on the publisher. 

When my uncut material was published, the new ideas I presented often elicited strong public reactions. Some people saw their long standing suspicions finally backed up with evidence. Some people loved my revolutionary exposes, others were disconcerted when I challenged the status-quo; but no one will ever accuse me of being boring.  One day my magazine editor told me,  "Yael, you know you have enough material for a book. Why don't you write one?"

Since boring books about health usually collect dust in the bookcase, I have made every effort to write a book that is  easy to read, useful, and entertaining. The book is also full of new and groundbreaking information.  We are lucky to have found an open-minded, top-notch publisher that believes in my book. Not just anyone would publish a book that defies the medical establishment's take on reality.

By pre-ordering your sponsor's copy of my book, you will help us bring this lifesaving information to the world. The more funding we get, the more copies we can print. Every contribution will help us reach our goal! Thank you!

Topics Covered in "The Truth About Health":

The Truth About:

  • Cholesterol
  • The dangers of herbal medicine?
  • The real cause of heart disease
  • The low-fat myth
  • The germ theory debunked
  • Fevers
  • Antibiotics
  • Hospital protocol on newborn care
  • ADHD and stimulant drugs
  • Fluoride Myth vs. Reality
  • Real and fake "Prevention"
  • Sunscreen, sunlight and cancer
  • Icing injuries
  • Sugar substitutes
  • The real cause of food allergies
  • Autism
  • Polio
  • The breakfast myth
  • Eight cups of water a day?

Self help for:

  • Cough
  • Asthma
  • Sinus Infection
  • Fevers
  • Colds and flu
  • Infections
  • Acne
  • Injuries
  • Colic
  • Constipation
  • Seasonal allergies
  • Parasites
  • Infertility
  • ADHD
  • Childbirth 
  • Emotional health

And more!

Our Goal

Our goal is to raise $11,000. This amount takes care of publication costs including: content edit, copy-edit, proofread, layout, cover design, creative oversight, project management, overseeing printing, arranging distribution, and printing of 1000 copies of the book. If we raise more, we will be able to print more!

We have some outside sponsors as well, who will make sure the book goes to print, so the finished product is guaranteed.

The Impact

Knowledge is power. When it comes to healthcare, knowledge can mean the difference between life and death. Protect your health and the health of your loved ones by getting informed and gaining the tools to take part in important medical decisions. 

The book is written, and we are currently in the final stages to bring it to print. By helping fund this project, you will assist us in bringing The Truth About Health to the world .

Risks & Challenges

According to our publisher, we anticipate that it will take about a year to prepare the book for print.  We would really love to print more than 1000 copies. The more successful the campaign, the more books we'll print.

Since I am not afraid to speak the truth, my material is often (usually) controversial. While my writing has been printed many times over in various publications, the truth is not always popular, and is often censored. So although there is plenty of demand for the uncut truth, status quo is a powerful force, which doesn't have much tolerance for revolutionary ideas. That's why we are thrilled to have found an open-minded publisher who is eager to print the uncensored truth. 

Societal beliefs are formed by the reality that the media presents to the public. My goal is to give you a new reality. The truth is not always the most popular opinion (in fact, it's usually the least popular). But I'm sticking to my guns and continuing to research. I have not yet busted every myth out there. I'll keep you posted!

    Other Ways You Can Help

    Not able to make a contribution right now, but still want to help? Please share this campaign with your friends via social media or email. Share this campaign with at least 10 friends and enter into a raffle to win a free copy of the book.

story: Christianne Sobere is a lay expert on Cerebral Palsy.  She has lived with this condition and its effects since birth.  Christianne is often called to speak to children, teens, and young adults about what it's like to live with a disability every day.  Christianne has had the dream of educating and supporting children in the disabled community for 22 years.  Josiah her 22 yr. old son, also the main character, is the reason for writing this book.  The Amazing Animal Adventure is ready to go to "print", and Christianne is seeking funds for the purchase and marketing of the books.  Due to being on a low income she is hoping to raise money to support this important handicapable mission for children.  Please share with everyone you know, so they can be a part of making Christianne's dream come true.

story:
Short Summary

Have you ever gotten frustrated about at least some of the stuff that is taught/ published in the supposedly more enlightened esoteric/ spiritual/ self-help arena? Well, I have - so I decided to write 'Tours and Cures of a Lightsoldier; Surviving the Path to Enlightenment' (Alexander King)! As a Spiritual Healer myself, I do believe in many things spiritual, but on my path I have found quite a few teachings that either do not make much sense (if squared up to an unconditionally loving Divine), or seem incomplete. But somehow, so far, I have rarely found constructive criticism of spiritual teachings - maybe Lightworkers fear to be accused of blaspheme, skepticism, or negativity? I am not asking anyone to just accept the understandings I have reached, but hopefully 'Tours and Cures of a Lightsoldier' will help you free yourself off possible esoteric teachings' shackles, help you to think for yourself even better - and empower yourself even further! The book is has many useful self-healing tools as well!

What qualifies me as a spiritual author? Not sure if there is any such believable qualification? Personally I have quite zealously spent many, many hours in meditation; learned to free myself from (human) spiritual authority, by surviving, and getting out of a manipulative spiritual cult; self-tested many self-help teachings during 10 years suffering from CFS; and worked as a healer and masseur for (11 and 9 years respectively).  Plus I have a few years of medical training, which has perhaps helped me to not just through all rational thinking out the window, walking on the spiritual path!

This campaign will help extend the reach of 'Tours and Cures of a Lightsoldier'. I loved writing it, and there is no way to recoup the time and energy I invested in doing so, but maybe you can help repay some of the GBP 5000 I invested in editing and publishing (out of own pocket).

For more info about the book, and myself, feel free to peruse my site - www.alexander-king.com. You can even 'look inside' the book beforehand to make up your mind, if it is worthy of your donation (books.google or Amazon)


What We Need & What You Get

GBP 5000 is what I invested to get 'Tours and Cures of a Lightsoldier' publishable, and eventually published.

If you donate a minimum of GBP 15 (UK residents), or GBP 20 (All other countries; sorry higher p&p costs) - I will send you a signed copy of 'Tours and Cures of a Lightsolier; Surviving the Path to Enlightenment'!

Unless you donate less than what is required to get a signed copy, or are exceedingly generous and donate more - this campaign won't actually recoup much of my investment - after printing cost and postage. It might very well though spread the word about 'Tours and Cures of a Lightsoldier', spread it's 'Light', generate more (hopefully positive) reviews, etc., all of which are invaluable!


The Impact

Tours and Cures of a Lightsoldier is a revolution in the Self-help book world. It shakes up the status-quo, by questioning and uncovering the illogical, or incomplete in spiritual teachings. Alexander King questions teachings about Life and the Divine, which turn the Divine into cold-hearted entities, if not sadistic ones – but then gives us understandings which allow for the Divine and the basis of Life to be truly loving and intelligent again . Perhaps to keep ascending on the spiritual path one has to keep evolving ones self-help literature as well? Tours and Cures of a Lightsoldier does not just stand still, and repackages existing esoteric teachings – it is moves forward with brutal honesty, but thorough positivity!

Risks & Challenges

'Tours and Cures of a Lightsoldier' is a finished project, so you are guaranteed to your signed copy, if you donate the required minimum.


Other Ways You Can Help

If you cannot afford to donate today - thank you for your interest! If you like this project, and want to get involved somehow anyway though - feel free to share book info on your Facebook, Twitter, etc.  accounts, or recommend it to spiritually interested friends, etc. You can obviously also just purchase a cheaper unsigned copy off major online retailers. 'Tours and Cures of a Lightsoldier' is available in paperback or ebook (currently cheapest on books.google). Many thanks!

story:
Short Summary

Welcome to TravelPRIDE.org, your destination for LGBTQ+ travel resources, from places to go, things to see, what to read, where to eat, and how to stay safe when you get there. We’re a website dedicated to the LGBTQ+ community promoting adventure, exploration, and, most importantly, PRIDE in who we are. 

TravelPRIDE.org is working to explore issues that affect the LGBTQ+ community all over the world. We encourage our readers to interact with each other in a creative and supportive environment. 

The team at TravelPRIDE is made up solely of members of the LGBTQ+ community, plus allies of the community. It’s a team of individuals expressing themselves through writing and video, and it’s inspiring to watch what’s being produced. 

 

What We Need & What You Get

We are seeking second-round funding for the expansion of our website. Through a private investor we were able to launch the site, hire writers and columnists, and put together a team behind the scenes to get the site up and running. With the launch taking place on June 21st, 2017, the site is now ready for second-round funding. 

We are seeking $10,000 (the bare minimum) to upgrade to a private server, develop marketing materials for advertising sales, provide online training and certifications from various universities to our writers and editors, build our marketing team, and advertise on social media to spread our message. 

In exchange for your help, we have a variety of exciting offerings, from bumper stickers to vacations!

 

The Impact

We’re already having a major impact in the LGBTQ+ community even before we’ve launched. The fact that we’ve hired an all-LGBTQ+ and allies writing and editing staff has had an impact on those hired. We’re nearing 10 writers, 2 editors, 2 marketing specialists, 1 video producer, and 3 writing/editing interns, in addition to our administrative staff of our Editor in Chief and a hired accounting firm. We’re employing the LGBTQ+ community and giving them a voice to spread PRIDE around the world. 

We’re also focused on promoting travel safety within the LGBTQ+ community. There are parts of the world (roughly 75 countries) where it is still unsafe for members of our community to travel and be open about who we are. We’re hoping to promote safe travel to those places while not compromising our individuality and pride. 

 

Risks & Challenges

We’re open about the risks involved in not getting our second-round funding. Without this funding, we will not be able to keep all of our staff writers and editors on board after their initial contracts expire. Additionally, we’ll be limited on server space causing site delays, issues updating, and other technical troubles. 

We are fortunate, however, in that we have received a private donor who is going to handle the production and fulfillment of all of our perks and rewards! That’s half the battle!

 

Other Ways You Can Help

Share our campaign on social media! Get involved in your local LGBTQ+ activities. It’s PRIDE MONTH! Get out there, and BE PROUD!

WEBSITE: www.travelpride.org 

FACEBOOK: https://www.facebook.com/travelprideorg/

TWITTER: https://twitter.com/travelprideorg

INSTAGRAM: https://www.instagram.com/travelprideorg/

We’re a website dedicated to the LGBTQ+ community promoting adventure, exploration, and, most importantly, PRIDE in who we are. TravelPRIDE.org is working to explore issues that affect the LGBTQ+ community all over the world. We encourage our readers to interact with each other in a creative and supportive environment. The team at TravelPRIDE is made up solely of members of the LGBTQ+ community, plus allies of the community. It’s a team of individuals expressing themselves through writing and video, and it’s inspiring to watch what’s being produced.  What We Need & What You GetWe are seeking second-round funding for the expansion of our website. story:
The Author:

Now to be a little less spooky, maybe?  Hey! I’m Jessica Walsh, also known as “Snow Cosplays.” I’m a freelance writer, seamstress, and all around artist who spends the bulk of her time travelling to conventions around the US to sell my books and art alongside my partner, Briana Lawrence (Brichibi Cosplays). I write freelance scripts for WatchMojo.com, and have had various stories published by Apex Magazine, Dreamspinner Press, and have successfully self-published several novels with my partner. While we’re known more for our colorful costumes and our urban fantasy stories, I have a deep love for horror, and have taken on my first solo project to create a lingering feeling of dread within my potential readers.

The Story:

Fear isn’t always loud. It doesn’t always scream or announce itself with a loud thud on the closet door. Sometimes it creeps, slithers, and crawls. Sometimes it’s waiting in the shadows, whispering as you pass by. These stories may not scare you, but one or two whispers may burrow into the back of your brain. They may make you shiver at night and consider, for just a moment, that maybe you left the front door unlocked... and maybe those weren’t your cat’s footsteps you heard inside.

Little Creepers will be a collection of horror stories in a variety of styles. Some are a loud slam of the door while others brush against the back of your neck. Some are long enough to fill an abandoned hallway while others are notes scratched on the back of a dusty stair. All of them scare me in one way or another if I think about them too much, and the only way to relieve that fear is to pass it on.

I’m planning 13 frightening stories to share with you, but depending on how the campaign goes, there may be more creeping through the hallway when we’re finished.

The Campaign:

My partner and I are seasoned in the world of self-publishing thanks to our other releases and freelance work. We do our best to create books that will entertain -- and, in this case, terrify -- our audience. However, to do this, many costs have to be paid up front. This is where you can help me out! By pledging various tiers through this campaign you’ll help me gather the money needed to put this book into production and square everything away.

By reaching the goal, and possibly even exceeding it, you’ll help me launch this book and share these creepy stories with the world.

 

 

Extras and Items:

Like any good horror story, any sort of contribution will have an effect - whether it’s large or small depends on you and your actions.

Along with the physical and ebook version of Little Creepers, there are a couple other items offered in the tiers of this campaign which deserve their own explanation:

Mini Print - With each physical order there will be a 4x6 mini print of the front cover of the book designed by Dave Branch. These mini prints are exclusives and will not be sold outside this campaign.

Seeking the Storyteller - The first of my Urban Fantasy series with my partner Briana Lawrence. This story is not horror, but is perfect for those who like the idea that something supernatural lurks in our world, just out of sight. Somewhere in the shows there is a creature called the Storyteller who can read your life like a book and change it any way he wants. This series is about the people who want this power and what they’ll do to obtain it.

Beneath the Chapter - Book 2 in our Urban Fantasy series delves deeper into the world of the Storyteller and those seeking that power… and those who’ve decided to protect it.

"Written in Stone" - This is a very special and limited perk. Should you pick this listing your name will be written into one of the stories. As the author I’ll decide which story and what role your name will play. The character may have a shade of you - if I know you - or may simply be your name. However I can’t guarantee if you’ll be a creature, a victim, or a not so innocent bystander, so proceed with caution. (Please be aware that screen names and inappropriate names will not be accepted.)

Stretch Goals:

As a creator and storyteller sometimes I like the idea of giving my creations the chance to grow on their own. Should this campaign over perform, there are a few more things which I’ll be able to set into motion.

$2500 - A 14th story will be added to the anthology! Once we reach this mark, I’ll reveal the working title.

$3000 - More art! Should we reach this goal I'll add a piece of my own art to the book.  This will also be included as a second mini art print with all physical orders that will only be sold through this campaign.

$3500 - A 15th story! Once we reach this tier another story of mine will be added to the anthology and I’ll reveal the title!

$4000 - Even more art! I have a couple other artists I’ve come across with amazing art that I’d love to include in the book. Once we hit this tier I’ll add another illustration and I’ll announce the artist at this time.

$5000 - An audio book! Perhaps you like your horror to lean a bit more toward the campfire days. Should we reach this lofty goal, then we’ll be able to put this audio book into production! I already have a reader planned and will announce who it is and a time frame once we meet this goal!

$6000 - Guest Story - While I’m the lover of horror, occasionally my friends dabble in it too. Should we reach this lofty goal, a special guest story will be added to the anthology. I can’t tell you who the author is yet, but it’s not me. I'll reveal who the author is once we reach this point.

$10,000 - Big Dreams! I remember as a child reading an anthology called Scary Stories to Tell in the Dark and how those stories and the art affected me. Should we reach this goal I’ll be able to reach out to several artists and have illustrations created and included for each of the stories in this book. Should we reach this tier it will delay the printing time of the book, but it will be well worth it to see the final creation.

Risks & Challenges:

With self publishing comes risks. Such books are occasionally viewed as less professional and are often overlooked. There’s a chance that it won’t sell beyond this campaign or that it won’t sell as well as our other books.

However, I am nothing if not persistent. My partner and I are experienced in selling our books at conventions, signings, and other events. As of right now we have three self published novels under our belt, plus a collection of novellas and short stories through various publishers. We have partnerships with several other authors, creative individuals, and an entire plethora of resources at our disposal to get this book out there with your help. We are also very familiar with reaching out in person, through social media, and through partnerships to get our message across. I can assure you we’ll use all these resources for this book, as we have for all of our others.

Currently the book is 90% written, so I’m already well on the way to completing it. This campaign is to help with the upfront costs of self publishing Little Creepers and to run an organized presale of the book. Plus, I want to offer bonus items to those who have helped bring these stories to print.

Thank you for checking out my Indiegogo. Just be careful that nothing follows you home in the shadows.

story:
Short Summary

I started Connection Victory Publishing Company in pursuit of my passion for non-fiction books of significance. As Executive Editors for the major international digital magazine The Good Men Project---“GMP”---my creative partner and friend Wilhelm Cortez and I knew we had access to hundreds of authors, each with a message with the potential to make a lasting impact on our society. We wanted to find a way to better serve them and GMP while pursuing our passion for the written word.

We knew many of these authors were new to writing and publishing and were not likely to get the attention of a large, traditional book publisher. At the same time, the authors didn't have the resources to self-publish; some didn't have the knowledge or time to learn, and others didn't have the financing, even if they could learn the ropes.

In the process, we attracted experienced, previously published authors including the world-class Dr. Jed Diamond, whose 13 previous books (Male Menopause, The Irritable Male Syndrome, Looking for Love in All the Wrong Places) have touched the lives of literally millions of readers worldwide, with quotes, compliments, and kudos from The Rev. Iyanla Van Zant, Dr. John Gray, and many more.  Jed and author/poet Cameron Conaway (Malaria Poems, Caged) wanted to support our mission. They felt an affinity for the work we were doing and felt our indie publishing company Connection Victory and the community were building would be a good home for them and their new works.

Lasting Impact Press is our imprint that focuses on the non-fiction genres Social Justice & Ethics, Gender & Sexuality, and Spirituality & Mental Health as well as the intersections of these topics. Under this imprint, we set out to help the authors disseminate their message of social import.

Our business model is somewhat traditional in that we do not charge our authors for any part of the publishing, and non-traditional in that we do not offer our authors an advance on royalties. Your purchase of our merchandise through this Indiegogo campaign will support our continued efforts to lift the voice of authors with a message of lasting impact.

* * *

What We Need & What You Get

Connection Victory started with the intention of helping new book authors---those who didn’t have a budget or the skills to self-publish, and who wouldn’t likely win a contract from a large, traditional publisher---to get their titles out as an eBook and print on demand. However, as is often the case with entrepreneurs who seize an opportunity when it presents itself, welcoming a world-class author to our family and our catalog created a variance in our business model along with rapid name recognition and a fuller funnel than we dreamed would be the case this early.

We now seek funding to bridge the gap to the new business model that serves all of our authors, both the novice working on issues related to our specialty genres (social justice & ethics, gender & sexuality, and spiritual healing) and the well established author---like Dr. Jed Diamond---who share our vision of giving a voice and platform to those who might not otherwise be heard.

When you back our campaign, you have the option of selecting the actual product from our catalog of titles.

 

The Breakdown:

  • Our first expansion is to add print and audio media for offerings in our current catalog of titles. We need:
    • $8,000 for print books
    • $2,000 for an audio recording
  • After we meet our first goal, our next priority is upgrading our equipment. We started this on a shoestring with our own old, personal laptops and a hand-me-down desktop computer. Upgrading to professional equipment would make the processes more efficient: $4,000 for equipment upgrades
  • We then plan to upgrade our website to accommodate our subscriptions (membership website): $2500
  • $10,000 as a buffer in cashflow so we can hire talent as needed

 

* * *

The Impact

Imagine having had a personal experience that taught you a lesson and saved you from continued pain and anguish. You want to tell the world so others can stop suffering. You don't have the resources---neither the time to learn how to self-publish nor the money to have it done---and you don't have the confidence that a traditional publishing house is going to give your manuscript a look. Your friend introduces you to the team at Connection Victory Publishing Company, and now, your idea for making the world a better place is on its way to being published.

Your purchase of our merchandise through this campaign will support our continued efforts to lift the voice of authors with a message of lasting impact.

* * *

Risks & Challenges

A common risk in publishing is printing more books than will be sold. We are taking very conservation risks with print and working to ensure our marketing will be targeted to the psychographic for each title. While we are not going with print on demand, we are working with a printer who is flexible enough to do short runs. Our perks for print books are a way for us to take pre-paid orders thereby lowering our financial risks.

Another risk is the potential for the revocation of net neutrality and for laws to interfere with the delivery of digital media---especially that of a social justice nature---including eBooks. We'd like to believe Amazon, the 800# gorilla in the room, won't allow the internet to fall victim to such censorship but considering the current political climate, this is a more real risk than over-printing.

Other Ways You Can Help

If you want to help us---even if you're not personally interested in the perks we have---here are a few ways you can help:

  • Share our campaign with your friends who are non-fiction book lovers, social justice activists, the member of a men's group, book club, or poetry lovers,
  • Buy a subscription for a college student studying masculinity, gender studies, sociology, or social work. In the first week of our campaign, get 25% off of two years---$150 for the eBook subscription!
  • Sponsor your book club or men's group by buying our Men's Group perk. Buy it in week 1 of our campaign and take advantage of our Early Bird Special rate!

Thank you in advance for your support!

Lisa M. Blacker, President & Publisher

 

Following are the slides from the previous video so you can evaluate the options and select the right perks for yourself and as gifts for others.

story:
Breve reseña

Trabajo como técnico de diseño en una empresa dedicada a la fabricación de luminarias con tecnología LED.

Mi mayor sueño consiste en publicar “Sombras en el jardín”, un libro que contiene nueve relatos de temática variada:

“El funcionario” comienza con la negativa del encargado del registro de un pequeño pueblo a expedir un certificado de nacimiento a un ama de casa. Tan curioso conflicto burocrático propiciará, al menos, un entrañable acercamiento entre ambos, después de que el excéntrico funcionario decida mostrar su lado más humano, intentando justificar su comportamiento de una forma tan extravagante como conmovedora.

La protagonista de "Sombras en el jardín", víctima de la falta de escrúpulos de su marido, naufraga en medio de una tempestad de desesperación, cuya resaca acabará por arrastrarla hacia un desenlace tan ineludible como sorprendente. Esta intensa historia (que aborda temas como la corrupción de la clase gobernante, la marginación, la falta de comunicación o los malos tratos) está escrita con la intención de que el lector se involucre en la trama, descifrando una serie de claves que le harán pensar incluso después de acabada la lectura.

La aparición de un globo aerostático, anclado en pleno paseo marítimo de un pequeño pueblo, supondrá una novedad en las aburridas vidas de sus habitantes, que serán testigos del pulso que mantendrá “El aeronauta” con las autoridades locales durante una buena temporada.

“Carrera imposible hacia poniente” es el desgarrador relato (breve pero intenso) del sufrimiento que padecen los dos únicos supervivientes de un destacamento militar que queda aislado en un paraje remoto y desolador, cuyas terribles condiciones les someterán a la prueba más dura de sus vidas.

Otros relatos: "La rueda", "El sonriente", "Después de Eva", "El olor de la realidad" y "Memorias sobre el albero".


Lo que necesitamos y lo que obtienes

El objetivo de esta campaña es recaudar los fondos necesarios para poder publicar y distribuir mi libro "Sombras en el jardín": 1.950 euros (presupuesto de la editorial, que incluye diseño de portada, maquetación del libro, tramitación de ISBN, etc.) para una tirada inicial de cien ejemplares con cubierta dura, y doscientos ejemplares con cubierta flexible, asegurándome así poder cumplir con todos las recompensas.

En el caso de que la campaña obtenga menos dinero, igualmente publicaría el libro aunque tuviera que reducir la tirada, ajustándola a la cantidad recaudada.

Las recompensas se detallan en las distintas categorías de contribución.

¡Muchas gracias a todos por colaborar en la consecución de un sueño!

El impacto

En estos días de crisis, debido a nuestra pérdida de poder adquisitivo y a que se quiere relegar la cultura a un segundo plano, el crowdfunding es la mejor vía para la financiación de proyectos literarios, que, de otro modo, quedarían guardadas, de por vida, en el fondo de un cajón.

Riesgos y desafíos

En principio, el riesgo principal consiste en no poder publicar ni distribuir una buena cantidad de ejemplares para compartir mi libro con el mayor número posible de lectores, pero la clave está, como he dicho, en adaptar la tirada a la cantidad final obtenida.

Otras formas en las que puedes ayudar

Creo que la promoción de la presente campaña es tan importante como su financiación económica; por ello, me gustaría que todo el que lo desee, publique esta página en Facebook, Twitter, Tumblr, etc. y anime a sus amigos y familiares a participar.

¡Gracias a todos!
story_txt:
Breve reseña 

Trabajo como técnico de diseño en una empresa dedicada a la fabricación de luminarias con
tecnología LED.
Mi mayor sueño consiste en publicar “Sombras
en el jardín”, un libro que contiene nueve relatos de temática variada:
“El funcionario” comienza con la negativa del encargado del registro de un pequeño pueblo a expedir un certificado de nacimiento a un ama de casa. Tan curioso conflicto burocrático
propiciará, al menos, un entrañable acercamiento entre ambos, después
de que el excéntrico funcionario decida mostrar su lado más humano, intentando justificar su
comportamiento de una forma tan extravagante como conmovedora.


La protagonista de "Sombras en el jardín", víctima de la falta de escrúpulos de su marido, naufraga en medio de una
tempestad de desesperación, cuya resaca
acabará por arrastrarla hacia un desenlace tan ineludible como sorprendente.
Esta intensa historia (que aborda temas como la corrupción de la clase
gobernante, la marginación, la falta de comunicación o los malos tratos) está escrita con la intención de que el lector se involucre en la trama, descifrando una serie de claves que le harán pensar incluso después de acabada la lectura.




La aparición de un globo aerostático, anclado en pleno paseo
marítimo de un pequeño pueblo, supondrá una novedad en las
aburridas vidas de sus habitantes, que serán testigos del pulso que mantendrá “El
aeronauta” con las autoridades locales durante una buena temporada.
“Carrera imposible hacia
poniente” es el desgarrador relato (breve pero intenso) del sufrimiento que padecen los dos únicos
supervivientes de un destacamento militar que queda aislado en un paraje remoto
y desolador, cuyas terribles condiciones les someterán a la prueba más dura de
sus vidas.
Otros relatos: "La rueda", "El sonriente", "Después de Eva", "El olor de la realidad" y "Memorias sobre el albero".



Lo que necesitamos y lo que obtienes 
El objetivo de esta campaña es recaudar los fondos necesarios
para poder publicar y distribuir mi libro "Sombras en
el jardín": 1.950 euros (presupuesto de la editorial, que incluye diseño de portada, maquetación del libro, tramitación de ISBN, etc.) para una tirada
inicial de cien ejemplares con cubierta dura, y doscientos ejemplares con cubierta flexible, asegurándome así poder cumplir con todos las recompensas.
En el caso de que la campaña obtenga menos dinero,
igualmente publicaría el libro aunque tuviera que reducir la
tirada, ajustándola a la cantidad recaudada.
Las recompensas se detallan en las distintas categorías de contribución.
¡Muchas gracias a todos por colaborar en la consecución de un
sueño!
   El impacto 




En estos días de crisis, debido a nuestra pérdida de poder
adquisitivo y a que se quiere relegar la cultura a un segundo plano,
el crowdfunding es la mejor vía para la financiación de proyectos
literarios, que, de otro modo, quedarían guardadas, de por
vida, en el fondo de un cajón.




   Riesgos y desafíos  

En principio, el riesgo principal consiste en no poder publicar ni distribuir una buena cantidad de ejemplares para compartir mi libro con el mayor número posible de lectores, pero la clave está, como he dicho, en adaptar la tirada a la cantidad final obtenida.   Otras formas en las que puedes ayudar  


Creo que la promoción de la presente campaña es tan importante como
su financiación económica; por ello, me gustaría que todo el que
lo desee, publique esta página en Facebook, Twitter, Tumblr, etc. y
anime a sus amigos y familiares a participar.¡Gracias a todos!

story:
My name doesn't matter.

You can call me huckleberry if it helps break the ice.

   I was born in Detroit, MI in 1986, and it doesn't matter how I made it around the world before I could (legally) drink a beer.  I would have to start with the Michigan militia, Y2k & radical-right homeschooling, my (socially inept) re-entry into public school in 2000 when the world didn't end; the subsequent stories of how I lost my faith when the christian voodoo and sheltering wore off.

    Insert a physically abusive, minister for a father, running away to jail, add a submarine trip from Virginia to Japan and Australia just to realize this is a cook's book (not JUST a cookbook!) and these stories are all modest distractions as along the timeline as I unwrap life piece by piece under "many hats." I insert recipes I have written, hotside cooking tips, pastry and bread error/correction guides and some decent drinks, places to drink and reasons not to drink. What seems to be a tragedy, evolves to a passionate description of living in a post-magical mind and making sense of the real world nearly a frame at a time. And cooking. Lots of cooking. And lots of drugs, about as much crime and drugs as there is food and all surrounding seven years of active military service. 

    I went from E-1 to E-5 on two years and four months, I was junior sailor of the quarter three separate quarters, was junior sailor of the year once, I got a 4.9 on one of my many EP evaluations and received an on the spot promotion from my submarine captain.

   Each chapter is a story from my past, mostly but not entirely in sequential order, done so to show growth and folly. Sometimes it will be a running theme like: racism, bigotry & xenophobia,  others may be sexual exploits and being exploited sexually, loves gained and lost, lessons learned and obvious truths a somehow avoided or refused to believe. My outline thus far has 115 unwritten stories, which only takes me from 1990 to 2009  and as of Jan 20th 2015 I have 22 stories (75 pages)  written.

     Between chapters I will have recipes, drug manufacturing and modern drug law evasion tips, how-tos at breaking the law and getting away with it, tips on self-improvement and learning, etiquette and how become more autodidact even in your later years. The interchapter articles and recipes will be relevant to the time period of the surrounding chapter(s). As of Jan 20th I have 30 interchapter articles written.

   I learned many lessons. I have gained wisdom, whether I outsmarted something or made mistake after mistake, dragging myself through the mud to be cleansed by my own enlightenments. Learn from my bad. Follow what I say, not what I've done. Where there is room for pride, there is also room for shame. So take my word, and learn how to decorate a cake while you marinate your mind in a true story of bipolar blessings. From partying in the playboy suite at the palms in vegas to losing my wallet and watch at the four floors of whores in singapore. 

    Need proof I have a story to tell? Ask my 2 ex-wives from before I was 26, ask my heroin dealer "London" from before the navy, or ask my heroin deal "Alex" from after the navy. Check my mushroom grow while I was enlisted. And meet my infant son, he was born a little more than a year after a failed startup business & 3 more (stupid!) arrests while his mother and I were both full time college students approaching our thirties. 

    I go from promised christian sobriety to defiant experimentation to self-righteous sobriety to relapse after relapse after relapse on a merry-go round of intoxicants. I lived life like a rockstar, was looked up to by many and looked out for by few. I have hit rock bottom on purpose just so I could climb the ladder again And what I did when my whole life changed, over and again.

  And when I met my son, I finally knew why all these years I had wanted to be a better man.  I had to make the final move: no more Tony Montana, no more Requiem for a Dream, no more  Chuck Palahniuk anything. This was the meaning in my life I had been searching for. His love is a greater comfort than any buzz or high. Raising him right, without the hate, angst, and paranoia I was raised with is my mission. He can be whatever he wants to be, he doesn't have to be a lowlife drug addict or a kingpin hustler. He doesn't have to sweat, bleed, or cry. I have taken on life's biggest demons and slain them all. So this is for my one and only son, it's all about what I say, not what I've done. I will document it all, I won't hold back and I will right every wrong. I have learned these lessons so he wouldn't have to.

 And I've got the scars, swag and photos to prove it. 

********************************************************

Paypal preferred so I can get my mainstream outreach moving!

After meeting editors and getting publishers quotes,  this book will cost just under $6000 to produce and actually market. This crowdfunding is now to pay for my printed advertising in local papers in San Diego, Chicago, Detroit, Lapeer, and North Branch, for digital advertising with adsense, google and adportal and my street team in San Diego. An expense list follows.

Also I am putting in $ on my own, I raise on fiverr and by ghostwriting in San Diego is going straight into the fund or to advertising.

Simultaneously I will be starting crowdfunding for the book with appropriate amount necessary to raise  

***********************************************

If you were there with me through this, I would love some photos, maybe an email of your memories. Maybe even a donation or spreading the word (Maw! Maw! I'm famous!)

************************************************

Printed advertising in San Diego: $110 Per week of the citybeat/reader for 1/4 page color ads next to the weed and handjob ads

Print in my hometown in Michigan, $60 per week "size three" black and white

Google, adsense adportal ~$200 each

Any extra (IF ANY) I will use to print QR codes and put them all over SD, especially next to my my fuck LCDR Ochoa tags!


*******************************************************************

My printed, published, isbn and library of congress catalogued book with cover design, back cover, 2 pre editors, 3 publishers editors, warehouse refund option (barnes and noble type bookstores will not pick up a book without this unless it is a best seller) 50 copies for my backers off the top, unlimited prints and 2000 to start shipped to and marketed amazon, google B+N brookstone, waldenbooks etc. E-book made available and marketed costs between $4900 and$5900!!!

I have also been advised over and over that I will want a lawyer on retainer once the book is released. My previous defense attorney from the "weed in jail incident of 2012"  has a $3000 retainer and would be happy to help keep me outta the hoosegow.

story: I blame the Proclaimers I really do. I will be riding a bicycle from east coast to west coast for a few reasons, 1 to prove things to my wife and my love. 2 to take back my health and to lose the pounds I have collected over the years. As of right now, I'm 560 pounds. I will be blogging and video blogging the whole trip and interviewing people along the way. After I complete my trip I will write a book on the experience. This fund raiser to help with supplies and equipment and any costs for camping, eating, etc. I'll need all the support I can get.

story:
The Story of Margret Fisher


Margret Fisher is a story about a young woman that finds herself depressed in the only way most young women feel it, torn between two lovers.

She finds herself daydreaming about both men, trying to work out the best way to deal with both and to make a decision on allowing one of them to get close. As soon as Margret thought she had the right answer something unthinkable happened, her life changed forever. Without the proper words to tell her best friend, Melisa, Margret is caught in a spin of decisions that could make or break her relationship, her friendship and mostly important her heart.


How The Story Started and What It Means to Me

I started writing Margret about several months ago when I was faced with the same challenge of losing my best friend and trying to keep a new relationship going.

Margret is an inspiration to me in the sense that many young women my age can learn that life is not always about pleasing everyone but also making time and space for yourself as well as taking time to think and take your own advice.

What We Need & What You Get

  • I will be using the funds to pay for the printing and editing of the books through Dog Ear Publishing.

  • I decided to self-publishing because I wanted to see how different it is to traditional publishing.

  • Perks include personal letters, postcards, Ebooks and signed paperback books.
  • If I don't reach the total amount of funds I will use the funds I do have to edit and proofread the manuscript with an qualified editor. 


The Impact

Your contribution will mean the world to me regardless of how big or small it is. By contributing to my project you are not only helping me start the biggest of my dreams but also helping in setting a stepping stone to complete more books like this and other greater adventures.

Risks & Challenges

There aren't many risks involved except having something go wrong at the printing house, however this is rather impossible as Dog Ear Publishing has given their word that they do the very best of work.

Currently Margret Fisher is the last stages of being edited by the author. The challenge here is that it could easy take up to another month to have the book in perfect shape.



Other Ways You Can Help

I completely understand if you are not able to make a contribution, but that doesn't mean you can't help. Please be as kind as to share my campaign with family, friends and colleagues via social media or you can use the Indiegogo share tool.

story:
Thanks to the Indiegogo community & my loyal preschool aged fans, Rosie is ready to turn the page of her next chapter at The Dream Big Academy. Two years ago, we raised 144% over our fundraising goal together & I was humbled and overjoyed by putting my mantra of Dreaming Big into the hands of all of your littles. It has been a magical and rewarding ride and now it's time to bring book two to life. This campaign serves as heartfelt request to pre-order and help to print the 2nd installment of The Dream Big Academy children's book series, Rosie Wants to be a Dancer. We have set the fundraising goal to be the total amount you generously helped me to surpass last round.  I think that together we can continue to elevate the important conversation of why we work, and remind ourselves the importance of DREAMING BIG at any age. Thank YOU for your support and belief in what I am trying to teach!

*My friends at Local Barre in Hoboken, NJ bought a campaign perk in 2013 that dared me to write my next Rosie story based on their suggested career theme- a dancer. I am honored to meet their challenge with this book. I already have one more written behind it to meet another challenge. The opportunities are endless, perhaps yours is next!

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

To learn more about Rosie and her journey, check out the first campaign, Rosie Wants to be a Fireman, June 2013. 

To learn more about Marissa and Choice Fashion & Media, take a look at her blog, Choice Fashion & Media.

story:
Short Summary

This year on Valentines i was looking for the perfect Valentine present for my girlfriend. Frustrated because i wanted something cheap, original, personalized and new, as last years i depleted all my ideas, i quit searching and after a few days i came up with this book idea and i started writing it. All my friends wanted one, and encouraged me to try to sell this world-wide and also make an English version. At our local tv station it was voted the no.1 present of 2015.

So here it is :)

The book is called 1000 Reasons For Loving You, and i wrote only 990, because i left the last 2 pages blank so you can write the last 10 reasons and other personalized messages. This way you will bring your personal contribution. Therefore, on the back cover i put a field where the coauthor can sign, and obviously the coauthor will be each one of you, because the book will be completed by you and therefore each copy of the book will be original.

This way you can make a present for your lover no matter if it is a 'he' or a 'she'. All the reasons are unisex and fit perfect no matter if you are giving it to a female or a male.

The advantages are that you will be able to give a truly original present, and also bring your personal contribution to it. (Yes, especially females will love this!) It might even get you laid :)

Another advantage is the fact that this is considered a cheap present... (below 20$).

The biggest thing yet, it's the fact that you will make her or him a present that for sure it will be the first time she or he gets this, because it's the first time this kind of present and ideea exists.


What We Need & What You Get

Before i will go trough the process of subscribing this book and making contracts with the international books distributors, i said to myself that Indiegogo would be the best place to test if there is a market for my book, or if people would find this attractive and buy it. Making a project here is very fast and inexpensive compared to the other variant i have. So i said i will start here.

If you like this project of mine, all you can do is buy a book in advance here and this way you would help me to be able to print a large batch with a far better price than usual. 

I can assure you that there is no other book like this on this planet and wont be very soon as it is internationally patented.

I added perks up to 10 books, as some friends of mine bought up to 10, as they say, to have birthday presents prepared for any occasion right at hand :)


Shipping

If we reach our goal of 5000$ we will start shipping right away. If for example we will reach 5000$ by 1 of June, we will start shipping with 3th of June.


Refunds and problems

We have to mention here that we will not be responsible for any problems regarding the delivery in the buyer's country. If you misspelled your address or if you encounter any delays please understand that we can not interfere with the post office in your country and we can not make any refunds as if the package gets back to us it will be more expensive to pay to get them back than the value of the book. We can only guarantee that we will ship the package properly sealed, respecting the laws of international printed merchandise and we can send you the receipt of the expedition in case of any problems. 
If somehow anyone wants his books sent with tracking via DHL like services, we will provide you the tracking code right after shipping. 
Thanks.
Peace and love to all of you!
story_txt:
Short Summary This year on Valentines i was looking for the perfect Valentine present for my girlfriend. Frustrated because i wanted something cheap, original, personalized and new, as last years i depleted all my ideas, i quit searching and after a few days i came up with this book idea and i started writing it. All my friends wanted one, and encouraged me to try to sell this world-wide and also make an English version. At our local tv station it was voted the no.1 present of 2015.
So here it is :)
The book is called 1000 Reasons For Loving You, and i wrote only 990, because i left the last 2 pages blank so you can write the last 10 reasons and other personalized messages. This way you will bring your personal contribution. Therefore, on the back cover i put a field where the coauthor can sign, and obviously the coauthor will be each one of you, because the book will be completed by you and therefore each copy of the book will be original.
This way you can make a present for your lover no matter if it is a 'he' or a 'she'. All the reasons are unisex and fit perfect no matter if you are giving it to a female or a male.
The advantages are that you will be able to give a truly original present, and also bring your personal contribution to it. (Yes, especially females will love this!) It might even get you laid :)
Another advantage is the fact that this is considered a cheap present... (below 20$).
The biggest thing yet, it's the fact that you will make her or him a present that for sure it will be the first time she or he gets this, because it's the first time this kind of present and ideea exists.

story:
Version en ESPAÑOL!


"The Kingdom of Andes" is an interactive book that aims to promote reflection and learning about different subjects among children. 

The themes that each book developes range from moral and ethical issues, to subjects related to biology, mathematics and every field of knowledge. Each book has a reflection for the whole family.

In the first editions of the book we will meet Wil, the spectacled bear. We will get to know his family, friends, the way he interacts with his natural and social environment, and the experiences that he has in the Páramo with the other animals that also live there.

Wil's experiences will be analog to that of a child that lives in our society, and will help to promote  values, respect and a desire to take care of nature; This theme will be developed further in later editions in which Wil will get in touch with human society for the first time and will face its different facets and behaviours.

"The Kingdom of Andes" is a unique project. We have various chacarteristics that deliver a truly different and unique experience:

- 15 illustrations, which the user will be able to read over and over again and interact  with the different elements in each illustration.

-Assisted narration in every illustration.

-A special section inside the app where the child will be able to color WiiL, and see him move in 3D.

- A mini-encyclopedia, where the child will find basic information about the andean ecosystem.


Synopsis:

In the andean Páramo, lives a little eight-years-old spectacled bear, named Wiil. Wiil lives with his mother inside a huge tree. Each day, Wiil's mother goes out looking for food; When she goes out, she entrust Wiil with various house chores, but he avoids doing them and instead spends his time staring and the dawn through the openings of the tree, he streches and yawns, goes out to play with other animals in the Páramo, until he remembers what his mother asked him to do, will he be able to do all his chores before his mother returns?

WHO WE ARE

My name is Jersson Velasco, I live in Bogotá, Colombia. I am the writer and director of "The Kingdom of Andes". I have work for some years as a 3D animator in various nacional productions, and some international. I've always had the need to tell stories and this is one of them.

We have an amazing colombian illustrator with experience in different editorials, books, and animated productions.

What We Need & What You Get

The resources will be destinated to do the programming, animations, and music of our book. We have spectacular rewards from personalized digital and animated postcards, to the physical book, posters, early access to the following editions, etc.

We are waiting for you!




Impact

With this book we pretend to introduce the wonderful Andean ecosystem, and teach to protect it and preserve it along with all the species that live there.

The Andean bear, or spectacled bear is our main character, it is the only bear in South America and a great guardian of the lungs of all America. Like many animals that inhabit these ecosystems it is endangered. With this book we contribute to educate children and adults to be aware of our Andean ecosystem and the importance it has in our lives. We will invite readers to rescue the bond with nature and learn from the simple and valuable things it can teaches us.




Risk & Challenges

The biggest obstacle is the money needed to implement all the functions that we want for our eBook. To overcome these difficulties we have planned different stages for the eBook. The more resources we gather we will be able to have all the functions that we want for this amazing experience.



Other Ways You Can Help

If you know somebody who might be interested in collaborate with us do not hesitate to send them the link of our campaign, contact us if you have any questions or if you want to help us in other way.

Share our campaign and follow us in this adventure.

Facebook


ESPAÑOL



Resumen

El reino de los andes es un libro interactivo que busca fomentar la reflexión y el aprendizaje de diferentes temas por parte del lector infantil. Las temáticas que maneja cada libro van desde cuestiones morales, éticas, etc. hasta temas relacionados con biología, matemáticas y todos los campos del saber. Cada libro maneja una reflexión dirigida  a toda la familia


En las primeras ediciones del libro conoceremos a Wil, el oso de anteojos, conoceremos a su familia, sus amigos y la forma en que se relaciona con su entorno natural y social, las experiencias que vive cada día en el páramo con los demás animales que viven allí; estas serán análogas a las que vive un niño en nuestra sociedad y servirán para fomentar valores, respeto y la apropiación por el cuidado de la naturaleza; este tema se tocará con más profundidad en las ediciones posteriores en las que Will se relaciona por primera vez con la sociedad humana y conocerá sus diferentes facetas y comportamiento.


El reino de los andes es un proyecto único, contamos con diferentes características para brindar una experiencia diferente y única.


-15 ilustraciones, donde el usuario podrá leer una y otra vez e interactuar con los diferentes elementos de cada ilustración


- narración asistida en todas las ilustraciones


-una sección especial dentro de la aplicación donde el niño podrá colorear libremente a WIL el oso y luego podrá verlo moverse en 3D


-una minienciclopedia donde el niño encontrará información básica sobre el ecosistema andino



SINOPSIS


En el páramo andino vive un pequeño oso de anteojos de ocho años de edad llamado Wiil, Wiil vive con su madre en el interior de un gran árbol. Cada día la madre de Wiil sale en busca de comida al salir le encomienda a su hijo varios deberes en el hogar pero él los pasa por alto y en lugar de hacer sus tareas se queda contemplando el amanecer a través de una de las aberturas del árbol, se estira y bosteza perezosamente, sale a jugar con los demás animales del páramo hasta que recuerda, muy tarde, lo que su madre le había encomendado ¿Wiil alcanzará hacer los deberes antes de que regrese su madre?


QUIENES SOMOS


Mi nombre es Jersson Velasco vivo en Bogota,Colombia, soy el escritor y director del proyecto “el reino de los andes” he trabajado algunos años como animador 3D para producciones nacionales y algunas internacionales, siempre he tenido la necesidad de contar historias y esta es una de ellas.


Contamos con un un gran ilustrador colombiano con experiencia en diferentes editoriales, libros, y producciones animadas.

IVAN BARRERA

https://www.behance.net/ivanbarrera


QUE NECESITAMOS Y QUÉ OBTIENES


Los recursos serán destinados a la programación, animaciones y música de nuestro libro, tenemos espectaculares recompensas desde postales digitales personalizadas y animadas solo para ti, hasta el libro en fisico, posters, acceso anticipado a las siguientes ediciones,etc


te esperamos!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!





Impacto


Con este libro pretendemos dar a conocer el maravilloso ecosistema de los andes, enseñar a protegerlo y conservarlo junto con todas las especies que este contiene.


El oso andino u oso de anteojos es nuestro personaje principal, es el único oso que habita suramérica y un gran guardián de los pulmones de toda américa, como muchos animales que habitan estos ecosistemas está en peligro de extinción con este libro contribuiremos a  educar a niños y adultos a ser consciente de nuestro ecosistema andino y la importancia que tiene en nuestras vidas, invitaremos a los lectores a rescatar el lazo con la naturaleza y aprender de las cosas sencillas y valiosas que esta nos enseña.


Riesgos y desafíos

El mayor obstáculo es el dinero para poder tener todas las funciones que queremos que tenga nuestro ebook, para superar estas dificultades tenemos diferentes etapas planteadas para el ebook; entre más recursos obtengamos podremos tener todas las funciones que buscamos que tenga esta maravillosa experiencia.


Otras formas que puedes ayudarnos

Conoces a alguien interesado en colaborar no dudes en enviarle el link de nuestra campaña o en contactarnos si te surge alguna duda o deseas ayudarnos de otra forma

Comparte nuestra campaña y siguenos en esta aventura

Facebook

story:
"En Tierra de Esperanza | Honduras 2015"

I'm Diego Moya. In this campaign I would collect enough money to travel to "Casa Zulema" in Honduras. I would like to provide my services and expertise as Technical Assistants in Nursing Care in "Casa Zulema".

"Casa Zulema" is a shelter for people with HIV/AIDS who are in situations of family abandonment and social marginalization, and whose poor health forces them to rely on the care of others. It is located in Valle de los Angeles (Dept. Francisco Morazán), in a quiet environment that promotes recovery of patients and where others by their precarious situation, find a place to wait for death with dignity. The house sleeps 25 people and equally accepts all kinds of people regardless of age, sex, religion, race, culture or social status. It must be said that this whole project has the support of the Spanish NGO "Honduras Project" ("Proyecto Honduras").

Thanks to everyone in advance,

Diego Moya

=================

"En Tierra de Esperanza | Honduras 2015"

Soy Diego Moya. En esta campaña quisiera recoger el dinero suficiente para poder viajar a "Casa Zulema", en Honduras. Mi intención es la colaborar desinteresadamente, sirviendo, como Técnico en Cuidados Auxiliares de Enfermería en "Casa Zulema". 

"Casa Zulema" es un albergue para personas portadoras del VIH/SIDA que se encuentran en situación de abandono familiar y marginación social, y cuyo estado precario de salud les obliga a depender del cuidado de terceros. Está ubicada en Valle de los Ángeles (Dpto. Francisco Morazán), en un entorno tranquilo que favorece la recuperación de los pacientes y donde otros, por su precaria situación, encuentran un lugar donde esperar la muerte de forma  digna. La casa tiene capacidad para 25 personas y acepta por igual todo tipo de personas sin distinción de edad, sexo, credo religioso, raza, cultura o estrato social. Cabe decir, que todo este proyecto cuenta con el soporte de la ONG española "Proyecto Honduras".

Gracias a tod@s de antemano,

Diego Moya

story:
Short Summary

My name is Cody Vaillant. I am the front man of the Toronto rock band Wildheart. 

A lot of our song lyrics come from pieces of poetry i scribble in my many note books...I thought i might collect, organize and arrange some of the pieces that i would like to share with you and put them in a book. Some phrases you may recognize from a few of our songs but most are not in a format easily transferable to the medium of rock music. 

Currently the book it about 100 pages and may grow before it reaches the printing phase.

What We Need & What You Get

I would very much appreciate your financial help in self publishing this project as it is not cheap. I will be using the services provided by http://www.blurb.com/ 

Any donation helps, any donation over $25 will receive a copy of the book, and any donation over $50 will receive one signed by myself.

Risks & Challenges

I am poor so the only way this can happen is if I reach my goal of $1000...if not i guess you all get your money back through the refund system.

Other Ways You Can Help

Buy Wildheart's music, share links to our songs, social media pages and videos...just give me money because you are cool...also just be a good person because that helps us all.

story:
Quienes Somos

El Movimiento 10 de abril surgió en 1999 con el propósito de defender los ríos, comunidades y territorio de la Comarca Ngäbe-Buglé. Somos un grupo indígena que lucha por proteger la vida, las tradiciones, el ecosistema, y el patrimonio cultural e intelectual del pueblo Ngäbe y Buglé de Panamá.  

Yo, Goejet Miranda, encabezo la organización y pido tu ayuda para ganar la lucha en defensa del Río Tabasará. Por 7 años hemos organizado una resistencia en contra de la construcción de la hidroeléctrica en Barro Blanco.

Hemos mostrado una y otra vez los incumplimientos ambientales y legales de la empresa GENISA pero el Gobierno de Panamá se rehusa a cancelar el proyecto hidroeléctrico que hoy día esta sumamente avanzando. Hemos logrado detener su construcción  pero no la cancelación. Estamos agotando nuestras maneras de resistencia por dialogo y ahora nos queda la protesta demostrativa en las calles de Panamá. 

Lo que necesitamos

Los fondos recolectados irán para pagar el transporte y la alimentación de las personas que vendrán a protestar con nosotros desde Tolé, Chiriquí. En estos momentos estamos en la Casa Ngäbe de Tolé. Ya hemos cerrado la calle interamericana  pero requerimos fondos para lograr buscar más participantes Ngäbe y Buglé a lo largo de la comarca y de la rivera del Tabasará.


El impacto

 La construcción y conclusión de la hidroeléctrica de Barro Blanco, será el golpe más grande de este siglo veintiuno en contra del actual renacimiento cultural Ngäbe. La cuestión que se nos presenta hoy como sociedad Panameña y humana es la de una batalla entre bandos con un desnivel de poder tan grande que resulta en el bullying y paternalismo en contra de los indígenas. El país de Panamá teme perder su estatus en el mundo financiero y seguridad para inversionistas extranjeros como lo son los de GENISA en Barro Blanco. El empresario Hondureño Luis Shucry Kafie y el pasado Gobierno de Panama tienen un historial de corrupción y manipulación. Por esto, Panamá reanima su renombre como defensor de la corrupción para lograr atraer inversionistas similares a los de la represa actual en Barro Blanco. Además, los bancos implicados Deutsche Bank y el banco de desarrollo holandés FMO tampoco siguieron las pautas debidas para financiar este proyecto. Ya hemos ido a ver los embajadores de estos países y actualmente estamos viajando a Holanda y Alemania para denunciar a estos bancos.


Los gobernantes de esta nueva administración de gobierno de Juan Carlos Varela a quienes se les presenta una decisión no muy difícil les hace falta facultad interdisciplinaria e intercultural. Nosotros creemos que el mundo de hoy no puede soportar más este movimiento tecnocrático que desde principios del siglo pasado se sigue viviendo en Latinoamérica. Aunque la demanda energética incremente con el crecimiento de las secciones urbanas, no es justificable la violación de leyes y derechos del estado. 

El día que se culmine la represa en Barro Blanco y a su vez se tape esta vena de los Ngäbe y Buglé -el Tabasará- provocará un nuevo movimiento colonizador del territorio indígena restante.  Con nuestra resistencia, nosotros como indígenas ofrecemos una crítica constructiva para el mejoramiento de la flexibilidad y libertad del sistema burocrático y práctico nacional. Esta hidroeléctrica niega nuestros derechos como sociedad indígena al inundar y reformular el ecosistema de nuestro río. El progreso de nuestra cultura indígena se verá rezagado gravemente. En la orilla del río Tabasará hay una escuela autóctona Ngäbe además de un sinnúmero de documentos culturales y arraigos históricos del pueblo Ngäbe e indígenas de América. 

El Gobierno Panameño y la compañía constructora GENISA nos llevan mucha ventaja de poder (monetario y político) pero nosotros pensamos que esta lucha es demasiado importante para nuestras futuras generaciones de indígenas americanos y no podemos dejarnos conquistar con sus juegos de Desarrollo cuando nosotros tenemos el derecho como cultura independiente de nuestra autonomía y de una trayectoria diferente a la Occidental. La diversidad cultural y por extensión la diversidad biológica, es la decisión mas saludable para nuestro mundo actual.  Consideramos que es sumamente injusto que hoy día se les exija a los pueblos indígenas tantos requisitos unilaterales. 

No queremos perjudicar a los transeúntes y pero no nos queda otra salida. No queremos terminar en un barrio brujo, en una favela marginalizada a orillas de una ciudad que día a día nos mantiene entretenidos con violencia y pobreza. Queremos nuestras tierras para seguir desarrollandonos a nuestra  manera. 

 

Riesgos y desafíos

 En nuestro país somos minoría. La historia colonial es evidencia suficiente para reconocer nuestro reclamo de justicia en el presente. Para luchar contra el gobierno debemos dejar nuestras siembras, casas y niños pequeños para viajar y debatir en los distintos pueblos y ciudades del país. El M10 y el pueblo Ngäbe y Buglé pedimos tu ayuda para poder continuar esta lucha.  


¡Puede contribuir como pueda! Con su presencia y también con su contribución de dinero por medio de esta página web.  ¡Por favor comparta esto con sus amigos y conocidos para que nuestra lucha se haga conocer por el mundo! Si logramos vencer, venga a bañarse en el río Tabasará con nosotros!

Y eso es todo.


Los fondos de esta recaudacion van primeramente a Gines Sanchez, quien no esta ayudando a poner nuestra lucha en indiegogo con su cuenta en paypal. El estudia Ngabere con nosotros en Kiad y es de confianza. Luego de la fecha final de recaudacion, Gines nos pasará lo alcanzado. Gracias nuevamente! -Goejet Miranda.
story_txt:
Quienes Somos El Movimiento 10 de abril surgió en 1999 con el propósito de defender los ríos, comunidades y territorio de la Comarca Ngäbe-Buglé. Somos un grupo indígena que lucha por proteger la vida, las tradiciones, el ecosistema, y el patrimonio cultural e intelectual del pueblo Ngäbe y Buglé de Panamá.  Yo, Goejet Miranda, encabezo la organización y pido tu ayuda para ganar la lucha en defensa del Río Tabasará. Por 7 años hemos organizado una resistencia en contra de la construcción de la hidroeléctrica en Barro Blanco. Hemos mostrado una y otra vez los incumplimientos ambientales y legales de la empresa GENISA pero el Gobierno de Panamá se rehusa a cancelar el proyecto hidroeléctrico que hoy día esta sumamente avanzando. Hemos logrado detener su construcción  pero no la cancelación. Estamos agotando nuestras maneras de resistencia por dialogo y ahora nos queda la protesta demostrativa en las calles de Panamá.    Lo que necesitamosLos fondos recolectados irán para pagar el transporte y la alimentación de las personas que vendrán a protestar con nosotros desde Tolé, Chiriquí. En estos momentos estamos en la Casa Ngäbe de Tolé. Ya hemos cerrado la calle interamericana  pero requerimos fondos para lograr buscar más participantes Ngäbe y Buglé a lo largo de la comarca y de la rivera del Tabasará.  El impacto La construcción y conclusión de la hidroeléctrica de Barro Blanco, será el golpe más grande de este siglo veintiuno en contra del actual renacimiento cultural Ngäbe. La cuestión que se nos presenta hoy como sociedad Panameña y humana es la de una batalla entre bandos con un desnivel de poder tan grande que resulta en el bullying y paternalismo en contra de los indígenas. El país de Panamá teme perder su estatus en el mundo financiero y seguridad para inversionistas extranjeros como lo son los de GENISA en Barro Blanco. El empresario Hondureño Luis Shucry Kafie y el pasado Gobierno de Panama tienen un historial de corrupción y manipulación. Por esto, Panamá reanima su renombre como defensor de la corrupción para lograr atraer inversionistas similares a los de la represa actual en Barro Blanco. Además, los bancos implicados Deutsche Bank y el banco de desarrollo holandés FMO tampoco siguieron las pautas debidas para financiar este proyecto. Ya hemos ido a ver los embajadores de estos países y actualmente estamos viajando a Holanda y Alemania para denunciar a estos bancos.
