story:
L.Y.S.B.I.S.R. = Love You So Bad I Said Remember...what started off as a reminder to my souls conpanion to REMEMBER always that she is loved and she matrers... I intend to say to the world. Starting with Colorado. Loosing Dawn was the most devestating event in my life thus far that this heart has had to endure .. everything in me wanted to curl up and hide... I was ready to completely give up. Not only did I loose my lover I lost my best friend.. my most trusted companion. Never before had I felt so lost and utterly alone on this planet. The idea of moving forward in the world with out her  breathing beside me was not one I was interested in entertaining. Giving up is not now and has never been an option in my life. Dawn may not physically be beside me but I know I carry the love we shared stronger then ever in my heart. That love gives power to my pulse and pushes me to keep moving. 

L.Y.S.B.I.S.R is a raw, and gritty collection of sketches, photographs, poetry, and love letters that tell the story of finding rare friendships in strange places ,addiction and all the amazing people the needle has cost this earth, falling in love , betrayal, heartbreak, family, murder, withdrawal and the cops that beat me sencless after an hour long chase that landed me in the Klink.. This collection will explain how I found freedom while incarcerated, found love in recovery and gave up nearly 7 years of clean time because I belived I could walk back into hell and carry my soul mate out ... She took her last breath on October 11, 2014...truth is.. it nearly killed us both. We would have been married on January 1, 2015 in New York, New York...Central Park to be exact.

 I couldn't even attend her funeral .. Instead I sat in jail in Adams County Colorado a.k.a the 7th circle of hell. .with a bond that was less then most of my shoes cost.. come to find out it was best I didn't go...  What most people didn't know is I cried my eyes out the very first time I saw her with a syringe... That I begged her not to open that door and exhausthed myself in an attempt to express the demons that we welcome in when we esclate our addiction in such a way . People always say addiction is addiction is addiction.. and I agree to an extent... Still from personal experience and a long hard road littered w loss and heartache introducing the needle introduces a whole new world of pain and suffering. We were each others whole world's. Inseparable! Head over heels in love! None of us saw this coming.. We both came from honest hard working loving families and grew up in nice homes. I know her family had their hands full and her passing was an unexpected blow to all who loved her.. I only wish I could had been more involved, or involved at all.  And I can only imagine the heartbreak they must have been and still today are going through.   Had Dawn wanted to live a different lifestyle without drugs she would have been welcomed into her family's home with open arms. Further had Dawn wanted to live a different life I would have gladly laid down the weapons and tools of that world to rebuild our life in the light. Unfortunately that was not a choice she was ready to make.. and knowing the deamons that dwell where the needle slides in I was hell bent on keeping her safe... Guess I failed miserably in that department. I would have happily givin my own life to save hers... Offered up my own pulse to keep her heart in rythem. Two winters ago  we nearly froze to death trying to stay warm sleeping in apartment Lobbys and holding our dogs (Naboo & Lyric) inside of our jackets to keep them warm. 

When the dectivies came to question me at the jail and informed me she had passed away I already knew. I knew the exact moment... And many may never believe this... But I was well aware the instant she left this life .... Because at that exact moment ..my own heart shattered onto thousands of pieces. I knew Dawn had gone from us because I felt my heart break . I felt completely hollow... As though someone had carved out my insides... I saw us growing old along side one another... Her perfect hands were most cirtenly designed to fit in my own. 

Home...

 It just wasn't the same with out the light our love created.. it wasn't  our home. I saw us laughing with our eyes dressed in wrinkles and our hair long and gray. ... On the porch of the house we built with our own hands... I would strum my guitar and sing the 97th love song I'd just written for her . Everything became surreal.... My mind and my heart knew she was gone... But I couldn't accept that to be reality.. I couldn't leave our house. When I was released from Adams I shook those bricks to hurry back to the home we fought tooth and nail to call our own.  We were wild and completely open with one another... I was more in love with her then ever. More attracted and enammered by her beauty and her gorgeous smile. God that smile.... The only smile I've ever been so blessed to have shine upon me .. that could light up the darkest parts of my soul.... Of my everything. We had no secrets and we traveled hand and hand without shame. It was 2007 the first time I signed my letter to Dawn with the letters L.Y.S.B.I.S.R . It stands for Love you so bad I said remember..... It's pretty much the most sincere most meaningful most important group of letters you can say to anyone... It holds more meaning then any other string of words or initials in existance . Aside from the three amazing children Dawn left behind I have never written it to anyone. That was our deal... Only to the kids. I never got to burry my wife or kiss her goodbye. I would fall asleep in my cell each night and whisper the letters L.Y.S.B.I.S R right before sleep took me to her with tears in my eyes.

Dawn and I had made all sorts of plans once we hustled our way into a home of our own. Firstly somebody needs to address the gross lack of resources for homeless women in Denver Colorado. We had years prior owned and operated a backpackers hostel and had been quite successful. We could use a similar business model but gear our establishment toward Denver's homeless women opening a non profit to be called The Skinny Pocket Inn. So let this be the first promise I break to my beautiful partner.. I plan to say L.Y.S.B.I.S.R. to the world... I plan to share our story with all who will listen  and all proceeds in excess of publishing costs will go to fund The Skinny Pocket Inn a homeless shelter in Colorado for women in need. Reciently I purchased 5 acres of land in Park County Colorado. I have been doing tons of research on green living and building materials. I strongly feel that storage container housing is the way to go. We could significantly save on building costs and focus funding on more resources for the women we shelter. The storage container housing in combination with solar power and possibly collecting rainwater as a back up reserve. We could really build a beautiful self maintaining community for women to get back on thier feet and focus on the issues in thier lives that landed them where they are as to break the cycle of hopelessness. What better way to honor my best friend then to share our story and the hope we were filled with after we were handed keys to our very own space in the world.  What better way to every day say I love you then to share L.Y.S.B.I.S.R with the world. If you have any resources or suggestions I would be thrilled and encouraged to receive them. Maybe I am foolish.. Though I honestly feel as though this path was laid out for me by a higher power. In the midst of the most terrible season of grief my life has ever tasted I found a purpose and passion that helps me move my feet. An amazing gift has been givin to me in my venture to keep the dreams Dawn & I shared alive... It's difficult to explain but somehow I've never felt closer to her then I do right now.. she will live in my heart forever and we will make this dream a reality!

story:
Short Summary

Hi, my name is Anthony Caruso III, and I have been the Publisher of The Capital Sports Report since it was founded in March 2007. 

What We Need & What You Get

The Capital Sports Report ( www.thecapitalsportsreport.com) is re-branding. Over the past 8-plus years, we’ve covered local and national events, including four Heisman Trophy ceremonies, two Little League World Series, and an Army-Navy college football game.

Once it is re-branded with a new theme, we’re going to sell photos, sell advertisements, and post more content on the site. The funds raised will be used to purchase the NewsPress theme (http://demo.d5creation.com/themes/?theme=NewsPress), plus we're going to use the funds to make it mobile accessible with apps. We'd also use the funds for apparel, equipment, and paying for the yearly expenses.

This re-branding is going to be expensive, as is running this publication on a yearly basis. Plus, with Publisher Anthony Caruso III having limited funds, we’d like your help in lifting this financial burden off of him. Any donation would be appreciated. Thanks.                

The Impact

The impact of this theme would greatly change the mindset that some have about The Capital Sports Report. 

Right now, we've having problems with getting credentials because of the way that the website looks. With the new theme, that will no longer be the issue, as we're going to be more professional. 

That would open up more opportunities that have been blocked for the time being with this theme. We can't fix the current theme, as it is broken and none of the saved changes will work, so we have to go to a new theme, and NewsPress is the perfect theme for us moving forward. 

As we have mentioned we've been successful in covering top-level events, and we hope to do that in the future. We're also a writer for the NHRA, Philadelphia Soul, Trenton Freedom, NHRA Lucas Oil, college and even high school sports. If you have a story idea that you would like for us to write about, we're willing to work with you to publish it, too. 

Risks & Challenges

The challenges are that there are so many sports websites out there. However, the thing that sets The Capital Sports Report apart from nearly all of them is that we are one of a select group of publications that get to cover the Heisman Trophy ceremony in New York City every year since 2010. 

With this challenge, we're going to be re-branding with the new theme and covering more content. This would break us away from the "blog" label that most sports teams put on websites, because they can't tell who is a "fan" and who is an actual journalist, like Mr. Caruso, who has been in this business for 13-years. 

Other Ways You Can Help

If you can't donate, could you kindly share this on your social media platforms? Maybe someone you know would be willing to donate. Thanks.

story:
Short Summary

After selling many thousands of copies in its print, eBook, and audio editions, experimental physicist Shane Stadler's debut Horror/SciFi thriller Exoskeleton (published by Dark Hall Press) has become firmly established as a modern cult classic in the United States, United Kingdom, and elsewhere around the globe.

Now you can have "first-crack" at Exoskeleton's much-anticipated sequel, receiving the new book two weeks before general release ... and at a sharp discount from post-publication list prices.


What You Get

Professional reviewers as well as reader-reviewers (for example, more than 290 raves on Goodreads alone) have hailed Exoskeleton variously as “ … a cleverly executed [blend] of science fiction, suspense, and horror … a certified dark journey into madness” (David Gammon, Horror News) and "a horrifying tale of supernatural vengeance" (Chris Hallock, Chizine). We don't want to give away the plot but - trust us, friends - the new book is even better. So act fast, because these deals are not going to last forever.


The Deal(s)

We're offering four really cool pre-order options:

  • The eBook (Kindle or ePub) edition of the work for $4.00. This represents a $5.99 (60%) discount off the initial post-publication list price of $9.99

  • The paper edition of the work together with the eBook (Kindle or ePub) for the price of $12.00. This represents a $15.99 (55%) discount off the initial combined paper/eBook post-publication list price of $28.98, and a $6.99 (36.8%) discount off the list price of the paper edition ($18.99)

  • The audio edition together with the eBook (Kindle or ePub)  for $14. This represents a $12.94 (48%) discount off the combined initial post-publication price of $26.94

  • eBook/Paper/Audio combo for $20. This represents a $25.93 (56%) discount off the combined initial retail price of $45.93

Note: eBook and paper editions will be delivered in August, and the audio edition upon publication in October.


Why Are We Doing This?

We're embarking on this special one-time pre-release offer because we want to generate buzz for the sequel before it hits the general market. We're confident you'll be just as pleased with the sequel as virtually all readers have been with Exoskeleton, and that you'll tell your friends. At least we hope you will. Anyway, that's our game.


Who the Hell Are We?

Founded October 2011, Dark Hall Press is a rising publisher of high-quality, original Horror and SciFi. We've published 14 critically-acclaimed novels and collections to date, and have more great things planned. Dark Hall Press is a subsidiary of New Street Communications, LLC, founded 2010. We are a "proudly small" endeavor, clinging tenaciously to the coast of southern Rhode Island.


Who the Hell Is Shane Stadler?

Experimental Physicist Shane Stadler teaches and conducts research at Louisiana State University.  He holds a Ph.D. from Tulane. Critics have hailed his Exoskeleton as one of the most impressive Horror debuts in recent years.


Other Ways You Can Help

Spread the word! Facebook. Twitter. You name it. And we'll be forever in your debt. Thanks so much.

story:
The River Crosser

The first book in the Worldbuilder series, features a young boy troubled by the transitory nature of his life. He grows up in the city of Detroit, struggling to learn to read in the public school system. In the midst of his troubles, He steals from scrap heaps and grocery stores to survive. During this time, the boy comes in contact with a mysterious character known only as The Garbageman, who entrusts him with a cryptic text titled The River Crosser.

Unable to read it, the boy spends the next 10 years deciphering the book.

We follow the stubborn boy as he travels through time and change, building strange devices and attempting to contact the man on the other side of "The River" for answers about his book.

Join me in this outlandish tale through some of the deepest recesses of human imagination.

An easy and relatable read without sacrificing the rewarding qualities of a true challenge! This series will not pull any punches!

Read a preview of my book, The River Crosser by clicking here.

ABOUT THE AUTHOR:
My name is Charles Dorton. I am an author who overcame his dyslexia after many years of tutoring and training both with the help of my school and privately. 

I have been working on the book The River Crosser for some time, and as it approaches time to get the book in print and published, I will require funding in order to get the professional quality-controlled product that I know is possible.

 I want to have these books made for dyslexic kids who are intermediates/beginners at reading, because when I was growing up there were very few good books for kids like me to read, with handicaps such as dyslexia, dyscalculia, and ADHD in mind.

So why should you support me?

To start, there are criminally few other authors attempting to write books with the needs of dyslexic kids in mind; including other dyslexic authors who would be suited to it. This is because a book for dyslexics would be slightly more difficult than is typical to write for kids (due to the complex formats), coupled with low awareness and empathy for the disorder.

Research has shown (From Yale's Dyslexia Research institute) that books written with rhymes, in verse, or with large amounts of poetry are more effective at getting dyslexics and other reading-troubled students to enjoy to read, as well as books with interesting artwork or spacial/shape dynamics.

The problem is that novels of this length and depth, especially for learning-troubled kids are quite the niche market. (though a necessary one, I believe, because books like these might help other learning disabled children as well.)

So, why write for Dyslexics?

Dyslexia is a problem for 17% of the U.S population, and even though there are so many of us, (the most represented in number learning disorder) there is critically low public support.

  • According to the same statistics from Yale's center for dyslexia research, 10% of the population (over 16) and 2-3 children in every classroom has dyslexia to some degree. 4% of students are severely dyslexic.

  • Only 24% of parents believe that dyslexia gets recognized - across the whole education system in the U.S.

  • Without support, individuals may suffer with problems in literacy and numeracy and may suffer long term damage to their self esteem because of deficits in their processing differences that they find tricks around, but will always struggle with without the proper strategies.

  • It is not compulsory to learn about dyslexia in teacher training. 55% of parents feel that teachers failed to recognize a problem in their child’s development.


So how does the book help dyslexics?

My mission with The River Crosser is to entertain and interest intermediate and beginning readers, while teaching them critical thinking strategies, as well as promoting empathy for dyslexic students who see things a little differently from their peers, because I was one, and I know how hard of a position it is.

When I was growing up the books they gave us were incredibly boring. I remember that for all the pain that reading caused me, it was not worth it to get through a half hour long sentence just to read "The cat jumped over the fence." I needed more complex works to satisfy me. What ended up helping me most were poems by Edgar Allen Poe, Shakespeare, and other verse-inclined writers and authors. Things that I read, and were worth thinking about for a time.

On this theory, I set out to find out if there was something to that idea, and what I found was interesting;

There's a little bonus to the research as well. Books that are easier for dyslexics to read are also easier for non-dyslexics to read, and books that help dyslexics learn to read have been proven to help non-dyslexics learn to read at an even faster rate. What is a crutch to us is rocket boots to you!

So what will the book provide exactly?

  1. It is written almost entirely in verse, with elements of hip-hop and poetry to keep the readers interested.
  2. It helps the reader to identify their difference in perspective without damage to their self esteem.
  3. It provides the dyslexic reader with a sandbox world, with hard limits that get explained thoroughly. It provides philosophical and ethical questions to be answered within the context of the world; a place separate from reality, but close in complexity. What may seem trivial to you, but will be an invaluable tool for dyslexic kids who will grow to rely upon abductive reasoning  to get by.

  4. The books will support and encourage outside of the box thinking that leads to innovation.
     
  5. It is as useful for teachers and parents as well as students for learning to empathize with dyslexia, due to the nature of the protagonist's own disorder.

  6. It teaches kids that there are always alternative paths to acquiring the information they need to keep learning, because dyslexic children must find where a piece of information "fits" on their current model to understand. When teachers they look to for guidance aren't providing it, it is important that dyslexics find alternative means to piece together the image and continue learning.

What I Need & What You Will Get!

The time has come to act. We need a new empire of interesting books to inspire dyslexic kids to read, and building an empire costs money!

I NEED EDITORS.
I NEED OTHER AUTHORS.
I NEED ARTISTS.
I NEED A BOOK PRINTER.

So, What is the money for? 

The first $2000 of funding is for printing paperback copies of The River Crosser, publishing fees, ISBN fees, design, and trademarking fees. These should be printed and ready 3 months after the close of the campaign with a high quality binding and artwork, the goal being to be the first product of Tsunami Publishing.

If I raise more than $2500 I'll pay the masterful jazz musician Benito Vena for an ambient soundtrack as well as for mastering the Audiobooks. 

The Impact

Help kids around the world with dyslexia learn to love reading.

So what are the risks & challenges?

No matter how much money I raise, I'm going to be finishing and publishing the book. If I get less than the goal, it will take me a bit longer.

Are there Other Ways You Can Help?

Maybe you don't have a dollar. But you can still Pass this along to everyone you know. Share this on forums, social media, share this in guild chat and in ranked games of league of legends. Wherever you can get the word out.


Sponsored by


Back with BTC! I accept bitcoin:

story:
Hi there! We are the Live Love team from Belgium, a synergy of 7 people who all share the same passion; bringing the LIVE LOVE TECHNOLOGY into the world. 

Now you probably wonder what the LIVE LOVE TECHNOLOGY is all about?
It is a unique technology designed by Kaat Jacobs that provides you the manual of your bodily system. We were taught many things in school but not how to steer our bodies and create our lives from within. We share 15 years of experience on this field. 

Based on our own experiences we have found that this technology is the ultimate missing link to empowerment and manifesting a healthy, constructive life. Not only did we witness this in our own lives, but also in the lives of the many who applied the technology through us. Now imagine: if everyone in the world applies this technology, we all create happy and healthy lives - what a harmonious world we create together!

We write this book voluntarily out of service for every living creature on this planet and our dear planet. 

If you choose to fund this campaign, we are able to release this book onto the world and spread the LIVE LOVE TECHNOLOGY for all beings to benefit. As soon as 144.000 people reach this consciousness, the rest of the world shifts along with them. Yes, you read this right! The entire population will shift into constructive living.

goes to: 

- printing costs: 1000 books English + 1000 books Dutch = € 7.500
- translation costs from Dutch to English: € 2000
- wrapping costs: € 1000

(Discover our unique perks)


You probably wonder 'why not an e-book, why a tangible book'? Well, simply because a book is full of words and a word carries a frequency. When you touch a book you allow the frequency to enter your body and the frequency to get in tune with your body. This enhances the absorption of the information in the book into the brain. So what we describe will get easier into your subconscious. Because in order to fully integrate this natural way of living the information has to go to the subconscious. 

Can you imagine the vast impact it has if everyone learns to optimally steer their body and master their emotions? Then nobody projects their emotions on the outer world and there will be no more war and destructivity in this world. 

We successfully reached already thousands of people who changed their lives and their relationships. We are amazed by how fast people transform from disconnected, selfish, taking creatures to connected, sharing, loving beings. This is our wish for us, you and the world. 

Please share this campaign.
With Love, 
the Live Love team 

____________________________________________________________________________


Hallo liefdevolle mens! Wij zijn het Live Love team uit België, een synergie van 7 mensen die dezelfde passie delen: het in de wereld brengen van de LIVE LOVE TECHNOLOGY. 

Je bent waarschijnlijk benieuwd waar de LIVE LOVE TECHNOLOGY voor staat? 

Wel, dat is een unieke techniek ontwikkeld door Kaat Jacobs, die jouw handleiding is tot de besturing van je lichamelijk systeem. Men heeft ons veel dingen geleerd op school maar niet hoe je lichaam te besturen en je leven te creëren van binnenuit. Wij beschikken over 15 jaar ervaring in dit veld. 

Gebaseerd op onze eigen ondervindingen hebben we ontdekt dat deze techniek de ultieme missing link is tot bekrachtiging en het manifesteren van een gezond en constructief leven. We hebben het niet enkel ondervonden in onze eigen levens. We zien het ook gebeuren bij de velen die de door ons doorgegeven techniek toepassen. 

Stel je nu voor: als iedereen in de wereld deze techniek toepast en zijn/haar lichaam optimaal bestuurt, dan komt iedereen daardoor in een gelukkig en gezond leven terecht. Dan kunnen we niet anders dan een harmonieuze wereld creëren samen! 

Wij schrijven dit boek vrijwillig vanuit dienstbaarheid voor elk levend wezen op deze planeet en de planeet zelf. 

Als jij mee deze campagne steunt, dan zijn wij in staat dit boek in de wereld te brengen en de LIVE LOVE TECHNOLOGY te verspreiden zodat iedereen het kan toepassen in zijn/haar leven en er mee van kan genieten. Wanneer 144.000 mensen in dit bewustzijn komen, dan volgt het collectieve van de wereld automatisch. Ja, je leest het juist. De gehele wereldbevolking zal dan draaien naar een constructief leven. 

gaat naar: 

  • print kosten: 1000 boeken Nederlands + 1000 boeken Engels = € 7.500
  • vertalingskosten van Nederlands naar Engels: € 2000
  • inpakkosten: € 1000

(Ontdek onze unieke perks)



Je vraagt waarschijnlijk ‘waarom geen e-book, waarom een tastbaar boek?’ Wel, dit is eenvoudigweg omdat een boek vol woorden staat en een woord een frequentie met zich draagt. Als je een boek aanraakt sta je de frequentie toe je lichaam binnen te stromen en ermee in overeenstemming te komen. Dit vergemakkelijkt de opname van de informatie in het boek in de hersenen. Dus wat we schrijven zal op die manier vlotter in je onderbewuste geraken. Want om deze natuurlijke levensstijl ten volle te integreren is het noodzakelijk dat de informatie in je onderbewuste terechtkomt. Kan je je de impact inbeelden als iedereen leert om zijn/haar lichaam optimaal te besturen en zijn/haar emoties meester te zijn? Dan projecteert niemand nog emoties op de buitenwereld en dan vallen oorlog en destructiviteit weg in deze wereld. 

We hebben reeds duizenden mensen bereikt die hun leven en relaties herschapen hebben. We vinden het fantastisch te zien hoe snel mensen transformeren van afgescheiden, egoïstische, nemende wezens naar verbonden, delende, liefhebbende wezens. Dit is wat wij wensen voor ons, voor jou en deze wereld. 

Deel alstublieft deze campagne. 

Met Liefde, 

het Live Love team

(Ontdek onze unieke perks)





Je vraagt waarschijnlijk ‘waarom geen e-book, waarom een tastbaar boek?’ Wel, dit is eenvoudigweg omdat een boek vol woorden staat en een woord een frequentie met zich draagt. Als je een boek aanraakt sta je de frequentie toe je lichaam binnen te stromen en ermee in overeenstemming te komen. Dit vergemakkelijkt de opname van de informatie in het boek in de hersenen. Dus wat we schrijven zal op die manier vlotter in je onderbewuste geraken. Want om deze natuurlijke levensstijl ten volle te integreren is het noodzakelijk dat de informatie in je onderbewuste terechtkomt. Kan je je de impact inbeelden als iedereen leert om zijn/haar lichaam optimaal te besturen en zijn/haar emoties meester te zijn? Dan projecteert niemand nog emoties op de buitenwereld en dan vallen oorlog en destructiviteit weg in deze wereld. 
We hebben reeds duizenden mensen bereikt die hun leven en relaties herschapen hebben. We vinden het fantastisch te zien hoe snel mensen transformeren van afgescheiden, egoïstische, nemende wezens naar verbonden, delende, liefhebbende wezens. Dit is wat wij wensen voor ons, voor jou en deze wereld. 
Deel alstublieft deze campagne. 
Met Liefde, 
het Live Love team

story:
LIT in the LOU is JUST days away,

October 2 - 4, 2015

LITERATURE IN(FORMS) OUR LIVES:

        Race, Gender, Equality and Religion.        

 

The Julia Goldstein Early Childhood Center

737 Kingsland Avenue (YES, we are indoors!)

Celebrating authors across the region. Special guests from across the nation. 

Free parking at Delmar and Kingsland . Handicap accessible building with handicap parking

Your contributions will provide:

  • Authors' honorarium, travel and accommodations.
  • Rental for the Julia Goldstein Center
  • Promotion expenses
  • Security and Services
Our total budget for this amazing weekend is only $16,000.
We need you to help us with $6000.  Sponsorships are available by contacting Nancy Hughes at 314-973-6875.
   Share this, give what you can, give as often as you can.
You get a tax deduction this year!!!!

 updated author list presenters and panelists: Caroline Fredrickson, Carol Swartout Klein, Eugene Redmond, Jane Ellen Ibur, DuEwa Frazier, Jose Faus, Miguel Morales, Christi Griffin, John Wright, Aaron Williams, Michael McClymond, Terry Mulligan, Margaret O'Gorman, Ronit Stahl,
MK Stallings, Bill Tammeus, T. Daniel Wright and more.

Festivities will open with a NO Fuss Gala Event on Oct. 2nd at University City's elegant 5th floor banquet room and an awards ceremony on Friday evening at 7 pm. This years winner of the Tradition of Literary Excellence Award (funded by the U. CityArts & Letters Commission) is Poet, Jane O. Wayne who will read at the event.    $25 at brownpapertickets.com LIT in the LOU Gala Event October 2, 2015 or at the door. (please purchase in advance if you are able)

THE SCHEDULE: (click here to download)

The weekend: Festival activities continue (indoors!) with four guest author presentations, readings, panel discussions and book signings throughout the day both Saturday and Sunday. The schedule of authors and panels is posted Lit in the Lou 2015 festival schedule.  Exhibitor/vendor booths along with the Alliance of Independent Bookstores will be ready to greet you.  AND special signed author T-shirts are waiting!

Sunday evening will close LIT in the LOU with an "AFTER Party" with author readings and an open mic at the Eclipse Bar and Restaurant with the Open mic in the party room, and the mingling in the bar area.  Get your PASSPORT TO LITERATURE STL passport and party info. and visit the 1) St Louis Brick City Festival, 2)The Small Press Expo, and "us".  GET STAMPED. Then with your four event stamps get in free.    $10 charge/donation to Ready Readers,


Who's running this show?  The Saint Louis Literary Consortium, a non-profit 501(c)3 (finally) and its founding partners including, Amphora Press, Blank Slate Press, NanHughesArts, PenUltimate Press and Walrus Publishing.

Supporting organizations include: The Independent Bookstore Alliance, the University City Public Library, the MO Writers Guild, Sisters in Crime, local authors, literary orgs, businesses, and many more!   Exhibitor/Vendor forms here: $45. (far right column)

story:
Texas is its own nation of books—and it deserves its own book reviews and news.

We’re home to more than 250 independent bookstores and 150 chain outlets, including the flagship stores of Half Price Books and Hastings. We can claim 

  • More than 700 public libraries
  • Top-notch university creative writing programs
  • More than 50 independent publishers and university presses
  • A dozen annual book festivals, statewide and regional
  • More than 100 community writers’ groups
  • Thousands of authors, and
  • Tens of thousands of books about the Lone Star State.

And yet 93% of Texas readers live in markets with no dedicated books coverage to help them discover the books they most want to read.


On February 2, 2015, Lone Star Literary Life popped up to change all that. We launched on Groundhog Day with a robust subscriber list of Texas booksellers, publishers, libraries, authors, and, most important of all, readers.

We pledged to deliver thoughtful reviews of new Texas books, first-person profiles and interviews of Texas authors, news and coverage of awards, festivals, and author tours, and the state's only comprehensive calendar of book events — every week.

We publish on Sundays, about the time you’ve finished with your New York Times crossword puzzle and are settling in to your second cup of coffee. We’re the de facto books page for the largest state in the continental US.

And we’re just getting started.

Come and Fund It.

It doesn’t take a mint to run a first-class online news outlet these days. But it takes something. We pay our reviewers and contributors fairly. We send correspondents into the field to cover news. We edit and produce a richly featured site and newsletter every week. We design ads, blog tours, podcasts, and other tools that help promote Texas books. Just as with any newspaper, all this takes money. But we don’t charge for subscriptions, and we’d like to keep it that way.

In 2016 we're counting on the help of the bookish Texas community to help us take our publication to the next level. Here’s what we’ll do with your $20,016 (twenty-sixteen, get it?) in contributions:

  • Upgrade our site platform to bring you faster page loads and timely updates ($8K)
  • Expand our coverage of book reviews and book events you want to know about ($8K)
  • Grow our subscriber list, to enhance the social community of Texas authors, publishers, and readers ($3K)
  • Participate in events like the Texas Library Association and the Texas Book Festival, to meet readers and authors in person ($1K)
  • Plus, we're giving out some really cool perks for book lovers.


Bringing you Texas books from Beaumont to Borger. Terlingua to Texarkana. Amarillo to Austin.

In spring 2015 we profiled the state’s Top Ten Bookish Destinations — and the crowds went wild. Travelers enjoyed the literary travelogues of Texas cities such as Cormac McCarthy’s El Paso, O. Henry’s Austin, Elmer Kelton's San Angelo, Katherine Anne Porter’s Kyle.

Since then readers have enjoyed our Top Texas Beach Reads (for adults and younger readers), All-Time Best Texas Football Books, Christian Literature Focus, and Top Ten Texas Fiction and Nonfiction of the Year lists.

In our first year we've run insightful interviews with writers from Sarah Bird to Stephen Harrigan. Ray Benson to Sandra Brown. And yes, even Hank the Cowdog.

Your contribution will keep great features like these coming.

Other ways you can help.

If you’re not in a position to support our campaign financially, we understand. Lone Star Literary Life is free to subscribers, because we want to reach the greatest audience of readers possible. You can help by 

  • Spreading the word to everyone you know as well as following us on Facebook, Twitter, LinkedIn, and Pinterest
  • Signing up for our weekly news bulletin
  • Sharing these goals via social media — and sharing your thoughts with us.

Check us out at LoneStarLiterary.com.
And thanks in advance for supporting Texas books.

story:
• Miles of Files - When Paul Panepinto finds out that his boss is stealing from their Tampa company's 401(k) plan, he has to make a decision: try to stop the criminal at the risk of losing his own job, or keep his mouth shut and try to live with himself.

  • Jana - Because of her sexual orientation, Jana Odessi loses her child care job. It's not until she is halfway across the country on a road trip with her partner that she realizes she must return to her home in Connecticut and find resolution for a court case that almost wasn't.

  • Brothers' Hand - Small town upstate New Yorker Jerome Brothers loses his hand in a tragic fall, then falls even harder for his physical therapist. Can even the most romantic one-armed man get the girl...if she doesn't get his full cooperation in therapy?

Welcome. I am extremely excited to be launching this campaign: Three...Yes, THREE...Novels! Having spent years working on these works of fiction, I am proud to be making all of them available to the public this year. This Indiegogo campaign will enable me to get them to print before the end of 2015...both in E-book form and paperback.

Please note: I chose "Flexible Funding," so all funds contributed WILL go toward the project. Whatever the total after 60 days, ALL perks will be fulfilled...guaranteed. I'm sure you will enjoy reading the novels!

story:
Short Summary


  •  I am an English teacher from Slovenia. I am really passionate to acheive my goal which is publishing my book -THE GAMBLE OF LIFE. I love writing and I have already written a book about teenagers www.schoolisapain.com A couple of years ago I had met a man from India on the internet and we became virtual friends. After he had read my first book he asked me if I could write a book about his life. He claimed that my writing style was really appealing and persuasive. I was flattered and I started gathering the data about his life events. Anyway, describing his life rises and falls is accompanied by a lot of wise and spiritual thinking. So, my purpose is getting the fund for publishing this special book.
  •   I want to convey the message that we are all ONE and that our life experiences are supposed to teach us how to become a better human being, how to help the world, how to feel as a part of a unity and how to be compassionate to the whole world. This acknowledgement should get into everybody's heart and make the world a better place to live on, where we are surrounded by beings reflecting unconditional love only. It sounds surreal but it is possible to learn and experience this attitude which will save our caving world. So, I think it is inevitable for this message to be revealed to every single being in the world.
  •  My heart is glowing with pride and joy because it is able to give something healing to the world.


What We Need & What You Get


  • All the funding is supposed to be used to print and sell the books all round the planet. One copy into each house in every corner of our lonely planet. My bible for everyone.
  • There are so many warm and encouraging tips for life that no one will lose faith any more. Life is our guide and we shoud trust it. Even though we sometimes think that the situation that we got ourselves into is hopeless and tragic, we must be aware that whatever it is, it is just meant to be. So, there is no BAD, everything is GOOD. The mysteries of life are here to be discovered. "What are they?" I can hear you say...The answer, my friend is blowing in the book, the answer is blowing in this book...
  •  I will reach my entire goal!!! I am determined and passionate!!! There is no EGO in this project, it is just the opposite: "Let the world flourish" no matter who is to be praised for. We are all tiny bits who create the infinite unity. The message is clear: "Every one should contribute his part, fulfill his mission and participate to the growth and prosperity. "How to find what we are sent to this world for?" that is now a question. Anyway, I have already told you:"The answer my friend is blowing in the book .....and it is sent from up above..."

The Impact


  •  After reading this book,The Gamble of Life, the world will be as ONE and people will start thinking with their hearts.
  •  I have already written a witty little book about school and teenagers. Being a teacher for 28 years I could describe the real life situations and I succeeded. My book is read all over the world. www.schoolisapain.com
  •  I sincerely only want to awake the world and save it from drowning.

Risks & Challenges

  •  I write with my heart.
  •  When there is the heart there is no problem.

Other Ways You Can Help


  •  I have contacted some publishers but I got the answer that it is not profitable enough and that they are not interested. I hope some people with open hearts will recognise my open heart and help me spread LOVE unconditionaly.....so it will be in the air in every single corner of the world.
  • If you can't help any other way, you can at least spread the rumour about the message and use the Indiegogo share tools!

And that's all there is to it.

story:
What is GetBooks?

GetBooks is a website for Hebrew e-books. We turn to crowdfunding in order to be able to digitize more books in Hebrew, both old and new, and make them accessible as e-books form all over the world. Support us now, and get whichever books that you like from our website. For more details on our project see below, or visit our website: getbooks.co.il

Getbooks is not only a company but also a vision.

Hi, we are Paul and Ben Masenjnik, brothers, Israeli entrepreneurs and sworn book enthusiasts.

We grew up in a home that considered reading as a noble activity, the very thing that define one`s cultural identity.

As children, we enjoyed reading the Russian literature classics and after making aliyah in 1990 we were presented with Hebrew and English literature as well.

We used to read all the time, everywhere. We read at home, in school, and even during our army service late at night, under the flashlight while the rest of our platoon were asleep. Reading for us is a necessity, a basic need.

Therefore, when digital books were presented to the public, we immediately embraced the concept - an access to all the books in the world, all the time, everywhere! What could be better?

(We even got our mom a Kindle for her birthday. She said it was the best gift she ever got.)

After a few years of reading digitally we suddenly realized that Paul was only reading books in Russian, while Ben was only reading books in English.

The reason was plain: there were no digital books in Hebrew.

As years went by, we became a father and an uncle, and realized the technology was even worse when it came to children’s books.

This was a turning point in our journey. As multilinguals, we were highly aware of the importance of language in children’s lives, and the immense role it plays in their socialization.

Not all Jewish children grow up in Israel. However, even in the diaspora, Jews and Israelis teach their children to read and write Hebrew. They do so because Hebrew texts have been connecting us all for thousands of years, no matter where we live.

Time has come to bridge this gap, and so www.getbooks.co.il was created.




Funding

We have worked for nearly 18 months in partnership with top technology experts, designers, publishing houses and publishing industry professionals to develop the highest quality website, mobile application and digitization process.

We've tested different procedures until we found the right, effective way to convert books in Hebrew and be sure it will work on any possible platform.

Now we need your help to bring this project to the world. With your help, we will be able to convert thousands of the most important books in Jewish history, and to advance the development of digitizing children’s books.

By contributing to our campaign, you will be standing by Hebrew and Jewish culture, for yourself - and for generations to come.

Getbook’s Vision

Our dream is for Hebrew speakers worldwide to be able to read any book in Hebrew, anywhere, anytime. To make this dream come true, we intend to digitize every Hebrew book possible.

Books in Hebrew play an important role in the Hebrew speaker's identity – Israelis abroad who wants their children to be familiar with the books and authors they grew up on, Jews wishing to keep in touch with the newest religious publications or even culture researchers.

However, due to the difficulties of digitizing Hebrew books only a small percentage of its literature is available as e-books.

Our dream is for Hebrew speakers around the world to be able to read any book in Hebrew anywhere, anytime. In order to make this dream come true, we intend to digitize every Hebrew book possible.



For this purpose, we have developed a specialized and unique digitizing process that deals with the challenges that Hebrew presents. We tackled the issues of right to left reading, special encoding and presentation and implemented it on various mobile devices and in numerous technologies.

We hope and believe we can set up a wide and inclusive Hebrew library to be accessible worldwide and contribute to preserving the treasures of the Hebrew language and Jewish culture in our technological era.

The digitizing process has begun many months ago. We have already converted more than a thousand books, but we still have a long way to go. We will use most of the contributions to digitize the books, and to advance the development of technologies that will enable us to digitize children’s books.


Risks & Challenges

We have done our very best to forecast the scope of this project and the book demand in Israel and abroad, and create a solid plan.

Many of the our risks and challenges were already met and dealt with over the last 18 months of operation, but as with any new venture, there may be some bumps along the way.

Our biggest challenge seems to be dealing with the huge scope of this project. This means we need a trained staff for the digitization process and quality assurance, and also the cooperation of publishing houses, archives and academic institutions.

If we hit any bumps along the way, you'll be the first to know. We'll inform you with the current status, its causes and our action plan for overcoming the obstacle. If at any point you have questions about our risks or challenges, give us a shout and contact us at support@getbooks.co.il - we would be happy to hear from you. 

Helping the campaign for free 

We are aware that not everyone is able to financially support the campaign. In that case, we would appreciate your help by spreading the news of this campaign with your friends and community through mailing lists, social networks and various media and media outlets.

For any further information, contact us at  support@getbooks.co.il and visit us at www.getbooks.co.il

What is GetBooks?
GetBooks is a website for Hebrew e-books. We turn to crowdfunding in order to be able to digitize more books in Hebrew, both old and new, and make them accessible as e-books form all over the world. Support us now, and get whichever books that you like from our website. For more details on our project see below, or visit our website: getbooks.co.il
Getbooks is not only a company but also a vision.
Hi, we are Paul and Ben Masenjnik, brothers, Israeli entrepreneurs and sworn book
enthusiasts. 
We grew up in a home that considered reading as a noble activity,
the very thing that define one`s cultural identity. 
As children, we enjoyed reading the Russian literature
classics and after making aliyah in 1990 we were presented with Hebrew and
English literature as well.
We used to read all the time, everywhere. We read at home,
in school, and even during our army service late at night, under the flashlight
while the rest of our platoon were asleep. Reading for us is a necessity, a
basic need.
Therefore, when digital books were presented to the public,
we immediately embraced the concept - an access to all the books in the world, all the time,
everywhere! What could be better?
(We even got our mom a Kindle for her birthday. She said it
was the best gift she ever got.)
After a few years of reading digitally we suddenly
realized that Paul was only reading books in Russian, while Ben was only
reading books in English. 
The reason was plain: there were no digital books in
Hebrew.
As years went by, we became a father and an uncle, and
realized the technology was even worse when it came to children’s books. 
This was a turning point in our journey. As multilinguals, we
were highly aware of the importance of language in children’s lives, and the immense
role it plays in their socialization. 
Not all Jewish children grow up in Israel. However, even in
the diaspora, Jews and Israelis teach their children to read and write Hebrew. They
do so because Hebrew texts have been connecting us all for thousands of years, no
matter where we live. 
Time has come to bridge this gap, and so www.getbooks.co.il was created.




Funding 
  
We have worked for nearly 18 months in partnership with top technology
experts, designers, publishing houses and publishing industry professionals to
develop the highest quality website, mobile application and digitization process.

We've tested different procedures until we found the right,
effective way to convert books in Hebrew and be sure it will work on any
possible platform. 
Now we need your help to bring this project to the world. With your help, we will be able to convert thousands of the most important books in Jewish
history, and to advance the development of digitizing children’s books. 
By contributing to our campaign, you will be standing by
Hebrew and Jewish culture, for yourself - and for generations to come.   
Getbook’s Vision
Our dream is for Hebrew speakers worldwide to be able to
read any book in Hebrew, anywhere, anytime. To make this dream come true, we
intend to digitize every Hebrew book possible.
Books in Hebrew play an important role in the Hebrew speaker's identity – Israelis abroad who wants their children to be familiar with the books and authors
they grew up on, Jews wishing to keep in touch with the newest religious
publications or even culture researchers. 
However, due to the difficulties of digitizing Hebrew books only a small percentage
of its literature is available as e-books.
Our dream is for Hebrew speakers around the world to be able
to read any book in Hebrew anywhere, anytime. In order to make this dream come
true, we intend to digitize every Hebrew book possible.




For this purpose, we have developed a specialized and unique
digitizing process that deals with the challenges that Hebrew presents. We
tackled the issues of right to left reading, special encoding and presentation and
implemented it on various mobile devices and in numerous technologies.
We hope and believe we can set up a wide and inclusive Hebrew
library to be accessible worldwide and contribute to preserving the treasures
of the Hebrew language and Jewish culture in our technological era.
The digitizing process has begun many months ago.
We have already converted more than a thousand books, but we still have a long
way to go. We will use most of the contributions to digitize the books, and to advance the development of technologies that will enable
us to digitize children’s books.




Risks & Challenges  
We have done our very best to forecast the scope of this
project and the book demand in Israel and abroad, and create a solid plan. 
Many of the our risks and challenges were already met and
dealt with over the last 18 months of operation, but as with any new venture,
there may be some bumps along the way. 
Our biggest challenge seems to be dealing with the huge
scope of this project. This means we need a trained staff for the digitization
process and quality assurance, and also the cooperation of publishing houses,
archives and academic institutions. 
If we hit any bumps along the way, you'll be the first to know. We'll inform you with the current status, its
causes and our action plan for overcoming the obstacle. If at any point you
have questions about our risks or challenges, give us a shout and contact us at support@getbooks.co.il - we would be happy to hear from you. 

 
   
Helping the campaign for free  
We are aware that not everyone is able to financially support
the campaign. In that case, we would appreciate your help by spreading the news
of this campaign with your friends and community through mailing lists, social
networks and various media and media outlets. 
For any further information, contact us at  support@getbooks.co.il and visit us at www.getbooks.co.il

story:
A true story of a magical, mystical journey across Singapore, Pakistan, Malaysia and Bali. 

It is filled with thought-provoking theories, puzzles and paradoxes for the unraveling of the Keys to the Golden Door of the New World.

Written with a fluid literary style, through her memoir, the author allows readers to observe a narrative tapestry of technology, mathematics, geometry, philosophy, psychology, sociology, literature and spirituality. 

This book is a significant literary undertaking for a Technologist consisting of 404 pages (20 Chapters) of experiences and discoveries, all interwoven into the journey. It also includes over 25 poems with great depth and meaning, and illustrated with her own sketches and paintings.

Who should read this book?

It offers an inspirational and educational reading journey for every adult from all walks of life, particularly appealing to the high-minded and those with an unquenchable curiosity.

-------------------------------------------------------------------------

What is the objective of this crowd-fund?

With this crowdfund,  based on what you choose, you get the book in signed well in advance, the memorabalia, and lots of other benefits. Since you pay a little more than what the cost of the book will be on the stores, you become both a "buyer" and "contributor". This is because you believe and support this project and would like to see your extra contributions be used for the intended marketing. You are investing in extending the reach to as wide a market as possible.

-------------------------------------------------------------------------


The Important Endorsements 

This thought-provoking book that has Forewords written by the freedom fighter in his younger days, and former Chairman of Scotts Holdings, the distinguished Mr Ameerali Jumabhoy; as well as Dr Eric Wilding who is the Professor of Language & Religion at Centennial College, Toronto, Canada. What's more, the Editorial Advisor is well known Singapore author and columnist of the New Nation - Mickey Chiang, author of the book "Fitting Fit". 

"Tahira has so brilliantly portrayed her experiences and the world we live in is a testament to her clarity of thought, her tenacity of spirit and her honest objectivity. Readers will find this an accessible account of a life which is far from ordinary." ~ Ameerali R. Jumabhoy

"With a fluid literary style, she allows readers to observe a narrative tapestry of technology, mathematics, geometry, philosophy, psychology, sociology, literature and spirituality. There are encounters that will challenge empirically minded readers. " ~ Dr Eric Wilding


A little more about the book

You as the reader will join hands with the Author in uncovering the Keys to the Golden Door toward the aspirations of the New World. Enjoy the stories and the experiences, empower yourself with the useful theories, get access to mind-altering and life-changing information that can only take you forward. 

Tahira Amir Khan is a technology entrepreneur who felt confined within the old world of the current and a craving for the new. Out of sheer interest, she began a journey studying the topic of planetary civilizations, when halfway through something else took over. A barreling of experiences from stigmata, supernatural experiences in Singapore and Pakistan, divine encounters while in Malaysia, revelatory messages as she explored the nature in Bali and more. A zealous unfolding impacting her life so greatly, that she began to feel that it was clearly the Hand of God intervening to relay a greater message not just for her, but all of Mankind.

More from the 1st Foreword by Ameerali R. Jumabhoy

"Whilst reporting on what can be succinctly described as a profound and moving set of experiences, Tahira Amir Khan manages to maintain a close relationship with the reader, bringing them back to her true message, in the heart of every chapter. When you encounter each chapter, at first the message seems to whisper to you, so softly that you may not hear it if you do not pay close enough attention. As you delve further and you read with concentration, you pick up on Tahira’s perceptiveness and delicacy of language that make this book the joy to read that it is. 
There are too many paeans to the power of spirituality that do not resonate with contemporary life. This book is not one of them. Tahira relates her experiences in a way that endears you to her and at the same time challenges your perceptions on the way the world is viewed by modern society. She augments her hypothesis with scientific explanations which bridge the gap between the seen and unseen. Her vision of society is also a model that has universal application and builds on common themes of morality that are often forgotten in modern society. The chapters in this book serve as a blueprint as to how to live a more calm, peaceful life imbued with a spiritual awareness and a strong but quiet sense of resilience. 
The greatest legacy of this book is one of the focus on Unity. Unity through the intimacy with God as well as through the interconnectedness of the world we live in today. That Tahira has so brilliantly portrayed her experiences and the world we live in is a testament to her clarity of thought, her tenacity of spirit and her honest objectivity. Readers will find this an accessible account of a life which is far from ordinary"

An abstract from the Preface :-

"Commanding Voice, 'God is sending a lot of messages to a lot of people right now!' 

I was completely alone at the time. Whose voice was this? Shocked and startled, little did I realize that there was so much more to come. A river  of mind-altering communiques cascading through words, visions and surreal encounters. Month after month, year upon year.

At first I could not understand why, but over time I began to see its underlying purpose. I was simply  receiving what I had asked for. I had asked an umpteen number of questions over the years. Somehow I was ready for the downpour of answers now. 

The blinders came off, comprehension came naturally and the Truth that there existed and entirely new mode of thinking became palpable in March 2014. A fortuitous vision that set precedence for everything unfolded from there onward. The vision of the Golden Door.

Around the Golden Door was a circumference of many other doors, which though, were as mere shadows in comparison to the magnificence and grandeur of the Golden Door. The Golden Door was closed. I questioned why this door was shown to me. If there were Keys to opening this door, what were they? 

I imagined God sculpting the Keys. Without these Keys, we  could  continue to go around in circles, repeating the same mistakes endlessly  until we got it right. I was trying to make sense of it all at least in my own life moving up (or down) an imaginary scale. If this New World was through the Golden Door, would I be part of it?"

                                                                                                    (sketched by the Author)

 

There were the visitations
The Saints in White, 
 
Of the Ancient, the Current and the Future.
The flood of revelations,
The puzzles and the paradoxes. 


More from the 2nd Foreword by Dr Eric Wilding

"With a head full of ideas, a heart full of dreams and eyes full of visions; the author traces her own development with a vulnerable transparency. Each chapter is peppered with encounters of people—both old and young—who serve as mentors, inspiring her growth as a person. She is willing to look wherever the light is guiding her. The journey is not simply subjective; Tahira grounds her experiences in the latest scientific knowledge, while simultaneously allowing ancient wisdom to be part of the foundation.

With a fluid literary style, she allows readers to observe a narrative tapestry of technology, mathematics, geometry, philosophy, psychology, sociology, literature and spirituality. There are encounters that will challenge empirically minded readers. 

Tahira Amir Khan is also an Innovator-Futurist. She envisions a world where we have learned to confront and overcome our anxieties, fears and animosities—replacing negative emotions with positive ones. This approach can help impact multiple sectors of societies. The technologies she sees can be used to aid humanity in its development of knowledge and compassion. The focus on healing the whole person (body, soul and spirit) could have implications for healing diverse cultures : families, businesses, religions, countries and ecosystems. What we view as the miraculous or supernatural could be a regular occurrence as we come to understand personal and collective identities and their mutual interdependence. 

The journey comes towards a climax as Tahira soars in mystical encounters. The flow of the journey is guided by a deeply relational love. There is a joy and peace as she becomes increasingly aware of the selfless Unity that she has with nature, animals, humans and God. Moreover, she regards this as a praxiological possibility for others. The transformation of the author may be transferred to the readers as they joins hands with the author to experience walking through the Golden Door."


Hear from the Reviewers

 "Fantastic book, a great tool, a great source of strength and motivation."  ~ Yassmen Kichlu, Holistic Wellness Guru

 "A refreshing account of living a spiritual journey." ~ Julia Fraser, Film Producer

"Very magical as it unfolds. I love how all the characters are introduced and then weaved to the central core of “our intimacy with God”, how each plays a part in unraveling the story. It is very powerful and written with immense control, yet freedom of a style that is engaging and thought provoking. I felt the passion and energy as I read, and I just love the flawless storytelling, weaving and weaving that intricate carpet of life on earth." ~ Harjit Kaur, Senior Lecturer

 "Prophecy will be fulfilled & pass away. As for knowledge, it will pass away & lose its value & be superseded by Truth. But love never fails, never fades out, or becomes obsolete, or comes to an end. This book is written by a woman who loves you enough to lay her life open before you." ~ Kristen Daria Zuriel, Missionary

 "The wealth of knowledge and experience Tahira shares in this book as she explores the choices we have for our future inspires one to start thinking about his/her own. An important book to read in the journey of self-discovery." ~  Sanmuga Thavamoorthy, Online Magazine Editor

"This book is very powerful and thought provoking. Tahira is right when she says “There are somethings that can only be received from God in silence”. Through the experiences, I see this. Thank you. Thank you for sharing and keeping things simple enough for us to see and feel" ~  Shikha Tuli, Educationist 


Now Hear from the Editors

An abstract from the review by Adil Naeem (Co-Editor):-

" ... Every so often, the "powers that be" send particularly unique, courageous and gifted individuals to help us in our journey towards universal awareness and self-discovery, hopefully managing to convince us along the way that these are one and the same thing. Or to put it another way, the not so different aspects of the One. For a greater part of her life Tahira has gravitated towards cerebral pursuits. Mathematics, technology, spirituality, art and entrepreneurial imperatives define not only the paradigm of her passions but the focal point of an instinctive drive. Several years ago certain encounters of a very unusual kind had her question the status quo and at a crossroads in life choose a path rife with risk and sacrifice, to answer the call of a higher purpose.

Within these chapters Tahira shares discoveries, interactions, illuminations and revelations and delivers the message she was meant to deliver. So dear Reader , proceed with an open heart. Let Tahira show you the rainbow within the mist. At this crossroad let Tahira gently and lovingly, nudge you towards a path that promises gilded horizons."

An abstract from the review by Flaviana Chelliah  (Co-Editor) :-

" ... For the past three years, Tahira has conscientiously devoted the most part of her energies to finding the answers to a more meaningful life. During her search, she encountered a series of spiritual revelations which she wanted to share with as many people as possible ....

This book beautifully recounts Tahira's experiences, which explore symbolism, philosophical, scientific and spiritual teachings. I have learnt so much from her and welcome all of you to embark with her, on this journey of discovery."



How the Funds will be used

All funds raised from this campaign will be used for the book design, production and basic marketing for this first volume and for any marketing need for the book to reach the multitudes. 

Through our marketing efforts, we would like to reach as far and wide as possible. In fact, we would like to have a beyond a Paperback edition but also in DVD, Audiobook and perhaps a Book-to-Screen opportunity.  

These are just some of the marketing we will consider doing.

1) Online Book ADs via Google throughout the year,  monitored month by month

2) Professionally done Book Video and Author Video

3) 15 second video spot : A recent market analysis showed that "consumers are 27 times more likely to click through online video ads than standard banners." With the involvement of experts, we will professionally create a 15-second ad that could prompt more people to research and purchase the book.

4) Pre-releases: Delivery of your press release to media outlets chosen based on location, your book's genre and more; recipients may include magazines, newspapers, online publications, and radio and TV programs -One month of press-release tracking. 

5) Specialized Social Media Publicity : This will involve full-scale marketing campaigns for book print, web and video (Professionally written press release, optimized for the Web and distributed to media outlets carefully chosen based on location, book title, and genre. Media outlets could include magazines, newspapers, online publications, and radio and TV programs).

And if we exceed our funding goal, we can start making early plans for the film/DVD project. We have already rounded up a good team of Film Producers to help with the initial process! And by the way, if you choose the GOLD PERK and beyond, you may consider inviting you to participate in the project. 


Risks & Challenges

The book is already complete and submitted to the Publishers. So that is one major risk out of the way.  Now it will go out for printing, sales and distribution. Based on the fact that the book has already received such good reviews, we can work out initial plans to convince film producers out there to a Book-to-Screen to happen. It's never too early!


FAQs

What are the benefits to ordering the book now? Why not just wait for it to be on Amazon or BarnesandNoble etc?

Supporters will receive their copies signed & dated in advance of the general public and it will be the first set of copies which will be signed. Again depending on the Reward you go for, you will also get a handwritten (or in calligraphy) Thank You Letter from the author added as an insertion with the book. 

There is definitely a bit of pride that comes from being able to have something before everyone else, especially if it is high in demand - the current reviewers have expressed their confidence in the book's potential reach, and it is among these reviewers that plans for a DVD project have begun. For those who are supporting the package that includes feedback and voluntary involvement, these supporters will be able to meet the author in person for a one-on-one consultation.

What are the delivery costs and methods?

For outside Singapore, the delivery costs we stated are estimates. We suggest delivery by standard international mail. Though it is up to you if you would like us to courier the books/posters. To be completely transparent, we will quote you the exact cost for delivery to you by our delivery company. 

What will the Photobook cover?

This will be a book of some poetry by Tahira Amir Khan. And we will visualize the poetry come to life with an interwoven array of pictures taken by Shikha Tuli. Hence, you will be uplifted through the poems graphically narrated through a stunning set of photos. This photobook will be in hard-cover which can place as an inspiration in your home or office. This Photobook version will be released in early 2016. Order this early, and you will get your name listed in the Contributors Section.

What is the size and quality of the Posters?

The size of each Poster is 24" x 24" . The posters will be printed on high quality gloss finish paper with archival quality inks.  The Posters are perfect for homes, dorm rooms, kids rooms, offices, and more.

This book beautifully recounts Tahira's experiences, which explore symbolism, philosophical, scientific and spiritual teachings. I have learnt so much from her and welcome all of you to embark with her, on this journey of discovery."



How the Funds will be used All funds raised from this campaign will be used for the book design, production and basic marketing for this first volume and for any marketing need for the book to reach the multitudes. 
Through our marketing efforts, we would like to reach as far and wide as possible. In fact, we would like to have a beyond a Paperback edition but also in DVD, Audiobook and perhaps a Book-to-Screen opportunity.  
These are just some of the marketing we will consider doing.




1) Online Book ADs via Google throughout the year,  monitored month by month


2) Professionally done Book Video and Author Video


3) 15 second video spot : A recent market analysis showed that "consumers are 27 times more likely to click through online video ads than standard banners." With the involvement of experts, we will professionally create a 15-second ad that could prompt more people to research and purchase the book.


4) Pre-releases: Delivery of your press release to media outlets chosen based on location, your book's genre and more; recipients may include magazines, newspapers, online publications, and radio and TV programs -One month of press-release tracking. 


5) Specialized Social Media Publicity : This will involve full-scale marketing campaigns for book print, web and video (Professionally written press release, optimized for the Web and distributed to media outlets carefully chosen based on location, book title, and genre. Media outlets could include magazines, newspapers, online publications, and radio and TV programs).
And if we exceed our funding goal, we can start making early plans for the film/DVD project. We have already rounded up a good team of Film Producers to help with the initial process! And by the way, if you choose the GOLD PERK and beyond, you may consider inviting you to participate in the project. 

  Risks & Challenges  The book is already complete and submitted to the Publishers. So that is one major risk out of the way.  Now it will go out for printing, sales and distribution. Based on the fact that the book has already received such good reviews, we can work out initial plans to convince film producers out there to a Book-to-Screen to happen. It's never too early!


FAQs
What are the benefits to ordering the book now? Why not just wait for it to be on Amazon or BarnesandNoble etc?
Supporters will receive their copies signed & dated in advance of the general public and it will be the first set of copies which will be signed. Again depending on the Reward you go for, you will also get a handwritten (or in calligraphy) Thank You Letter from the author added as an insertion with the book. 


There is definitely a bit of pride that comes from being able to have something before everyone else, especially if it is high in demand - the current reviewers have expressed their confidence in the book's potential reach, and it is among these reviewers that plans for a DVD project have begun. For those who are supporting the package that includes feedback and voluntary involvement, these supporters will be able to meet the author in person for a one-on-one consultation.
What are the delivery costs and methods?
For outside Singapore, the delivery costs we stated are estimates. We suggest delivery by standard international mail. Though it is up to you if you would like us to courier the books/posters. To be completely transparent, we will quote you the exact cost for delivery to you by our delivery company. 
What will the Photobook cover?
This will be a book of some poetry by Tahira Amir Khan. And we will visualize the poetry come to life with an interwoven array of pictures taken by Shikha Tuli. Hence, you will be uplifted through the poems graphically narrated through a stunning set of photos. This photobook will be in hard-cover which can place as an inspiration in your home or office. This Photobook version will be released in early 2016. Order this early, and you will get your name listed in the Contributors Section.

What is the size and quality of the Posters?

The size of each Poster is 24" x 24" . The posters will be printed on high quality gloss finish paper with archival quality inks.  The Posters are perfect for homes, dorm rooms, kids rooms, offices, and more.

story:
Short Summary

Photo credit: Rayah Long, Illustrator

Who Is The Girl With The Magical Curls?

According to  statistics by Dove, only 10% of women  feel proud of their curls and only 4 out of 10 curly-haired girls think their hair is beautiful. Help me in my effort to turn the tide by communicating to curly -haired girls that their hair is beautiful and magical!

Curly-haired girls need a super sheroe (female super hero) to look up to! This book will inspire and improve self-esteem of girls all around the world. This is the goal. This book is for children of all hair types, and backgrounds, as it's also a fun loving story of learning to be of service to others using humor. 

I'm  Evita Giron and this will be my first children's book. In addition, I am currently pursuing a second master's degree in Religion and Religious Education at Fordham University. I am also a proud wife and mother to a soon to be 3 year-old named Tatiana. My book is inspired by my curly-haired daughter Tatiana on which the character is based! In love with my daughter's curly hair and my curly hair, I thought why not create a character with curly hair  that has amazing super power abilities using her hair? 

The Girl With The Magical Curls is about a six -year old named Tatiana, who develops magical hair powers, while playing in her neighbor Mrs. Pumpkin's garden. Tatiana learns the importance of being of service to others by using her hair. The first story scene introduces you to Tatiana and how she developed her magical curl power to how she saves a kitten using her curly locks. The inspiration for my book, came from my daughter Tatiana. As a multiracial family and coming from a diverse background, I thought it would be a great idea to have a child superhero with a unique special power. 

This campaign will raise funds to get my book published, from illustrations and book completion, printing, copyright & ISBN and a website presence and having my book available to all bookstore outlets (Amazon, Barnes and Noble, etc.).

By supporting this campaign YOU will not only gain a great and innovative children's book, however you will have helped in the efforts to improving the self-esteem of little girls around the world! Also, you would have helped another book featuring diverse and multicultural characters become fully published and available to ALL book markets. As providing more diverse books is a must! 


What We Need & What Has Been Done

One of my perks for receiving a copy of the book! Receive a FREE T-shirt for your child and yourself!

I need a total of $4,700 to complete the production of this book. I have a professional editor reviewing my book as of right now, from the funds that were raised in the previous campaign ($300). 

The $4,700 that I need will pay for the following: 

  • Illustrator: $3,000
  • Book layout/Formatting and Printing/ISBN: $1,000. I'm using a platform called CreateSpace through Amazon to layout, format and print my book. Amazon is a great platform that can provide many copies of your book for a great price. An ebook copy will also be available for this book. I've seen many books printed using their services. 
  • Website Design:  $700. I would love to have a website for my book and as a resource for my recently acclaimed author/writer status. This website would include information about myself and my book (s). My book would be available for purchase on this site, as well as memorabilia for my books: t-shirts, socks, bookmarks, stickers, coloring books. 
If I surpass my goal, I will produce more books and use them to supply our nation's libraries and low income parents with this resource as an outreach project. 

Tatiana amongst the ivies. ~:-)

What You Will Get!

The perks involved in this campaign are fun and practical. You will at the very least will get an autographed-beautifully illustrated, 20 page book. Some of you will get a copy of the book autographed (or multiple copies to share with a friend :), a t-shirt, bookmarker featuring characters and stickers plus a downloaded ebook copy of the book! 

Risks & Challenges

I am equip for any and all challenges. I have a strong desire and willpower to make sure this book is finished and gets published due to my faith and dilligence. I am grateful for this experience thus far, knowing that the outcome will be great as there's a bigger purpose to publish this book. Three key themes that I tell myself each day is that I'm providing a service to all girls around the world, especially curly-haired girls, promoting a girl super hero, and creating diverse/multicultural characters for all to enjoy. 

Other Ways You Can Help: SHARE AS OFTEN AS YOU CAN!!!

If you can't fund this campaign, no worries! 
PLEASE SHARE this link via email, Facebook, Twitter, Instagram, Pinterest, text message with your friends, family, acquaintances, etc. YOU CAN EASILY SHARE VIA THE LINKS AT THE TOP LEFT SIDE OF THE PAGE. Perhaps there's someone in your network who would love to support my book campaign or has a story to share that relates to their hair or child's hair and self-esteem. 

Join my Twitter, Instagram, Blog and Facebook Fan Page! 

Links are found below and within the campaign page. 

Twitter

Facebook Fan Page

Instagram

MyMagicalCurls

Thank you and God bless,

Evita Giron

Photo credit: Rayah Long, Illustrator
