PLEASE SHARE this link via email, Facebook, Twitter, Instagram, Pinterest, text message with your friends, family, acquaintances, etc. YOU CAN EASILY SHARE VIA THE LINKS AT THE TOP LEFT SIDE OF THE PAGE. Perhaps there's someone in your network who would love to support my book campaign or has a story to share that relates to their hair or child's hair and self-esteem.   Join my Twitter, Instagram, Blog and Facebook Fan Page! Links are found below and within the campaign page. TwitterFacebook Fan PageInstagramMyMagicalCurlsThank you and God bless,Evita GironPhoto credit: Rayah Long, Illustrator

story:
What it's about:

Have you noticed that some of the best stories are of a hero on a journey—and often that hero is accompanied by a helpful companion?  J.R.R. Tolkien's Frodo and Sam or R.A. Salvatore's Drizzt and Guenhwyvar come to mind.

I'm inviting you to join me as we travel the path to get my story published.  In the Eye of the Centaur is a Science Fiction tale with Fantasy creatures.  The story features the journey of Terrah—a Dryad—and it begins in the Orion's Belt constellation.
                        
Terrah is abducted from her homeland by Captain Moore and his crew of spacefaring pirates.  Trying to get home, Terrah escapes and becomes lost in uncharted space.  Arriving at a distant planet called Earth, Terrah is confronted by Captain Moore--where he chases her into the clutches of an ice-breathing white dragon!  Terrah discovers self-confidence and learns to accept herself along the way.

The 59,000-word manuscript is complete!  Our adventure is to publish the work at an estimated cost of $3,300-$4,500.  We will need allies and resources to reach our goal of raising $1,500 toward the cost.  Can you help spread the word?  Grab your traveling cloak, some coin and your pack—let's get going!  

About the author: a lifelong learner and reader of fantasy and science fiction, Steven Decknick is a Christian medical professional.  Steven simultaneously completed both a medical and a business degree at two different universities as the idea for this story began.  He is married to the love of his life, has six children, and he enjoys meeting people from all walks of life.  This is his first novel.

What's in it for you:

  • $5 or more achieves an emailed thank you from the author
  • $25 or more grants you a heartfelt thank you handwritten from the author mailed to your U.S. Postal address
  • $50 or more qualifies you to receive three 8x10 potential book cover photographs mailed to your U.S. Postal address
  • $100 or more gets you an autographed copy of the book (when published) mailed to your U.S. Postal address

Why it matters:

It seems like many of today's TV shows, movies, magazines and books are stuffed full of sex and curse words to attract attention.  Wouldn't you like to be part of a refreshing alternative?  Uniquely devoid of sex and offensive language, In the Eye of the Centaur helps readers enjoy an adventure story without the filth.  Your support spreads the word of this campaign while launching it towards completion.

Noble presses being pursued include Covenant Books (https://covenantbooks.com/) and Christian Faith Publishing (https://www.christianfaithpublishing.com/).  Your other suggestions are welcome! 

Funds in excess of the $1,500 goal will help assure project completion; less will delay publishing as the author may conduct further fundraisers.  Besides the support raised here, the author intends to pay all remaining publishing costs out of his personal funds.

How You Can Help:

Even if you can't contribute, please help get the word out; you can use Indiegogo share tools!

My grateful thanks to the amazing artists who labored to create these images:
 - Actors Stephanie Ward and Michael J. Gilbert (@misadventurersshow)
 - Makeup Artist Jenn Dugan of The Makeup Curio (www.themakeupcurio.com)
 - Photographer Bonnie Bachman of Bonnie Mae Photography (www.bonniemaephotography.com)

story:
Please Help Us Publish

"PIGGIE BEAR's Power of Happiness" 

 

GOAL:  Raise $50,000 to help us publish and DONATE 500 books to vulnerable children in hospitals, foster care, homeless and domestic violence shelters, military families and more.

 

Increase Social Emotional Learning (SEL)

PIGGIE BEAR's Power of Happiness is the second book in the PIGGIE BEAR series.  Piggie Bear is an adorable, friendly character who helps Build Emotional Awareness and Resilience (BEAR) by teaching them to recognize and manage their emotions in a fun and loving way.  Piggie Bear was created by author Mara James, who is the Founder and CEO of the non-profit organization, the Extraordinary Lives Foundation (ELF).

Children's Mental Health and Wellness 

As a non-profit organization, ELF donates Piggie Bear books and toolkits to children's hospitals, foster care, homeless and domestic violence shelters, military families and more.  The Extraordinary Lives Foundation aims to improve children's mental health and wellness and support families.  By spreading Piggie Bear's insightful lessons of self-care, we can help boost children's self-esteem and teach them to identify and manage their emotions in a fun and loving way.

PIGGIE BEAR's Power of Happiness

The first book in Piggie Bear's social emotional learning series, "The Power of Piggie Bear" teaches children how to use self-calming skills, utilize empowering words, and know that they are amazing just the way they are.

In Piggie Bear's second book,”PIGGIE BEAR's Power of Happiness”, Piggie Bear encourages children to welcome ALL emotions so that they can move through them in a positive and safe way.  Piggie Bear teaches children how to feel, work through, and finally, release unhappy emotions so they can feel happy again.

 

Help Publish and Donate 500 Books!

Your contribution will help the Extraordinary Lives Foundation (ELF) publish and donate 500 hardcover, full-color, PIGGIE BEAR's Power of Happiness books to at-risk, vulnerable children who need them the most.

 

Give and Receive Piggie Bear Goodies

We all LOVE gifts!  Below are 10 ways that you can contribute to the “PIGGIE BEAR's Power of Happiness” book campaign and receive your very own Piggie Bear items.  

 

You Are Amazing!   $10 

You heart will be filled with love and happiness knowing that you are bringing PIGGIE BEAR's Power of Happiness to children who need it the most.

Piggie Bear Sticker   $25

You will receive this adorable Piggie Bear sticker, guaranteed to be loved by all!

Piggie Bear Keychain   $50

You will receive this adorable Piggie Bear keychain! Children love attaching them to their zippers and backpacks. 

Piggie Bear Coloring Book   $100

You will receive this adorable 8  1/2" by 11" coloring book containing 16 pages of 32 fun-filled illustrations and a box of Crayola crayons.

Piggie Bear Plush & Coloring Book   $250

You will receive this adorable Piggie Bear plush and 8  1/2" by 11" coloring book containing 16 pages of 32 fun-filled illustrations and a box of Crayola crayons.

AUTOGRAPHED Piggie Bear Book 1   $500

You will receive “The Power of Piggie Bear” book AUTOGRAPHED by author Mara James.

AUTOGRAPHED Piggie Bear Book 1 & Piggie Bear Power Cards   $750

You will receive "The Power of Piggie Bear" book AUTOGRAPHED by author Mara James and a box of fun and adorable Piggie Bear Power Cards. 

The Piggie Bear Power Cards are used as a tool to empower children emotionally and physically. Each card has been uniquely designed to increase children's confidence, self-esteem and encourage physical movement.

AUTOGRAPHED Piggie Bear Book 1 & Piggie Bear Plush   $1,000

You will receive "The Power of Piggie Bear" book AUTOGRAPHED by author Mara James and this adorable Piggie Bear plush.

AUTOGRAPHED Piggie Bear Book 1, Piggie Bear Plush & Power Cards   $2,500

You will receive "The Power of Piggie Bear" book AUTOGRAPHED by author Mara James, the adorable Piggie Bear plush, and a box of fun and adorable Piggie Bear Power Cards. These cards are used as a tool to empower children emotionally and physically. They are uniquely designed to increase children's confidence, self-esteem and encourage physical movement.

POWERFUL Piggie Bear Sponsor Package  $5,000

You will receive BOTH AUTOGRAPHED Piggie Bear books, the Piggie Bear plush, and a box of the Piggie Bear Power Cards. These cards are used as a tool to empower children emotionally and physically. They are uniquely designed to increase children's confidence, self-esteem and encourage physical movement.

**This is the ONLY sponsorship level that includes the brand-new, published and AUTOGRAPHED "PIGGIE BEAR's Power of Happiness book!**

 

 

Additional Ways to Help Us Share

PIGGIE BEAR's Power of Happiness: 

We know that contributing can sometimes be a challenge, so here are ways you can still be of help: 

1. Tell your friends about PIGGIE BEAR's Power of Happiness!

2. Use the Indiegogo SHARE tools to post on Facebook, Twitter, Instagram and more.

3. Like and Follow the social media accounts for Extraordinary Lives Foundation and Piggie Bear.

story:
The BisMan Writers Guild

BisMan Writer's Guild was started in Feb. of 2019. Our mission is to uplift local authors throughout North Dakota by promoting, advancing, and supporting them. We do this by offering workshops, sharing the works of others, and shedding light on the amazing talent of our state. We work hard to bring workshops, write-ins, general get-togethers, give writers an opportunity to be published in our anthologies, as well as go to local events to promote our writers.

We are currently trying to release our next anthology, The Mythology Anthology, and need help with raising funds to do so. One way you can contribute to this is by pre-ordering a copy of the book before the release. You will also be given an opportunity to pick up your copy at our release party on Sat., June 12th, starting at 6 PM at Dialectic Brewing in Mandan. There will be other tiers where you can get swag as well.

Please help us reach our goal of helping writers throughout North Dakota get their work noticed.
story_txt:
The BisMan Writers Guild
BisMan Writer's Guild was started in Feb. of 2019. Our mission is to uplift local authors throughout North Dakota by promoting, advancing, and supporting them. We do this by offering workshops, sharing the works of others, and shedding light on the amazing talent of our state. We work hard to bring workshops, write-ins, general get-togethers, give writers an opportunity to be published in our anthologies, as well as go to local events to promote our writers.
We are currently trying to release our next anthology, The Mythology Anthology, and need help with raising funds to do so. One way you can contribute to this is by pre-ordering a copy of the book before the release. You will also be given an opportunity to pick up your copy at our release party on Sat., June 12th, starting at 6 PM at Dialectic Brewing in Mandan. There will be other tiers where you can get swag as well.
Please help us reach our goal of helping writers throughout North Dakota get their work noticed.

story:
Thank you for visiting here and welcome to Home at the Office: Working Remotely as a Way of Life - The Book!
 

My name is Barbori Garnet and I am the author of Home at the Office: Working Remotely as a Way of Life. I have been working from home since 2010 and first started writing the book in spring 2017. I enjoy the freedom, flexibility, and independence which working from home offers and this is what I share in my book with readers.

Your support will help me reach the goals of publishing my book and holding a book tour. To learn more about me and follow along with my writing journey, visit and follow me on:
- My website: www.barborigarnet.com
- Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/barborigarnet/
- Twitter: https://twitter.com/BarboriGarnet

 

The Book - Home at the Office: Working Remotely as a Way of Life


The book is organized into 3 sections to make the information presented easy and enjoyable to read. The three sections are:

- Part 1: Making Working from Home Work for You: It begins with showing that working from home is a way of life. It should blend with all areas of your life and should be an activity that you look forward to. Remote work offers freedom, flexibility, and independence in every age and stage of life.

- Part 2: Extraordinary People Who Work from Home: You will be introduced to people across North America who successfully work from home. You will read their stories and gain insight from their words of wisdom.

- Part 3: Hands-on Workbook - Is Remote Work Right for You?: This section gives a hands-on area to explore your thoughts and ideas. Questions are posed for you to consider and think about with space provided to record your answers.

The book also includes a Book Club Discussion Guide to help facilitate discussions for book clubs and groups.

 

What I Need & What You Get

The book will be published by Atmosphere Press. The pre-order tiers are set-up to help cover the costs of publishing my book and to hold a book tour. Funds raised will go to:

  • Publishing my book which includes editing, cover design, and layout
  • Holding a book tour to launch and promote my book
     

The Impact

By supporting this campaign, you will be making a difference by helping me:

  • Publish my book which includes:
        - copy editing
        - cover design
        - layout design
  • Carry out a book launch and tour

Risks & Challenges

The biggest challenge with publishing a book is delivering the finished book to the backer, specifically my mailing of the book to you. The risk of delivering the pre-sale copies of my book is based on the timing of each step which includes publication. All pre-sale backers will be kept up-to-date as to when my book will publish. You will know when the copies of my book you pre-ordered are expected to ship.

Other Ways You Can Help

Any way you can help is appreciated! Here are some ways you can help:

  • Spread the word about this campaign by sharing the link with family/friends/others.
  • Share this campaign using the Indiegogo share tools!
  • Share on your social media platforms (Facebook, Twitter, Instagram, etc.)
  • Follow me on my writing journey at:
    - My website: www.barborigarnet.com and sign-up for my e-newsletter
    - Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/barborigarnet/
    - Twitter: https://twitter.com/BarboriGarnet
